src: Fortschr Röntgenstr 2021; 193: 61 - 67.
tgt: Fortschr. Röntgenstr. 2021; 193: 61–67.
atomic_facts: ['Fortschr Röntgenstr 2021; 193: 61 - 67.']
bt_tgt: Progress Roentgenstr. 2021; 193: 61-67.

src: The objective of this work was to determine whether there is a difference in health-related quality of life (HRQoL) of patients with non-small cell lung cancer - compared to the German normal population - before and after surgery.
tgt: Ziel dieser Arbeit war es, festzustellen, ob es einen Unterschied in der gesundheitsbezogenen Lebensqualität (HRQoL) von Patienten mit nicht-kleinzelligem Lungenkrebs – im Vergleich zur deutschen Normalbevölkerung – vor und nach der Operation gibt.
atomic_facts: ['The objective of this work was to determine if there is a difference in health-related quality of life (HRQoL) of patients with non-small cell lung cancer before surgery.', 'The objective of this work was to determine if there is a difference in health-related quality of life (HRQoL) of patients with non-small cell lung cancer after surgery.', 'The health-related quality of life (HRQoL) of patients with non-small cell lung cancer may differ from the German normal population before surgery.', 'The health-related quality of life (HRQoL) of patients with non-small cell lung cancer may differ from the German normal population after surgery.']
bt_tgt: The aim of this work was to determine whether there is a difference in the health-related quality of life (HRQoL) of patients with non-small cell lung cancer - compared to the normal German population - before and after surgery.

src: Based on retrospective data generated during a 7-year period (2010 - 2017), 327 patients with non-small cell lung cancer who underwent therapy were examined.
tgt: Basierend auf über einen Zeitraum von 7 Jahren (2010–2017) gesammelten retrospektiven Daten wurden 327 Patienten mit nicht-kleinzelligem Lungenkrebs untersucht, die sich einer Therapie unterzogen hatten.
atomic_facts: ['327 patients with non-small cell lung cancer underwent therapy.', 'The patients were examined based on retrospective data generated during a 7-year period (2010-2017).']
bt_tgt: Based on retrospective data collected over a 7-year period (2010-2017), 327 patients with non-small cell lung cancer who underwent therapy were examined.

src: Moreover, thoracotomy and VATS gave equivalent values for health-related quality of life.
tgt: Darüber hinaus ergaben Thorakotomie und videoassistierte Thorakoskopie vergleichbare Werte für die gesundheitsbezogene Lebensqualität.
atomic_facts: ['Thoracotomy gave equivalent values for health-related quality of life.', 'VATS gave equivalent values for health-related quality of life.']
bt_tgt: In addition, thoracotomy and video-assisted thoracoscopy yielded comparable values ​​for health-related quality of life.

src: While the procedure is safe and shows reliable results in experienced hands, some practical and logistical issues must be challenged that are not described sufficiently in available literature.
tgt: Obwohl das Verfahren sicher ist und in erfahrenen Händen zuverlässige Ergebnisse zeigt, müssen einige praktische und logistische Probleme gelöst werden, die in der verfügbaren Literatur nicht ausreichend beschrieben sind.
atomic_facts: ['The procedure is safe in experienced hands.', 'The procedure shows reliable results in experienced hands.', 'Some practical and logistical issues must be challenged.', 'Some practical and logistical issues are not described sufficiently in available literature.']
bt_tgt: Although the procedure is safe and shows reliable results in experienced hands, some practical and logistical problems need to be solved that are not well described in the available literature.

tgt: Ein multiprofessionelles Panel, bestehend aus erfahrenen Anwendern des ED aus deutschsprachigen Brandverletztenzentren, wurde zu einem Expertenworkshop eingeladen.
atomic_facts: ['A multi-professional panel has been invited to an expert workshop.', 'The panel consists of experienced users of ED from German-speaking burn units.']
bt_tgt: A multi-professional panel consisting of experienced ED users from German-speaking burn injury centers was invited to an expert workshop.

bt_tgt: Practical recommendations were developed and decided on for each topic.

atomic_facts: ['Summarizing key messages have been additionally highlighted.', 'Key messages have been additionally highlighted.']
bt_tgt: Summary key messages were additionally highlighted.

src: Patients were divided into patients with (LGE+) and without (LGE-) cardiac sarcoidosis.
tgt: Die Patienten wurden in Patienten mit (LGE+) und ohne (LGE-) kardiale Sarkoidose eingeteilt.
atomic_facts: ['Patients were divided into patients with cardiac sarcoidosis.', 'Patients were divided into patients without cardiac sarcoidosis.', 'Patients were divided into patients with LGE+ cardiac sarcoidosis.', 'Patients were divided into patients without LGE- cardiac sarcoidosis.']
bt_tgt: Patients were divided into patients with (LGE+) and without (LGE-) cardiac sarcoidosis.

src: T1 and T2 relaxation times were compared between patients and controls.
tgt: Die T1- und T2-Relaxationszeiten wurden zwischen Patienten und der Kontrollgruppe verglichen.
atomic_facts: ['T1 relaxation times were compared between patients and controls.', 'T2 relaxation times were compared between patients and controls.']
bt_tgt: T1 and T2 relaxation times were compared between patients and controls.

src: Furthermore, the SAX and the ConSept approach were compared regarding differentiation between healthy and diseased myocardium.
tgt: Weiterhin wurden der SAX- und der ConSept-Ansatz hinsichtlich der Differenzierung zwischen gesundem und erkranktem Myokard verglichen.
atomic_facts: ['The SAX approach was compared regarding differentiation between healthy and diseased myocardium.', 'The ConSept approach was compared regarding differentiation between healthy and diseased myocardium.']
bt_tgt: Furthermore, the SAX and ConSept approaches were compared with regard to the differentiation between healthy and diseased myocardium.

src: T1 and T2 relaxation times were significantly longer in all patients compared with controls using both the SAX and the ConSept approach (p < 0.05).
tgt: Die T1- und T2-Relaxationszeiten waren bei allen Patienten signifikant länger als bei der Kontrollgruppe, bei der sowohl der SAX- als auch der ConSept-Ansatz Anwendung fand (p < 0,05).
atomic_facts: ['T1 relaxation times were significantly longer in all patients compared with controls using both the SAX and the ConSept approach (p < 0.05).', 'T2 relaxation times were significantly longer in all patients compared with controls using both the SAX and the ConSept approach (p < 0.05).']
bt_tgt: The T1 and T2 relaxation times were significantly longer in all patients than in the control group, in which both the SAX and ConSept approaches were used (p < 0.05).

src: However, LGE+ and LGE- patients showed no significant differences in T1 and T2 relaxation times regardless of the measurement approach used (ConSept/SAX) (p > 0.05). Direct comparison of ConSept and SAX T1 mapping showed high conformity in the discrimination between healthy and diseased myocardium (Kappa = 0.844).
tgt: Patienten mit LGE+ und LGE- zeigten jedoch unabhängig vom verwendeten Messansatz (ConSept/SAX) (p > 0,05) keine signifikanten Unterschiede in den T1- und T2-Relaxationszeiten. Der direkte Vergleich von ConSept- und SAX-T1-Mapping zeigte eine hohe Übereinstimmung in der Unterscheidung zwischen gesundem und erkranktem Myokard (Kappa = 0,844).
atomic_facts: ['LGE+ patients showed no significant differences in T1 and T2 relaxation times regardless of the measurement approach used (ConSept/SAX) (p > 0.05).', 'LGE- patients showed no significant differences in T1 and T2 relaxation times regardless of the measurement approach used (ConSept/SAX) (p > 0.05).', 'Direct comparison of ConSept and SAX T1 mapping showed high conformity in the discrimination between healthy and diseased myocardium (Kappa = 0.844).']
bt_tgt: However, patients with LGE+ and LGE- showed no significant differences in the T1 and T2 relaxation times regardless of the measurement approach used (ConSept/SAX) (p > 0.05). The direct comparison of ConSept and SAX-T1 mapping showed a high level of agreement in distinguishing between healthy and diseased myocardium (kappa = 0.844).

src: T1 and T2 mapping may not only enable noninvasive recognition of cardiac involvement in patients with systemic sarcoidosis but may also serve as a marker for early cardiac involvement of the disease allowing for timely treatment.
tgt: Das T1- und T2-Mapping ermöglicht möglicherweise nicht nur die nichtinvasive Erkennung einer kardialen Beteiligung bei Patienten mit systemischer Sarkoidose, sondern kann auch als Marker für eine frühe kardiale Beteiligung der Krankheit dienen, was eine rechtzeitige Behandlung ermöglicht.
atomic_facts: ['T1 mapping may enable noninvasive recognition of cardiac involvement in patients with systemic sarcoidosis.', 'T1 mapping may serve as a marker for early cardiac involvement of the disease allowing for timely treatment.', 'T2 mapping may enable noninvasive recognition of cardiac involvement in patients with systemic sarcoidosis.', 'T2 mapping may serve as a marker for early cardiac involvement of the disease allowing for timely treatment.']
bt_tgt: T1 and T2 mapping may not only enable noninvasive detection of cardiac involvement in patients with systemic sarcoidosis, but also may serve as a marker of early cardiac involvement of the disease, allowing timely treatment.

src: ConSept T1 mapping represents an equivalent method for tissue characterization in this population compared to the SAX approach.
tgt: Das ConSept-T1-Mapping stellt in dieser Population im Vergleich zur SAX-Methode eine gleichwertige Methode zur Gewebecharakterisierung dar.
atomic_facts: ['ConSept T1 mapping represents an equivalent method for tissue characterization in this population.', 'ConSept T1 mapping is compared to the SAX approach.']
bt_tgt: In this population, ConSept-T1 mapping represents an equivalent method for tissue characterization compared to the SAX method.

src: Further studies including follow-up examinations are necessary to confirm these preliminary results.
tgt: Weitere Studien einschließlich Nachuntersuchungen sind notwendig, um diese vorläufigen Ergebnisse zu bestätigen.
atomic_facts: ['Further studies are necessary to confirm these preliminary results.', 'Follow-up examinations are necessary to confirm these preliminary results.']
bt_tgt: Further studies including follow-up are necessary to confirm these preliminary results.

src: Rapid progression and systemic illness are typical for the disease and complicate diagnosis.
tgt: Typisch für die Erkrankung sind ein rascher Verlauf und eine systemische Erkrankung, die die Diagnose erschweren.

bt_tgt: The disease is characterized by a rapid course and a systemic disease, which makes diagnosis difficult.

src: Three cases of cervicofacial NF are presented in this case report.
tgt: In diesem Fallbericht werden drei Fälle von zervikofazialer NF dargestellt.
atomic_facts: ['Three cases of cervicofacial NF are presented in this case report.']
bt_tgt: This case report presents three cases of cervicofacial NF.

src: All patients showed a rapidly progressing, painful swelling and redness in the cervicofacial region.
tgt: Alle Patienten zeigten eine rasch fortschreitende, schmerzhafte Schwellung und Rötung in der zervikofazialen Region.
atomic_facts: ['All patients showed a rapidly progressing, painful swelling in the cervicofacial region.', 'All patients showed redness in the cervicofacial region.']
bt_tgt: All patients presented with rapidly progressive, painful swelling and redness in the cervicofacial region.

src: After diagnosing NF based on clinical symptoms, laboratory parameters, and CT, the patients were treated with systemic antibiotics and multiple extensive debridements.
tgt: Nach der Diagnose von NF anhand klinischer Symptome, Laborparameter und CT wurden die Patienten mit systemischen Antibiotika und mehreren umfangreichen Débridements behandelt.
atomic_facts: ['NF was diagnosed based on clinical symptoms, laboratory parameters, and CT.', 'The patients were treated with systemic antibiotics.', 'The patients were treated with multiple extensive debridements.']
bt_tgt: After diagnosis of NF based on clinical symptoms, laboratory parameters, and CT, patients were treated with systemic antibiotics and multiple extensive debridements.

src: Two of the three patients died within 48 h from systemic illness with septic organ failure; one patient was discharged after intensive care treatment and reconstruction of the tissue defects caused by debridement.
tgt: Zwei der drei Patienten starben innerhalb von 48 Stunden an einer systemischen Erkrankung mit septischem Organversagen; eine Patientin wurde nach intensivmedizinischer Behandlung und Rekonstruktion der durch Débridement verursachten Gewebedefekte entlassen.
atomic_facts: ['Two of the three patients died within 48 h from systemic illness with septic organ failure.', 'One patient was discharged after intensive care treatment.', 'One patient was discharged after reconstruction of the tissue defects caused by debridement.']
bt_tgt: Two of the three patients died within 48 hours of systemic disease with septic organ failure; one patient was discharged after intensive care treatment and reconstruction of the tissue defects caused by debridement.

src: Diagnosis is based on clinical signs such as progressive diffuse swelling, pain, erythema, and early systemic illness.
tgt: Die Diagnose basiert auf klinischen Anzeichen wie progressiver diffuser Schwellung, Schmerzen, Erythem und früher systemischer Erkrankung.
atomic_facts: ['Diagnosis is based on clinical signs such as progressive diffuse swelling.', 'Diagnosis is based on clinical signs such as pain.', 'Diagnosis is based on clinical signs such as erythema.', 'Diagnosis is based on clinical signs such as early systemic illness.']
bt_tgt: Diagnosis is based on clinical signs such as progressive diffuse swelling, pain, erythema, and early systemic disease.

src: Laboratory parameters (Laboratory Risk Indicator for Necrotizing Fasciitis [LRINEC] score) and imaging via CT or MRT are helpful.
tgt: Laborparameter (Laboratory Risk Indicator for Necrotising Fasciitis [LRINEC] Score) und Bildgebung mittels CT oder MRT sind hilfreich.
atomic_facts: ['Laboratory parameters (LRINEC score) are helpful.', 'Imaging via CT is helpful.', 'Imaging via MRT is helpful.']
bt_tgt: Laboratory parameters (Laboratory Risk Indicator for Necrotizing Fasciitis [LRINEC] score) and imaging using CT or MRI are helpful.

src: CT/MRT images can show soft tissue swelling with pathognomonic gas formation.
tgt: CT-/MRT-Bilder können eine Weichgewebeschwellung mit pathognomonischer Gasbildung zeigen.
atomic_facts: ['CT/MRT images can show soft tissue swelling with pathognomonic gas formation.']
bt_tgt: CT/MRI images may show soft tissue swelling with pathognomonic gas formation.

src: Advances in reconstructive microsurgery have led to significant improvements in the surgical care of complex interdisciplinary cases.
tgt: Fortschritte in der rekonstruktiven Mikrochirurgie haben zu signifikanten Verbesserungen in der chirurgischen Versorgung komplexer interdisziplinärer Fälle geführt.
atomic_facts: ['Advances in reconstructive microsurgery have led to significant improvements in the surgical care of complex interdisciplinary cases.']
bt_tgt: Advances in reconstructive microsurgery have led to significant improvements in the surgical care of complex interdisciplinary cases.

src: At the same time, however, this also increases the resource expenditure of the plastic surgeon involved.
tgt: Gleichzeitig erhöht sich dadurch aber auch der Ressourcenaufwand des beteiligten plastischen Chirurgen.
atomic_facts: ['This increases the resource expenditure of the plastic surgeon involved.', 'This also increases the resource expenditure of the plastic surgeon involved.']
bt_tgt: At the same time, this also increases the resources required by the plastic surgeon involved.

src: 62 of these cases met the criteria for interdisciplinary surgical treatment.
tgt: 62 dieser Fälle erfüllten die Kriterien für eine interdisziplinäre chirurgische Behandlung.
atomic_facts: ['62 of these cases met the criteria for interdisciplinary surgical treatment.']
bt_tgt: 62 of these cases met the criteria for interdisciplinary surgical treatment.

src: Considering the contribution of plastic surgery to the economic development and the associated resource expenditure, there is a significant increase in all parameters (p < 0.0001).
tgt: Betrachtet man den Beitrag der plastischen Chirurgie zur wirtschaftlichen Entwicklung und den damit verbundenen Ressourcenaufwand, so zeigt sich eine signifikante Steigerung aller Parameter (p < 0,0001).
atomic_facts: ['The contribution of plastic surgery to economic development is significant.', 'The associated resource expenditure is significant.', 'There is a significant increase in all parameters.']
bt_tgt: If we look at the contribution of plastic surgery to economic development and the associated resource expenditure, there is a significant increase in all parameters (p < 0.0001).

src: However, a significant increase in resource consumption is observed as well.
tgt: Allerdings ist auch ein deutlicher Anstieg des Ressourcenverbrauchs zu beobachten.
atomic_facts: ['A significant increase in resource consumption is observed.', 'However, a significant increase in resource consumption is observed.']
bt_tgt: However, a significant increase in resource consumption can also be observed.

src: To ensure modern, individual, patient-oriented and guideline-compliant patient care, there is, therefore, an urgent need to adapt the (G-)DRG system to the additional resource consumption.
tgt: Um eine moderne, individuelle, patientenorientierte und leitliniengerechte Patientenversorgung zu gewährleisten, bedarf es daher dringend einer Anpassung des (G-)DRG-Systems an den zusätzlichen Ressourcenverbrauch.
atomic_facts: ['There is an urgent need to adapt the (G-)DRG system to the additional resource consumption.', 'There is a need to ensure modern patient care.', 'There is a need to ensure individual patient care.', 'There is a need to ensure patient-oriented care.', 'There is a need to ensure guideline-compliant patient care.']
bt_tgt: In order to ensure modern, individual, patient-oriented and guideline-compliant patient care, the (G-)DRG system urgently needs to be adapted to the additional consumption of resources.

src: In addition, in the case of interdisciplinary surgical cases, a clear internal cost allocation must be carried out in accordance with the surgical resource expenditure.
tgt: Darüber hinaus muss bei interdisziplinären chirurgischen Fällen eine klare interne Kostenallokation entsprechend dem chirurgischen Ressourcenaufwand erfolgen.
atomic_facts: ['In the case of interdisciplinary surgical cases, a clear internal cost allocation must be carried out.', 'The internal cost allocation must be in accordance with the surgical resource expenditure.']
bt_tgt: In addition, in interdisciplinary surgical cases, there must be a clear internal cost allocation according to the surgical resource expenditure.

src: Besides addiction and pulmonary health damage, reports of burn injuries from e-cigarette explosions are also increasing.

src: Due to increasing cases and missing guidelines we want to present three cases of our hospital and publish recommendations for the management of burn injuries caused by e-cigarette explosions.
tgt: Aufgrund steigender Fallzahlen und fehlender Leitlinien möchten wir drei Fälle unseres Krankenhauses vorstellen und Empfehlungen zum Umgang mit Brandverletzungen durch E-Zigaretten-Explosionen veröffentlichen.

bt_tgt: Due to increasing case numbers and a lack of guidelines, we would like to present three cases from our hospital and publish recommendations for dealing with burn injuries caused by e-cigarette explosions.

src: Three cases of e-cigarette explosions which occurred between 2016 and 2019, are presented.
tgt: Drei Fälle von E-Zigaretten-Explosionen, die sich zwischen 2016 und 2019 ereigneten, werden vorgestellt.

bt_tgt: Three cases of e-cigarette explosions that occurred between 2016 and 2019 are presented.

src: All three e-cigarette explosions occurred in the trouser pockets.

bt_tgt: All three e-cigarette explosions occurred in pants pockets.

src: The age ranged from 24 to 64 years, the burned total body surface area (TBSA) from 3 % to 12.5 %. All three patients required skin grafting and the length of stay in hospital ranged from five to eleven days.
tgt: Das Alter lag zwischen 24 und 64 Jahren, die verbrannte Gesamtoberfläche (TBSA) zwischen 3 % und 12,5 %. Alle drei Patienten benötigten eine Hauttransplantation und die Dauer des Krankenhausaufenthaltes reichte von fünf bis elf Tagen.

bt_tgt: Age ranged from 24 to 64 years, and total surface area burned (TBSA) ranged from 3% to 12.5%. All three patients required skin grafting and the length of hospital stay ranged from five to eleven days.

src: The objective of this work was to determine whether there is a difference in health-related quality of life (HRQoL) of patients with non-small cell lung cancer - compared to the German normal population - before and after surgery.
tgt: Ziel dieser Arbeit war es, festzustellen, ob es einen Unterschied in der gesundheitsbezogenen Lebensqualität (HRQoL) von Patienten mit nicht-kleinzelligem Lungenkrebs – im Vergleich zur deutschen Normalbevölkerung – vor und nach der Operation gibt.
atomic_facts: ['The objective of this work was to determine whether there is a difference in health-related quality of life (HRQoL) of patients with non-small cell lung cancer before surgery.', 'The objective of this work was to determine whether there is a difference in health-related quality of life (HRQoL) of patients with non-small cell lung cancer after surgery.', 'The objective of this work was to determine whether there is a difference in health-related quality of life (HRQoL) of patients with non-small cell lung cancer compared to the German normal population before surgery.', 'The objective of this work was to determine whether there is a difference in health-related quality of life (HRQoL) of patients with non-small cell lung cancer compared to the German normal population after surgery.']
bt_tgt: The aim of this work was to determine whether there is a difference in the health-related quality of life (HRQoL) of patients with non-small cell lung cancer - compared to the normal German population - before and after surgery.

src: Based on retrospective data generated during a 7-year period (2010 - 2017), 327 patients with non-small cell lung cancer who underwent therapy were examined.
tgt: Basierend auf retrospektiven Daten, die über einen Zeitraum von 7 Jahren (2010 - 2017) generiert wurden, wurden 327 Patienten mit nicht-kleinzelligem Lungenkrebs untersucht, die sich einer Therapie unterzogen hatten.
atomic_facts: ['327 patients with non-small cell lung cancer underwent therapy were examined during a 7-year period (2010-2017).', 'Based on retrospective data generated during a 7-year period (2010-2017), 327 patients with non-small cell lung cancer underwent therapy were examined.']
bt_tgt: Based on retrospective data generated over a 7-year period (2010 - 2017), 327 patients with non-small cell lung cancer who underwent therapy were studied.

src: Moreover, thoracotomy and VATS gave equivalent values for health-related quality of life.
tgt: Darüber hinaus ergaben Thorakotomie und videoassistierte Thorakoskopie gleichwertige Werte für die gesundheitsbezogene Lebensqualität.
atomic_facts: ['Thoracotomy gave equivalent values for health-related quality of life.', 'VATS gave equivalent values for health-related quality of life.']
bt_tgt: In addition, thoracotomy and video-assisted thoracoscopy yielded equivalent values ​​for health-related quality of life.

atomic_facts: ['Patients were divided into patients with cardiac sarcoidosis.', 'Patients were divided into patients without cardiac sarcoidosis.']
bt_tgt: Patients were divided into patients with (LGE+) and without (LGE-) cardiac sarcoidosis.

src: T1 and T2 relaxation times were compared between patients and controls.
tgt: Die T1- und T2-Relaxationszeiten wurden zwischen Patienten und der Kontrollgruppe verglichen.
atomic_facts: ['T1 relaxation times were compared between patients and controls.', 'T2 relaxation times were compared between patients and controls.']
bt_tgt: T1 and T2 relaxation times were compared between patients and controls.

src: Furthermore, the SAX and the ConSept approach were compared regarding differentiation between healthy and diseased myocardium.
tgt: Weiterhin wurden der SAX- und der ConSept-Ansatz hinsichtlich der Differenzierung zwischen gesundem und erkranktem Myokard verglichen.
atomic_facts: ['The SAX approach was compared regarding differentiation between healthy and diseased myocardium.', 'The ConSept approach was compared regarding differentiation between healthy and diseased myocardium.']
bt_tgt: Furthermore, the SAX and ConSept approaches were compared with regard to the differentiation between healthy and diseased myocardium.

src: T1 and T2 relaxation times were significantly longer in all patients compared with controls using both the SAX and the ConSept approach (p < 0.05).
tgt: Die T1- und T2-Relaxationszeiten waren bei allen Patienten signifikant länger als bei der Kontrollgruppe, bei der sowohl der SAX- als auch der ConSept-Ansatz Anwendung fand (p < 0,05).
atomic_facts: ['T1 relaxation times were significantly longer in all patients compared with controls using both the SAX and the ConSept approach (p < 0.05).', 'T2 relaxation times were significantly longer in all patients compared with controls using both the SAX and the ConSept approach (p < 0.05).']
bt_tgt: The T1 and T2 relaxation times were significantly longer in all patients than in the control group, in which both the SAX and ConSept approaches were used (p < 0.05).

src: However, LGE+ and LGE- patients showed no significant differences in T1 and T2 relaxation times regardless of the measurement approach used (ConSept/SAX) (p > 0.05). Direct comparison of ConSept and SAX T1 mapping showed high conformity in the discrimination between healthy and diseased myocardium (Kappa = 0.844).
tgt: Patienten mit LGE+ und LGE- zeigten jedoch unabhängig vom verwendeten Messansatz (ConSept/SAX) (p  >  0,05) keine signifikanten Unterschiede in den T1- und T2-Relaxationszeiten. Der direkte Vergleich von ConSept- und SAX-T1-Mapping zeigte eine hohe Übereinstimmung in der Unterscheidung zwischen gesundem und erkranktem Myokard (Kappa  =  0,844).
atomic_facts: ['LGE+ patients showed no significant differences in T1 and T2 relaxation times regardless of the measurement approach used (ConSept/SAX) (p > 0.05).', 'LGE- patients showed no significant differences in T1 and T2 relaxation times regardless of the measurement approach used (ConSept/SAX) (p > 0.05).', 'Direct comparison of ConSept and SAX T1 mapping showed high conformity in the discrimination between healthy and diseased myocardium (Kappa = 0.844).']
bt_tgt: However, patients with LGE+ and LGE- showed no significant differences in the T1 and T2 relaxation times regardless of the measurement approach used (ConSept/SAX) (p > 0.05). The direct comparison of ConSept and SAX-T1 mapping showed a high level of agreement in distinguishing between healthy and diseased myocardium (kappa = 0.844).

src: T1 and T2 mapping may not only enable noninvasive recognition of cardiac involvement in patients with systemic sarcoidosis but may also serve as a marker for early cardiac involvement of the disease allowing for timely treatment.
tgt: Das T1- und T2-Mapping ermöglicht möglicherweise nicht nur die nichtinvasive Erkennung einer kardialen Beteiligung bei Patienten mit systemischer Sarkoidose, sondern kann auch als Marker für eine frühe kardiale Beteiligung der Krankheit dienen, was eine rechtzeitige Behandlung ermöglicht.
atomic_facts: ['T1 mapping may enable noninvasive recognition of cardiac involvement in patients with systemic sarcoidosis.', 'T2 mapping may enable noninvasive recognition of cardiac involvement in patients with systemic sarcoidosis.', 'T1 mapping may serve as a marker for early cardiac involvement of the disease allowing for timely treatment.', 'T2 mapping may serve as a marker for early cardiac involvement of the disease allowing for timely treatment.']
bt_tgt: T1 and T2 mapping may not only enable noninvasive detection of cardiac involvement in patients with systemic sarcoidosis, but also may serve as a marker of early cardiac involvement of the disease, allowing timely treatment.

src: ConSept T1 mapping represents an equivalent method for tissue characterization in this population compared to the SAX approach.
tgt: Das ConSept-T1-Mapping stellt in dieser Population im Vergleich zur SAX-Methode eine gleichwertige Methode zur Gewebecharakterisierung dar.
atomic_facts: ['ConSept T1 mapping represents an equivalent method for tissue characterization in this population compared to the SAX approach.']
bt_tgt: In this population, ConSept-T1 mapping represents an equivalent method for tissue characterization compared to the SAX method.

src: Further studies including follow-up examinations are necessary to confirm these preliminary results.
tgt: Weitere Studien einschließlich Nachuntersuchungen sind notwendig, um diese vorläufigen Ergebnisse zu bestätigen.
atomic_facts: ['Further studies are necessary to confirm these preliminary results.', 'Follow-up examinations are necessary to confirm these preliminary results.']
bt_tgt: Further studies including follow-up are necessary to confirm these preliminary results.

src: · Mapping may serve as a marker for early cardiac involvement in patients with systemic sarcoidosis.

atomic_facts: ['Mapping may serve as a marker for early cardiac involvement in patients with systemic sarcoidosis.']
bt_tgt: · Mapping may serve as a marker for early cardiac involvement in patients with systemic sarcoidosis.

src: · The ConSept approach can be used as an alternative measuring method in sarcoidosis patients.
tgt: · Der ConSept-Ansatz kann als alternatives Messverfahren bei Sarkoidose-Patienten eingesetzt werden.

bt_tgt: · The ConSept approach can be used as an alternative measurement method in sarcoidosis patients.

src: The article considers the COVID-19 pandemic impact on the population mental health, the main psychogenic and somatogenic mental disorders associated with COVID-19 are distinguished.
tgt: В статье рассматривается влияние пандемии COVID-19 на психическое здоровье населения, выделяются основные психогенные и соматогенные психические расстройства, связанные с COVID-19.
ref: В статье рассмотрено влияние пандемии COVID-19 на психическое здоровье населения и выделены основные психогенные и соматогенные психические расстройства, ассоциируемые с COVID-19.
В статье рассмотрено влияние пандемии COVID-19 на психическое здоровье населения и выделены основные психогенные и соматогенные психические расстройства, ассоциируемые с COVID-19.
atomic_facts: ['The article considers the COVID-19 pandemic impact on the population mental health.', 'The main psychogenic mental disorders are distinguished.', 'The main somatogenic mental disorders are distinguished.']
bt_tgt: The article examines the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on the mental health of the population, highlighting the main psychogenic and somatogenic mental disorders associated with COVID-19.

src: The psychotherapeutic and psychopharmaceutical approaches are proposed.

src: However, despite successful use of lithium in the treatment of affective disorders for almost 40 years, the mechanisms of its therapeutic action are still poorly understood.
tgt: Однако, несмотря на успешное применение лития при лечении аффективных расстройств в течение почти 40 лет, механизмы его терапевтического действия до сих пор недостаточно изучены.
ref: Однако, несмотря на успешное применение лития в лечении аффективных расстройств в течение почти 40 лет, механизмы его терапевтического действия до сих пор плохо изучены.
Однако, несмотря на успешное применение лития в лечении аффективных расстройств в течение почти 40 лет, механизмы его терапевтического действия до сих пор плохо изучены.
atomic_facts: ['Successful use of lithium in the treatment of affective disorders has been ongoing for almost 40 years.', 'The mechanisms of lithium's therapeutic action are still poorly understood.']
bt_tgt: However, despite the successful use of lithium in the treatment of mood disorders for almost 40 years, the mechanisms of its therapeutic action are still poorly understood.

src: Inducing of pathological autoimmune response contributes to the development of Miller Fischer and Guillain-Barré syndrome.
tgt: Индуцирование патологического аутоиммунного ответа способствует развитию синдрома Миллера Фишера и Гийена-Барре.

src: Novel coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 and COVID-19, besides affecting the respiratory system, may lead to central and peripheral nervous system disorders and also cause muscular symptoms.
tgt: Новый коронавирус SARS-CoV-2 и COVID-19, помимо воздействия на дыхательную систему, может привести к заболеваниям центральной и периферической нервной системы, а также вызвать мышечные симптомы.
ref: Новый коронавирус SARS-CoV-2 и COVID-19, помимо воздействия на дыхательную систему, могут приводить к нарушениям центральной и периферической нервной системы, а также вызывать мышечные симптомы.
Новый коронавирус SARS-CoV-2 и COVID-19, помимо воздействия на дыхательную систему, могут приводить к нарушениям центральной и периферической нервной системы, а также вызывать мышечные симптомы.
atomic_facts: ['Novel coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 and COVID-19 may lead to central nervous system disorders.', 'Novel coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 and COVID-19 may lead to peripheral nervous system disorders.', 'Novel coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 and COVID-19 may cause muscular symptoms.']
bt_tgt: The new coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 and COVID-19, in addition to affecting the respiratory system, can lead to diseases of the central and peripheral nervous system, as well as muscle symptoms.

src: There is a correlation between the severity of COVID-19 and the severity and frequency of neurologic complications.

src: Severe neurologic symptoms are primarily observed in patients with severe COVID-19.

src: Neurologic-associated symptoms may include stroke, acute necrotizing encephalopathy, and Guillen-Barre syndrome.
tgt: Неврологические симптомы могут включать инсульт, острую некротизирующую энцефалопатию и синдром Гийена-Барре.

src: Diseases that potentially aggravate COVID-19 and increase the risk of neurologic complications include arterial hypertension, diabetes, chronic diseases of the heart and respiratory system.
tgt: Заболевания, которые потенциально усугубляют COVID-19 и повышают риск неврологических осложнений, включают артериальную гипертензию, диабет, хронические заболевания сердца и дыхательной системы.
ref: Заболевания, которые потенциально усугубляют течение COVID-19 и повышают риск неврологических осложнений, включают артериальную гипертензию, диабет, хронические заболевания сердца и дыхательной системы.
Заболевания, которые потенциально усугубляют COVID-19 и повышают риск неврологических осложнений, включают артериальную гипертензию, диабет, хронические заболевания сердца и дыхательной системы.
atomic_facts: ['Diseases potentially aggravate COVID-19.', 'Diseases increase the risk of neurologic complications.', 'Diseases include arterial hypertension.', 'Diseases include diabetes.', 'Diseases include chronic diseases of the heart.', 'Diseases include chronic diseases of the respiratory system.']
bt_tgt: Conditions that potentially worsen COVID-19 and increase the risk of neurological complications include hypertension, diabetes, and chronic heart and respiratory disease.

src: New prospects associated with the use of laser radiation of different wavelengths in the ultraviolet (365 nm) and the green emission spectrum (525 nm) have appeared in recent years.
tgt: В последние годы появились новые перспективы, связанные с использованием лазерного излучения различных длин волн в ультрафиолетовом (365 нм) и зеленом спектре излучения (525 нм).
ref: В последние годы появились новые перспективы, связанные с использованием лазерного излучения разных длин волн в ультрафиолетовом диапазоне (365 нм) и зеленом спектре излучения (525 нм).
В последние годы появились новые перспективы, связанные с использованием лазерного излучения разных длин волн в ультрафиолетовом (365 нм) и зеленом спектре излучения (525 нм).

bt_tgt: In recent years, new prospects have emerged related to the use of laser radiation of various wavelengths in the ultraviolet (365 nm) and green radiation spectrum (525 nm).

src: Development and scientific justification for the low-intensity laser radiation of different wavelengths combined use in patients with trophic leg ulcers and chronic venous insufficiency (CVI). 102 patients with trophic leg ulcers and CVI were examined.
tgt: Разработка и научное обоснование низкоинтенсивного лазерного излучения различных длин волн при комбинированном применении у пациентов с трофическими язвами нижних конечностей и хронической венозной недостаточностью (ХВН). Обследовано 102 пациента с трофическими язвами нижних конечностей и ХВН.
ref: Разработка и научное обоснование комбинированного применения низкоинтенсивного лазерного излучения разных длин волн у пациентов с трофическими язвами нижних конечностей на фоне хронической венозной недостаточности (ХВН). Обследованы 102 пациента с трофическими язвами нижних конечностей на фоне ХВН.

Разработка и научное обоснование комбинированного применения низкоинтенсивного лазерного излучения разных длин волн у пациентов с трофическими язвами нижних конечностей на фоне хронической венозной недостаточности (ХВН). Обследованы 102 пациента с трофическими язвами нижних конечностей на фоне ХВН.
atomic_facts: ['Development and scientific justification for the low-intensity laser radiation of different wavelengths combined use in patients with trophic leg ulcers and chronic venous insufficiency (CVI).', '102 patients with trophic leg ulcers and CVI were examined.']
bt_tgt: Development and scientific substantiation of low-intensity laser radiation of various wavelengths for combined use in patients with trophic ulcers of the lower extremities and chronic venous insufficiency (CVI). 102 patients with trophic ulcers of the lower extremities and CVI were examined.

src: The most pronounced lung changes in COVID-19 were determined with a predominance of multiple total bilateral lesions of the lower lobes of the lungs, which was manifested by virus-induced changes in the parenchyma and stroma, as well as by microcirculation disorders.
tgt: Наиболее выраженные изменения в легких при COVID-19 были определены с преобладанием множественных общих двусторонних поражений нижних долей легких, что проявлялось вирус-индуцированными изменениями паренхимы и стромы, а также нарушениями микроциркуляции.
ref: Наиболее выраженные изменения в легких при COVID-19 определялись с преобладанием множественных общих двусторонних поражений нижних долей легких, что проявлялось вирусноиндуцированными изменениями паренхимы и стромы, а также нарушениями микроциркуляции.

Наиболее выраженные изменения в легких при COVID-19 определялись с преобладанием множественных общих двусторонних поражений нижних долей легких, что проявлялось вирусноиндуцированными изменениями паренхимы и стромы, а также нарушениями микроциркуляции.

src: Almost all post-COVID-19 patients complain of severe fatigue, emotional lability, and sometimes have features of asthenic-neurotic, anxiety-phobic disorders and apato-abulic syndromes, which require rehabilitation measures, as well as courses of restorative neurotrophic and nootropic therapy.

src: This article deals with the bibliographic information relating to the Saratov period of life of Alexander Nikolayevich Bakulev, his scientific and practical activity at the Department of Hospital Surgery of the Saratov Medical University under the leadership of the Department's founder, Sergey Ivanovich Spasokukotsky having exerted the key influence on the formation of A.N. В статье рассматриваются библиографические сведения о саратовском периоде жизни Александра Николаевича Бакулева, его научно-практической деятельности на кафедре госпитальной хирургии Саратовского медицинского университета под руководством основателя кафедры Сергея Ивановича Спасокукоцкого, оказавшей ключевое влияние на становление А.Н. Бакулева как хирурга и ученого.
atomic_facts: ['This article deals with the bibliographic information relating to the Saratov period of life of Alexander Nikolayevich Bakulev.', 'His scientific and practical activity took place at the Department of Hospital Surgery of the Saratov Medical University.', 'The Department was under the leadership of its founder, Sergey Ivanovich Spasokukotsky.', "Sergey Ivanovich Spasokukotsky exerted the key influence on the formation of A.N. Bakulev as a surgeon and scientist."]
bt_tgt: This article presents bibliographic information relating to the Saratov period of the life of Alexander Nikolaevich Bakulev, his scientific and practical activities at the Department of Hospital Surgery of the Saratov Medical University under the leadership of the founder of the department Sergei Ivanovich Spasokukotsky, who had a key influence on the formation of A.N. Bakulev as a surgeon and scientist.

src: The most pronounced lung changes in COVID-19 were determined with a predominance of multiple total bilateral lesions of the lower lobes of the lungs, which was manifested by virus-induced changes in the parenchyma and stroma, as well as by microcirculation disorders.
tgt: Наиболее выраженные изменения легких при COVID-19 определялись с преобладанием множественных тотальных двусторонних поражений нижних долей легких, что проявлялось вирус-индуцированными изменениями паренхимы и стромы, а также нарушениями микроциркуляции.
ref: Наиболее выраженные изменения в легких при COVID-19 определялись с преобладанием множественных общих двусторонних поражений нижних долей легких, что проявлялось вирусноиндуцированными изменениями паренхимы и стромы, а также нарушениями микроциркуляции.

Наиболее выраженные изменения в легких при COVID-19 определялись с преобладанием множественных общих двусторонних поражений нижних долей легких, что проявлялось вирусноиндуцированными изменениями паренхимы и стромы, а также нарушениями микроциркуляции.

bt_tgt: The most pronounced changes in the lungs during COVID-19 were determined by the predominance of multiple total bilateral lesions of the lower lobes of the lungs, which was manifested by virus-induced changes in the parenchyma and stroma, as well as microcirculation disorders.

src: The changes in different organs of those who have died from the new coronavirus COVID-19 infection are stereotyped and include the manifestations of virus-induced action and a systemic inflammatory response with mainly microvasculature alteration, which leads to the development of coagulopathies and, accordingly, to total hypoxia.
tgt: Изменения в различных органах у умерших от новой коронавирусной инфекции COVID-19 стереотипны и включают проявления вирус-индуцированного действия и системного воспалительного ответа с преимущественно микрососудистым изменением, что приводит к развитию коагулопатий и, соответственно, к тотальной гипоксии.
ref: Изменения в различных органах умерших от новой коронавирусной инфекции COVID-19 носят стереотипный характер и включают в себя проявления вирусиндуцированного действия и системного воспалительного ответа с преимущественно микроциркуляторным изменением, что приводит к развитию коагулопатий и, соответственно, к тотальной гипоксии.

atomic_facts: ['The changes in different organs of those who have died from the new coronavirus COVID-19 infection are stereotyped.', 'The changes include the manifestations of virus-induced action.', 'The changes include a systemic inflammatory response with mainly microvasculature alteration.', 'The alterations lead to the development of coagulopathies.', 'The alterations lead to total hypoxia.']
bt_tgt: Changes in various organs in those who died from the new coronavirus infection COVID-19 are stereotypical and include manifestations of a virus-induced action and a systemic inflammatory response with predominantly microvascular changes, which leads to the development of coagulopathies and, accordingly, total hypoxia.

src: However, despite successful use of lithium in the treatment of affective disorders for almost 40 years, the mechanisms of its therapeutic action are still poorly understood.
tgt: Однако, несмотря на успешное применение лития для лечения аффективных расстройств в течение почти 40 лет, механизмы его терапевтического действия до сих пор плохо изучены.
ref: Однако, несмотря на успешное применение лития в лечении аффективных расстройств в течение почти 40 лет, механизмы его терапевтического действия до сих пор плохо изучены.
Однако, несмотря на успешное применение лития в лечении аффективных расстройств в течение почти 40 лет, механизмы его терапевтического действия до сих пор плохо изучены.
atomic_facts: ['Despite successful use of lithium in the treatment of affective disorders for almost 40 years, the mechanisms of its therapeutic action are still poorly understood.']
bt_tgt: However, despite the successful use of lithium for the treatment of mood disorders for almost 40 years, the mechanisms of its therapeutic action are still poorly understood.

src: The number of COVID-19 patients is increasing worldwide and the number of patients with neurological manifestations of a new coronavirus infection is increasing as well.
tgt: Количество пациентов с COVID-19 растет во всем мире, а также растет число пациентов с неврологическими проявлениями новой коронавирусной инфекции.
ref: Во всем мире растет число пациентов с COVID-19, а также увеличивается число пациентов с неврологическими проявлениями новой коронавирусной инфекции.
Во всем мире растет число пациентов с COVID-19, а также увеличивается число пациентов с неврологическими проявлениями новой коронавирусной инфекции.
atomic_facts: ['The number of COVID-19 patients is increasing worldwide.', 'The number of patients with neurological manifestations of a new coronavirus infection is increasing as well.']
bt_tgt: The number of patients with COVID-19 is growing around the world, and the number of patients with neurological manifestations of the new coronavirus infection is also growing.

src: Inducing of pathological autoimmune response contributes to the development of Miller Fischer and Guillain-Barré syndrome.
tgt: Индукция патологического аутоиммунного ответа способствует развитию синдрома Миллера Фишера и Гийена-Барре.
ref: Индуцирование патологического аутоиммунного ответа способствует развитию синдрома Миллера — Фишера и Гийена — Барре.
Индуцирование патологического аутоиммунного ответа способствует развитию синдрома Миллера-Фишера и Гийена-Барре.

bt_tgt: The induction of a pathological autoimmune response contributes to the development of Miller Fisher and Guillain-Barré syndrome.

src: Almost all post-COVID-19 patients complain of severe fatigue, emotional lability, and sometimes have features of asthenic-neurotic, anxiety-phobic disorders and apato-abulic syndromes, which require rehabilitation measures, as well as courses of restorative neurotrophic and nootropic therapy.
tgt: Почти все пациенты после COVID-19 жалуются на сильную усталость, эмоциональную лабильность, а иногда имеют признаки астенико-нейротических, тревожно-фобных расстройств и апато-абулических синдромов, которые требуют мер реабилитации, а также курсов восстановительной нейротрофической и ноотропной терапии.
ref: Почти все пациенты, перенесшие COVID-19, жалуются на сильную усталость, эмоциональную лабильность, а иногда имеют признаки астено-невротических, тревожно-фобических расстройств и апато-абулического синдрома, требующих реабилитационных мероприятий, а также курсов восстановительной нейротрофической и ноотропной терапии.

Почти все пациенты, перенесшие COVID-19, жалуются на сильную усталость, эмоциональную лабильность, а иногда имеют признаки астено-невротических, тревожно-фобических расстройств и апато-абулического синдрома, требующих реабилитационных мероприятий, а также курсов восстановительной нейротрофической и ноотропной терапии.
atomic_facts: ['Almost all post-COVID-19 patients complain of severe fatigue.', 'Almost all post-COVID-19 patients complain of emotional lability.', 'Almost all post-COVID-19 patients sometimes have features of asthenic-neurotic, anxiety-phobic disorders and apato-abulic syndromes.', 'The features require rehabilitation measures.', 'The features require courses of restorative neurotrophic and nootropic therapy.']
bt_tgt: Almost all patients after COVID-19 complain of severe fatigue, emotional lability, and sometimes have signs of asthenic-neurotic, anxiety-phobic disorders and apatho-abulic syndromes, which require rehabilitation measures, as well as courses of restorative neurotrophic and nootropic therapy.

src: Novel coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 and COVID-19, besides affecting the respiratory system, may lead to central and peripheral nervous system disorders and also cause muscular symptoms.
tgt: Новый коронавирус SARS-CoV-2 и COVID-19, помимо воздействия на дыхательную систему, может привести к расстройствам центральной и периферической нервной системы, а также вызывать мышечные симптомы.
ref: Новый коронавирус SARS-CoV-2 и COVID-19, помимо воздействия на дыхательную систему, могут приводить к нарушениям центральной и периферической нервной системы, а также вызывать мышечные симптомы.
Новый коронавирус SARS-CoV-2 и COVID-19, помимо воздействия на дыхательную систему, могут приводить к нарушениям центральной и периферической нервной системы, а также вызывать мышечные симптомы.
atomic_facts: ['Novel coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 may lead to central nervous system disorders.', 'Novel coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 may lead to peripheral nervous system disorders.', 'Novel coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 may cause muscular symptoms.', 'COVID-19 may lead to central nervous system disorders.', 'COVID-19 may lead to peripheral nervous system disorders.', 'COVID-19 may cause muscular symptoms.', 'Novel coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 besides affecting the respiratory system may lead to central nervous system disorders.', 'Novel coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 besides affecting the respiratory system may lead to peripheral nervous system disorders.', 'Novel coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 besides affecting the respiratory system may cause muscular symptoms.', 'COVID-19 besides affecting the respiratory system may lead to central nervous system disorders.', 'COVID-19 besides affecting the respiratory system may lead to peripheral nervous system disorders.', 'COVID-19 besides affecting the respiratory system may cause muscular symptoms.']
bt_tgt: The new coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 and COVID-19, in addition to affecting the respiratory system, can lead to disorders of the central and peripheral nervous system and also cause muscle symptoms.

src: There is a correlation between the severity of COVID-19 and the severity and frequency of neurologic complications.
tgt: Существует корреляция между тяжестью COVID-19 и тяжестью и частотой неврологических осложнений.
ref: Существует корреляция между тяжестью COVID-19 и степенью и частотой неврологических осложнений.
Существует корреляция между тяжестью COVID-19 и степенью и частотой неврологических осложнений.
atomic_facts: ['There is a correlation between the severity of COVID-19 and the severity of neurologic complications.', 'There is a correlation between the severity of COVID-19 and the frequency of neurologic complications.']
bt_tgt: There is a correlation between the severity of COVID-19 and the severity and incidence of neurological complications.

src: Severe neurologic symptoms are primarily observed in patients with severe COVID-19.
tgt: Тяжелые неврологические симптомы наблюдаются в основном у пациентов с тяжелой формой COVID-19.
ref: Серьезные неврологические симптомы в первую очередь наблюдаются у пациентов с тяжелым течением COVID-19.
Серьезные неврологические симптомы в первую очередь наблюдаются у пациентов с тяжелым течением COVID-19.
atomic_facts: ['Severe neurologic symptoms are primarily observed in patients with severe COVID-19.']
bt_tgt: Severe neurological symptoms are observed mainly in patients with severe COVID-19.

src: Neurologic-associated symptoms may include stroke, acute necrotizing encephalopathy, and Guillen-Barre syndrome.
tgt: Нейрологически-ассоциированные симптомы могут включать инсульт, острую некротизирующую энцефалопатию и синдром Гийена-Барре.
ref: Неврологические симптомы могут включать инсульт, острую некротизирующую энцефалопатию и синдром Гийена — Барре.
Неврологические симптомы могут включать инсульт, острую некротизирующую энцефалопатию и синдром Гийена-Барре.
atomic_facts: ['Neurologic-associated symptoms may include stroke.', 'Neurologic-associated symptoms may include acute necrotizing encephalopathy.', 'Neurologic-associated symptoms may include Guillen-Barre syndrome.']
bt_tgt: Neurologically associated symptoms may include stroke, acute necrotizing encephalopathy, and Guillain-Barré syndrome.

src: Diseases that potentially aggravate COVID-19 and increase the risk of neurologic complications include arterial hypertension, diabetes, chronic diseases of the heart and respiratory system.
tgt: Заболевания, которые потенциально усугубляют COVID-19 и повышают риск неврологических осложнений, включают артериальную гипертензию, диабет, хронические заболевания сердца и дыхательной системы.
ref: Заболевания, которые потенциально усугубляют течение COVID-19 и повышают риск неврологических осложнений, включают артериальную гипертензию, диабет, хронические заболевания сердца и дыхательной системы.
Заболевания, которые потенциально усугубляют COVID-19 и повышают риск неврологических осложнений, включают артериальную гипертензию, диабет, хронические заболевания сердца и дыхательной системы.
atomic_facts: ['Diseases potentially aggravate COVID-19.', 'Diseases increase the risk of neurologic complications.', 'Diseases include arterial hypertension.', 'Diseases include diabetes.', 'Diseases include chronic diseases of the heart.', 'Diseases include chronic diseases of the respiratory system.']
bt_tgt: Conditions that potentially worsen COVID-19 and increase the risk of neurological complications include hypertension, diabetes, and chronic heart and respiratory disease.

src: The probable impact of human coronaviruses on chronic and progressive diseases of the nervous system with particular respect to multiple sclerosis is reviewed.
tgt: Рассматривается вероятное влияние коронавирусов человека на хронические и прогрессирующие заболевания нервной системы, в частности, на рассеянный склероз.
ref: Рассмотрено вероятное влияние коронавирусов человека на хронические и прогрессирующие заболевания нервной системы, в частности на примере рассеянного склероза.
Рассмотрено вероятное влияние коронавирусов человека на хронические и прогрессирующие заболевания нервной системы, особенно в отношении рассеянного склероза.
atomic_facts: ['The probable impact of human coronaviruses on chronic and progressive diseases of the nervous system is reviewed.', 'The probable impact of human coronaviruses on diseases with particular respect to multiple sclerosis is reviewed.']
bt_tgt: The likely impact of human coronaviruses on chronic and progressive diseases of the nervous system, in particular multiple sclerosis, is considered.

src: A triage plan for stroke and MS patients during the COVID-19 pandemic, depending on the risk of coronavirus infection, is presented.

src: New prospects associated with the use of laser radiation of different wavelengths in the ultraviolet (365 nm) and the green emission spectrum (525 nm) have appeared in recent years.

src: The high prevalence of the trophic leg ulcers necessitates the search for more effective methods of conservative treatment.
tgt: Высокая распространенность трофических язв на ногах требует поиска более эффективных методов консервативного лечения.
ref: Высокая распространенность трофических язв нижних конечностей обуславливает необходимость поиска более эффективных методов консервативного лечения.
Высокая распространенность трофических язв нижних конечностей обуславливает необходимость поиска более эффективных методов консервативного лечения.
atomic_facts: ['The high prevalence of the trophic leg ulcers necessitates the search for more effective methods of conservative treatment.']

src: Development and scientific justification for the low-intensity laser radiation of different wavelengths combined use in patients with trophic leg ulcers and chronic venous insufficiency (CVI). 102 patients with trophic leg ulcers and CVI were examined.
tgt: Разработка и научное обоснование низкоинтенсивного лазерного излучения различных длин волн при совместном применении у пациентов с трофическими язвами на ногах и хронической венозной недостаточностью (ХСН). Было обследовано 102 пациента с трофическими язвами на ногах и ХСН.
ref: Разработка и научное обоснование комбинированного применения низкоинтенсивного лазерного излучения разных длин волн у пациентов с трофическими язвами нижних конечностей на фоне хронической венозной недостаточности (ХВН). Обследованы 102 пациента с трофическими язвами нижних конечностей на фоне ХВН.

Разработка и научное обоснование комбинированного применения низкоинтенсивного лазерного излучения разных длин волн у пациентов с трофическими язвами нижних конечностей на фоне хронической венозной недостаточности (ХВН). Обследованы 102 пациента с трофическими язвами нижних конечностей на фоне ХВН.
atomic_facts: ['Development and scientific justification for the low-intensity laser radiation of different wavelengths combined use in patients with trophic leg ulcers and chronic venous insufficiency.', '102 patients with trophic leg ulcers and chronic venous insufficiency were examined.']
bt_tgt: Development and scientific substantiation of low-intensity laser radiation of various wavelengths when used together in patients with trophic leg ulcers and chronic venous insufficiency (CHF). 102 patients with trophic ulcers on the legs and CHF were examined.

src: A more significant improvement in the clinical condition occurred under the influence of the course application of combined different wavelengths laser therapy in patients with trophic venous leg ulcers.

Более значительное улучшение клинического состояния произошло под воздействием курсового применения комбинированной лазеротерапии разной длины волны у больных с трофическими венозными язвами нижних конечностей.

src: The most pronounced lung changes in COVID-19 were determined with a predominance of multiple total bilateral lesions of the lower lobes of the lungs, which was manifested by virus-induced changes in the parenchyma and stroma, as well as by microcirculation disorders.
tgt: Наиболее выраженные изменения в легких при COVID-19 определялись с преобладанием множественных общих двусторонних поражений нижних долей легких, что проявлялось вирус-индуцированными изменениями в паренхиме и строме, а также нарушениями микроциркуляции.
ref: Наиболее выраженные изменения в легких при COVID-19 определялись с преобладанием множественных общих двусторонних поражений нижних долей легких, что проявлялось вирусноиндуцированными изменениями паренхимы и стромы, а также нарушениями микроциркуляции.

Наиболее выраженные изменения в легких при COVID-19 определялись с преобладанием множественных общих двусторонних поражений нижних долей легких, что проявлялось вирусноиндуцированными изменениями паренхимы и стромы, а также нарушениями микроциркуляции.

src: The most pronounced lung changes in COVID-19 were determined with a predominance of multiple total bilateral lesions of the lower lobes of the lungs, which was manifested by virus-induced changes in the parenchyma and stroma, as well as by microcirculation disorders.
tgt: Наиболее выраженные изменения в легких при COVID-19 определялись с преобладанием множественных тотальных двусторонних поражений нижних долей легких, что проявлялось вирус-индуцированными изменениями паренхимы и стромы, а также нарушениями микроциркуляции.
ref: Наиболее выраженные изменения в легких при COVID-19 определялись с преобладанием множественных общих двусторонних поражений нижних долей легких, что проявлялось вирусноиндуцированными изменениями паренхимы и стромы, а также нарушениями микроциркуляции.

src: The changes in different organs of those who have died from the new coronavirus COVID-19 infection are stereotyped and include the manifestations of virus-induced action and a systemic inflammatory response with mainly microvasculature alteration, which leads to the development of coagulopathies and, accordingly, to total hypoxia.
tgt: Изменения в различных органах тех, кто умер от новой коронавирусной инфекции COVID-19, стереотипны и включают в себя проявления вирус-индуцированного действия и системного воспалительного ответа с преимущественно микрососудистым изменением, что приводит к развитию коагулопатий и, соответственно, к тотальной гипоксии.
ref: Изменения в различных органах умерших от новой коронавирусной инфекции COVID-19 носят стереотипный характер и включают в себя проявления вирусиндуцированного действия и системного воспалительного ответа с преимущественно микроциркуляторным изменением, что приводит к развитию коагулопатий и, соответственно, к тотальной гипоксии.

atomic_facts: ['The changes in different organs of those who have died from the new coronavirus COVID-19 infection are stereotyped.', 'The changes include the manifestations of virus-induced action.', 'The changes include a systemic inflammatory response with mainly microvasculature alteration.', 'The changes lead to the development of coagulopathies.', 'The changes lead to total hypoxia.']
bt_tgt: Changes in various organs of those who died from the new coronavirus infection COVID-19 are stereotypical and include manifestations of a virus-induced action and a systemic inflammatory response with predominantly microvascular changes, which leads to the development of coagulopathies and, accordingly, to total hypoxia.

src: Almost all post-COVID-19 patients complain of severe fatigue, emotional lability, and sometimes have features of asthenic-neurotic, anxiety-phobic disorders and apato-abulic syndromes, which require rehabilitation measures, as well as courses of restorative neurotrophic and nootropic therapy.

src: The use of innovative rehabilitation technologies, namely «thresholdless» low-frequency transcranial magnetic stimulation, will speed up the process of restoring impaired functions, increase independence in everyday life and, accordingly, the quality of life.

bt_tgt: The use of innovative rehabilitation technologies, namely “threshold-free” low-frequency transcranial magnetic stimulation, will speed up the process of restoration of impaired functions, increase independence in everyday life and, accordingly, quality of life.

src: The most pronounced lung changes in COVID-19 were determined with a predominance of multiple total bilateral lesions of the lower lobes of the lungs, which was manifested by virus-induced changes in the parenchyma and stroma, as well as by microcirculation disorders.

src: Severe neurologic symptoms are primarily observed in patients with severe COVID-19.

src: Neurologic-associated symptoms may include stroke, acute necrotizing encephalopathy, and Guillen-Barre syndrome.

src: Diseases that potentially aggravate COVID-19 and increase the risk of neurologic complications include arterial hypertension, diabetes, chronic diseases of the heart and respiratory system.
tgt: Заболевания, которые потенциально усугубляют COVID-19 и повышают риск неврологических осложнений, включают артериальную гипертензию, диабет, хронические заболевания сердца и дыхательной системы.
ref: Заболевания, которые потенциально усугубляют течение COVID-19 и повышают риск неврологических осложнений, включают артериальную гипертензию, диабет, хронические заболевания сердца и дыхательной системы.

atomic_facts: ['Diseases potentially aggravate COVID-19.', 'Diseases increase the risk of neurologic complications.', 'Diseases include arterial hypertension.', 'Diseases include diabetes.', 'Diseases include chronic diseases of the heart.', 'Diseases include chronic diseases of the respiratory system.']

src: The probable impact of human coronaviruses on chronic and progressive diseases of the nervous system with particular respect to multiple sclerosis is reviewed.
tgt: Рассмотрено вероятное влияние коронавирусов человека на хронические и прогрессирующие заболевания нервной системы с особым учетом рассеянного склероза.
ref: Рассмотрено вероятное влияние коронавирусов человека на хронические и прогрессирующие заболевания нервной системы, в частности на примере рассеянного склероза.
Рассмотрено вероятное влияние коронавирусов человека на хронические и прогрессирующие заболевания нервной системы, особенно в отношении рассеянного склероза.
atomic_facts: ['The probable impact of human coronaviruses on chronic and progressive diseases of the nervous system is reviewed.', 'The probable impact of human coronaviruses with particular respect to multiple sclerosis is reviewed.']

src: The high prevalence of the trophic leg ulcers necessitates the search for more effective methods of conservative treatment.

src: Development and scientific justification for the low-intensity laser radiation of different wavelengths combined use in patients with trophic leg ulcers and chronic venous insufficiency (CVI). 102 patients with trophic leg ulcers and CVI were examined.
tgt: Разработка и научное обоснование низкоинтенсивного лазерного излучения различной длины волны комбинированного применения у пациентов с трофическими язвами ног и хронической венозной недостаточностью (ХВН). Обследовано 102 пациента с трофическими язвами ног и ХВН.
ref: Разработка и научное обоснование комбинированного применения низкоинтенсивного лазерного излучения разных длин волн у пациентов с трофическими язвами нижних конечностей на фоне хронической венозной недостаточности (ХВН). Обследованы 102 пациента с трофическими язвами нижних конечностей на фоне ХВН.

Разработка и научное обоснование комбинированного применения низкоинтенсивного лазерного излучения разных длин волн у пациентов с трофическими язвами нижних конечностей на фоне хронической венозной недостаточности (ХВН). Обследованы 102 пациента с трофическими язвами нижних конечностей на фоне ХВН.
atomic_facts: ['Development and scientific justification for the low-intensity laser radiation of different wavelengths combined use in patients with trophic leg ulcers and chronic venous insufficiency.', '102 patients with trophic leg ulcers and CVI were examined.']
bt_tgt: Development and scientific substantiation of low-intensity laser radiation of various wavelengths for combined use in patients with trophic leg ulcers and chronic venous insufficiency (CVI). 102 patients with trophic leg ulcers and CVI were examined.

src: A more significant improvement in the clinical condition occurred under the influence of the course application of combined different wavelengths laser therapy in patients with trophic venous leg ulcers.
tgt: Более значительное улучшение клинического состояния произошло под влиянием курсового применения комбинированной лазеротерапии разной длины волны у больных с трофическими венозными язвами голени.
ref: Более значительное улучшение клинического состояния произошло под воздействием курсового применения комбинированной лазеротерапии разной длины волны у больных с трофическими венозными язвами нижних конечностей.

Более значительное улучшение клинического состояния произошло под воздействием курсового применения комбинированной лазеротерапии разной длины волны у больных с трофическими венозными язвами нижних конечностей.
atomic_facts: ['A more significant improvement in the clinical condition occurred under the influence of the course application of combined different wavelengths laser therapy.', 'Patients with trophic venous leg ulcers received the course application of combined different wavelengths laser therapy.']
bt_tgt: A more significant improvement in the clinical condition occurred under the influence of a course of combined laser therapy of different wavelengths in patients with trophic venous ulcers of the leg.

src: Compared to patients who received traditional conservative therapy and in combination with ILBI 635 nm, the speed of reparative regeneration of trophic ulcers increased, the time for cleansing trophic ulcers from devitalized tissues was reduced.
tgt: По сравнению с пациентами, получавшими традиционную консервативную терапию и в комбинации с ВЛОК 635 нм, увеличивалась скорость репаративной регенерации трофических язв, сокращалось время очищения трофических язв от девитализированных тканей.
ref: По сравнению с пациентами, получавшими традиционную консервативную терапию и в комплексе с ВЛОК 635 нм, увеличивалась скорость репаративной регенерации трофических язв, сокращалось время очищения трофических язв от девитализированных тканей.

По сравнению с пациентами, получавшими традиционную консервативную терапию и в комплексе с ВЛОК 635 нм, увеличивалась скорость репаративной регенерации трофических язв, сокращалось время очищения трофических язв от девитализированных тканей.
atomic_facts: ['The speed of reparative regeneration of trophic ulcers increased.', 'The time for cleansing trophic ulcers from devitalized tissues was reduced.']
bt_tgt: Compared with patients receiving traditional conservative therapy and in combination with ILBI 635 nm, the rate of reparative regeneration of trophic ulcers increased and the time of cleansing trophic ulcers from devitalized tissue decreased.

src: There are two types of ID : 1) absolute ID (AID), in case of decrease in iron reserves and circulating iron, or 2) functional ID (FID), in case of decrease in circulating iron, while reserves are preserved or increased.

ref: Il existe deux types de CF : 1) la CF absolue (CFA), en cas de diminution des réserves de fer et du fer circulant, ou 2) la CF fonctionnelle (CFF), en cas de diminution des réserves de fer circulant, alors que les réserves sont préservées ou augmentées.

Il existe deux types de CF : 1) la CF absolue (CFA), en cas de diminution des réserves de fer et du fer circulant, ou 2) la CF fonctionnelle (CFF), en cas de diminution des réserves de fer circulant, alors que les réserves sont préservées ou augmentées.

ref: Diverses prothèses, notamment corticales, font actuellement l'objet d'essais cliniques pour des neuropathies optiques (glaucome).

bt_tgt: Optogenetic therapy, an alternative strategy, has now reached the stage of clinical trials at the retinal level while progressing at the cortical level.

src: Other innovating strategies have obtained proofs of concepts in rodents but require a further validation in large animals prior to their evaluation on patients.

src: Rhabdomyolysis is defined by myalgia, potentially painful myoedema and muscular weakness due to death of muscular fiber in the striated muscle.
tgt: La rhabdomyolyse est définie par des myalgies, un myoœdème potentiellement douloureux et une faiblesse musculaire due à la mort des fibres musculaires dans le muscle strié.

src: Frequent etiologies include physical effort, intoxication (alcohol, drugs and medication) and physical trauma.

src: The clinical spectrum of rhabdomyolysis includes an asymptomatic increased amount of CK as well as severe, life threatening complications such as acute renal failure and electrolyte disorders.
tgt: Le spectre clinique de la rhabdomyolyse comprend une augmentation asymptomatique de la CK ainsi que des complications graves mettant en jeu le pronostic vital, telles que l’insuffisance rénale aiguë et les troubles électrolytiques.
ref: Le spectre clinique de la rhabdomyolyse comprend une augmentation asymptomatique du taux de CK ainsi que des complications graves, mettant en jeu le pronostic vital, telles que l'insuffisance rénale aiguë et les troubles électrolytiques.

Le spectre clinique de la rhabdomyolyse comprend une augmentation asymptomatique du taux de CK ainsi que des complications graves, mettant en jeu le pronostic vital, telles que l'insuffisance rénale aiguë et les troubles électrolytiques.
atomic_facts: ['The clinical spectrum of rhabdomyolysis includes an asymptomatic increased amount of CK.', 'The clinical spectrum of rhabdomyolysis includes severe, life threatening complications such as acute renal failure.', 'The clinical spectrum of rhabdomyolysis includes severe, life threatening complications such as electrolyte disorders.']
bt_tgt: The clinical spectrum of rhabdomyolysis includes asymptomatic elevation of CK as well as serious life-threatening complications such as acute renal failure and electrolyte disturbances.

src: Between 2010 and 2015, 25 consecutive patients underwent an endoscopic suture with macro-clips to seal a breach resulting from endoscopic perforation, surgical fistula, invasive medical procedure or spontaneous perforation.
tgt: Entre 2010 et 2015, 25 patients consécutifs ont subi une suture endoscopique avec macro-clips pour refermer une brèche résultant d’une perforation endoscopique, d’une fistule chirurgicale, d’une intervention médicale invasive ou d’une perforation spontanée.
ref: Entre 2010 et 2015, 25 patients consécutifs ont subi une suture endoscopique avec des macro-clips afin de sceller une brèche résultant d'une perforation endoscopique, d'une fistule chirurgicale, d'un acte médical invasif ou d'une perforation spontanée.

atomic_facts: ['Between 2010 and 2015, 25 consecutive patients underwent an endoscopic suture with macro-clips to seal a breach resulting from endoscopic perforation.', 'Between 2010 and 2015, 25 consecutive patients underwent an endoscopic suture with macro-clips to seal a breach resulting from surgical fistula.', 'Between 2010 and 2015, 25 consecutive patients underwent an endoscopic suture with macro-clips to seal a breach resulting from invasive medical procedure.', 'Between 2010 and 2015, 25 consecutive patients underwent an endoscopic suture with macro-clips to seal a breach resulting from spontaneous perforation.']
bt_tgt: Between 2010 and 2015, 25 consecutive patients underwent endoscopic suturing with macro-clips to close a breach resulting from an endoscopic perforation, a surgical fistula, an invasive medical procedure or a spontaneous perforation.

src: Iron deficiency (ID) is characterized by a deficit in circulating iron.
tgt: La carence en fer (ID) se caractérise par un déficit en fer circulant.

bt_tgt: Iron deficiency (ID) is characterized by a deficit of circulating iron.

src: There are two types of ID : 1) absolute ID (AID), in case of decrease in iron reserves and circulating iron, or 2) functional ID (FID), in case of decrease in circulating iron, while reserves are preserved or increased.
tgt: Il existe deux types d'ID : 1) l'ID absolu (AID), en cas de diminution des réserves de fer et du fer circulant, ou 2) l'ID fonctionnel (FID), en cas de diminution du fer circulant, tandis que les réserves sont préservées ou augmentées.
ref: Il existe deux types de CF : 1) la CF absolue (CFA), en cas de diminution des réserves de fer et du fer circulant, ou 2) la CF fonctionnelle (CFF), en cas de diminution des réserves de fer circulant, alors que les réserves sont préservées ou augmentées.

Il existe deux types de CF : 1) la CF absolue (CFA), en cas de diminution des réserves de fer et du fer circulant, ou 2) la CF fonctionnelle (CFF), en cas de diminution des réserves de fer circulant, alors que les réserves sont préservées ou augmentées.
atomic_facts: ['There are two types of ID: absolute ID (AID) in case of decrease in iron reserves and circulating iron.', 'There are two types of ID: functional ID (FID) in case of decrease in circulating iron while reserves are preserved or increased.']
bt_tgt: There are two types of DI: 1) absolute DI (AID), when iron stores and circulating iron decrease, or 2) functional DI (FID), when circulating iron decreases, while stores are preserved or increased.

src: The aim of our retrospective study is to analyse the results of endoscopic macro-clips used for closing intestinal breaches in the real life.

src: Between 2010 and 2015, 25 consecutive patients underwent an endoscopic suture with macro-clips to seal a breach resulting from endoscopic perforation, surgical fistula, invasive medical procedure or spontaneous perforation.
tgt: Entre 2010 et 2015, 25 patients consécutifs ont subi une suture endoscopique avec macro-clips pour fermer une brèche résultant d'une perforation endoscopique, d'une fistule chirurgicale, d'un acte médical invasif ou d'une perforation spontanée.
ref: Entre 2010 et 2015, 25 patients consécutifs ont subi une suture endoscopique avec des macro-clips afin de sceller une brèche résultant d'une perforation endoscopique, d'une fistule chirurgicale, d'un acte médical invasif ou d'une perforation spontanée.

Entre 2010 et 2015, 25 patients consécutifs ont subi une suture endoscopique avec des macro clips pour sceller une brèche résultant d'une perforation endoscopique, d'une fistule chirurgicale, d'un acte médical invasif ou d'une perforation spontanée.
atomic_facts: ['Between 2010 and 2015, 25 consecutive patients underwent an endoscopic suture with macro-clips to seal a breach resulting from endoscopic perforation.', 'Between 2010 and 2015, 25 consecutive patients underwent an endoscopic suture with macro-clips to seal a breach resulting from surgical fistula.', 'Between 2010 and 2015, 25 consecutive patients underwent an endoscopic suture with macro-clips to seal a breach resulting from invasive medical procedure.', 'Between 2010 and 2015, 25 consecutive patients underwent an endoscopic suture with macro-clips to seal a breach resulting from spontaneous perforation.']
bt_tgt: Between 2010 and 2015, 25 consecutive patients underwent endoscopic suturing with macro-clips to close a breach resulting from endoscopic perforation, surgical fistula, invasive medical procedure, or spontaneous perforation.

src: None of them required surgery.
tgt: Aucun d'entre eux n'a eu besoin d'opération.

Aucun d'entre eux n'a nécessité d'intervention chirurgicale.
atomic_facts: ['None of them required surgery.']
bt_tgt: None of them needed surgery.

src: Secondary complementary endoscopic treatment was only used in 6/25 patients.

src: Our results confirm the high efficiency of macro-clips in the treatment of endoscopic breaches in a regional hospital center.

src: Two retinal prostheses have already obtained market authorization for patients affected by retinal dystrophies while a new device is in clinical trials for patients affected by age-related macular degeneration.

src: Rhabdomyolysis is defined by myalgia, potentially painful myoedema and muscular weakness due to death of muscular fiber in the striated muscle.

src: The clinical spectrum of rhabdomyolysis includes an asymptomatic increased amount of CK as well as severe, life threatening complications such as acute renal failure and electrolyte disorders.
