src: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that can seriously affect human health.
tgt: 流感病毒感染是一种会严重影响人体健康的呼吸道传染病。
ref: 流感病毒感染是一种呼吸道传染病，会严重影响人类健康。

atomic_facts: ['Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease.', 'Influenza virus infection can seriously affect human health.']
bt_tgt: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that can seriously affect human health.

src: Influenza viruses can have frequent antigenic variation and changes, which can result in rapid and widespread transmission resulting in annual epidemics and outbreaks in places of public gathering such as schools, kindergartens and nursing homes.
tgt: 流感病毒会有频繁的抗原变异和变化，导致快速和广泛的传播，导致每年在学校、幼儿园和疗养院等公共聚集场所流行和爆发。
ref: 流感病毒可发生频繁的抗原变异和变化，这使其快速和广泛的传播，这导致每年在学校、幼儿园和养老院等公共集会场所爆发流行病和疫情。
流感病毒可发生频繁的抗原变异和变化，这使其快速和广泛的传播，导致每年在学校、幼儿园和养老院等公共集会场所爆发流行病和疫情。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza viruses can have frequent antigenic variation.', 'Changes can result in rapid and widespread transmission.', 'Changes can result in annual epidemics and outbreaks.', 'Places of public gathering include schools.', 'Places of public gathering include kindergartens.', 'Places of public gathering include nursing homes.']
bt_tgt: Influenza viruses undergo frequent antigenic mutations and changes, leading to rapid and widespread spread, leading to epidemics and outbreaks in public gathering places such as schools, kindergartens, and nursing homes every year.

src: According to WHO estimation, seasonal influenza epidemics have caused an annually 3 to 5 million severe cases and 290 000 to 650 000 deaths globally.
tgt: 根据世界卫生组织的估计，季节性流感流行病每年在全球造成300万至500万严重病例和29万至65万人死亡。
ref: 根据世卫组织的预估，季节性流感疫情每年在全球产生 300 万 - 500 万严重病例和 29 万 - 65 万死亡病例。
根据世卫组织的预估，季节性流感疫情每年在全球造成 300 万 - 500 万严重病例和 29 万 - 65 万死亡病例。
atomic_facts: ['Seasonal influenza epidemics have caused 3 to 5 million severe cases globally.', 'Seasonal influenza epidemics have caused 290,000 to 650,000 deaths globally.']
bt_tgt: According to World Health Organization estimates, seasonal influenza epidemics cause 3 million to 5 million severe cases and 290,000 to 650,000 deaths globally each year.

src: Pregnant women, young children, the elderly, and persons with chronic illnesses are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.
tgt: 孕妇、幼儿、老年人和慢性病患者面临与流感病毒感染相关的严重疾病和死亡的高风险。
ref: 孕妇、幼儿、老人和慢性病患者是感染流感病毒的高风险人群，他们极有可能感染严重疾病、死亡。
孕妇、幼儿、老人和慢性病患者是感染流感病毒的高风险人群，他们极有可能感染严重疾病和死亡。
atomic_facts: ['Pregnant women are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.', 'Young children are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.', 'The elderly are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.', 'Persons with chronic illnesses are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.']
bt_tgt: Pregnant women, young children, older adults, and people with chronic medical conditions are at high risk for severe illness and death related to influenza virus infection.

src: Especially, COVID-19 pandemic might co-circulate with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza in the coming winter-spring season.
tgt: 特别是，在即将到来的冬春季节，新冠疫情大流行可能与流感等其他呼吸道传染病共同传播。
ref: 特别是，在即将到来的冬春季节，COVID-19 大流行可能会与流感等其他呼吸道传染病共同传播。
特别是，在即将到来的冬春季节，COVID-19 大流行可能会与其他呼吸道传染病如流感等共同传播。
atomic_facts: ['COVID-19 pandemic might co-circulate with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza in the coming winter-spring season.']
bt_tgt: In particular, in the coming winter and spring, the COVID-19 pandemic may be co-circulated with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza.

src: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and complications from infection.
tgt: 季节性流感疫苗接种是预防流感病毒感染和感染并发症的最有效方法。
ref: 季节性流感疫苗接种是预防流感病毒感染和感染并发症的最有效方法。
季节性流感疫苗接种是预防流感病毒感染和感染并发症的最有效方法。
atomic_facts: ['Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection.', 'Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent complications from influenza virus infection.']
bt_tgt: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and infection complications.

src: Except for a few major cities, influenza vaccine is a category Ⅱ vaccine, which means influenza vaccination is voluntary, and recipients must pay for it.
tgt: 除少数大城市外，流感疫苗为Ⅱ类疫苗，这意味着流感疫苗接种是自愿的，接种者必须付费。
ref: 除少数大城市外，流感疫苗属于二类疫苗，即自愿接种流感疫苗，且接种者必须付费。
除少数大城市外，流感疫苗属于 II.类疫苗，即自愿接种流感疫苗，且接种者必须付费。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza vaccine is a category Ⅱ vaccine.', 'Influenza vaccination is voluntary.', 'Recipients must pay for it.']
bt_tgt: Except for a few major cities, the flu vaccine is a Category II vaccine, which means that flu vaccination is voluntary and recipients must pay.

src: In 2018 and 2019, the China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China" .
tgt: 2018年和2019年，中国疾控中心发布了《中国季节性流感疫苗接种技术指南》。
ref: 2018 年和 2019 年，中国疾病预防控制中心发布了《中国流感疫苗预防接种技术指南》。
2018 年和 2019 年，中国疾病预防控制中心发布了《中国流感疫苗预防接种技术指南》。
atomic_facts: ['In 2018, the China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China".', 'In 2019, the China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China".']
bt_tgt: In 2018 and 2019, the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China."

src: In the past year, new research evidences home and abroad have been published, and new seasonal influenza vaccine has been licensed in China.
tgt: 在过去的一年里，国内外新的研究证据已经发表，新的季节性流感疫苗已经在中国获得许可。
ref: 过去一年，国内外陆续发表新的研究证据，我国已批准新型季节性流感疫苗。
过去一年，国内外陆续发表新的研究证据，我国已批准新型季节性流感疫苗。
atomic_facts: ['New research evidences home have been published.', 'New research evidences abroad have been published.', 'New seasonal influenza vaccine has been licensed in China.']
bt_tgt: In the past year, new research evidence at home and abroad has been published, and new seasonal influenza vaccines have been licensed in China.

src: Children aged 6 months through 8 years require 2 doses of influenza vaccine administered a minimum of 4 weeks apart during their first season of vaccination for optimal protection.
tgt: 6个月至8岁的儿童需要在接种疫苗的第一个季节间隔至少4周接种2剂流感疫苗，以获得最佳保护。
ref: 6 个月至 8 岁的儿童需要接种 2 剂流感疫苗，第一剂与第二剂至少间隔 4 周，以获得最佳保护。
6 个月至 8 岁的儿童需要接种 2 剂流感疫苗，第一剂与第二剂至少间隔 4 周，以获得最佳保护。
atomic_facts: ['Children aged 6 months through 8 years require 2 doses of influenza vaccine administered during their first season of vaccination for optimal protection.', 'The doses of influenza vaccine should be administered a minimum of 4 weeks apart for optimal protection.']
bt_tgt: Children 6 months to 8 years old need 2 doses of influenza vaccine at least 4 weeks apart during the first season of vaccination for optimal protection.

src: If they were vaccinated in 2019-2020 influenza season or a prior season, 1 dose is recommended.
tgt: 如果他们在2019-2020年流感季节或前一个季节接种疫苗，建议接种1剂。
ref: 如果他们在 2019-2020 年流感季或前一季已接种疫苗，建议接种 1 剂。
如果他们在 2019-2020 年流感季或前一季已接种疫苗，建议接种 1 剂。
atomic_facts: ['If they were vaccinated in 2019-2020 influenza season, 1 dose is recommended.', 'If they were vaccinated in a prior season, 1 dose is recommended.']
bt_tgt: If they were vaccinated during the 2019-2020 flu season or the previous season, 1 dose is recommended.

src: People more than 8 years old require 1 dose of influenza vaccine.
tgt: 8岁以上的人需要接种1剂流感疫苗。
ref: 8 岁以上人群需要接种 1 剂流感疫苗。
8 岁以上人群需要 1 剂流感疫苗。
atomic_facts: ['People more than 8 years old require 1 dose of influenza vaccine.']
bt_tgt: Anyone over 8 years old needs 1 dose of flu vaccine.

src: It is recommended that people receive their influenza vaccination by the end of October.
tgt: 建议人们在10月底之前接种流感疫苗。
ref: 建议人们在 10 月底前接种流感疫苗。
建议人们在 10 月底前接种流感疫苗。
atomic_facts: ['People are recommended to receive their influenza vaccination by the end of October.']
bt_tgt: It is recommended that people get a flu shot before the end of October.

src: For the people unable to be vaccinated before the end of October, influenza vaccination will continue to be offered for the whole season.
tgt: 对于10月底前无法接种疫苗的人，将继续提供整个季节的流感疫苗接种。
ref: 对于不能在 10 月底前接种疫苗的人，将继续提供整季的流感疫苗接种。
对于不能在 10 月底前接种疫苗的人，将继续提供整季的流感疫苗接种。
atomic_facts: ['For the people unable to be vaccinated before the end of October, influenza vaccination will continue to be offered for the whole season.', 'Influenza vaccination will continue to be offered for the whole season.']
bt_tgt: For those who cannot be vaccinated before the end of October, flu vaccinations will continue to be offered throughout the season.

src: These guidelines are intended for use by staff members of the CDCs at all levels who work on influenza control and prevention, PoVs staff members, healthcare workers from the departments of pediatrics, internal medicine, and infectious diseases, and staff members of maternity and child care institutions at all levels.
tgt: 本指引供各级疾病控制中心从事流感控制和预防工作的工作人员、PoV工作人员、儿科、内科和传染病部门的医务人员以及各级妇幼保健机构的工作人员使用。
ref: 本指南供各级疾病预防控制中心从事流感控制和预防的工作人员、PoV 工作人员、儿科、内科和传染病科的医护人员以及各级妇幼保健机构的工作人员使用。
本指南供各级疾病预防控制中心从事流感控制和预防的工作人员、PoV 工作人员、儿科、内科和传染病科的医护人员以及各级妇幼保健机构的工作人员使用。
atomic_facts: ['These guidelines are intended for use by staff members of the CDCs at all levels.', 'The guidelines are intended for use by PoVs staff members.', 'The guidelines are intended for use by healthcare workers from the departments of pediatrics, internal medicine, and infectious diseases.', 'The guidelines are intended for use by staff members of maternity and child care institutions at all levels.']
bt_tgt: This guideline is intended for use by staff engaged in influenza control and prevention at centers for disease control at all levels, PoV staff, medical staff in pediatrics, internal medicine, and infectious disease departments, and staff in maternal and child health care institutions at all levels.

src: The interference can be discriminated effectively by choosing the suitable chromatographic column and double column confirmatory detection.
tgt: 通过选择合适的色谱柱和双柱验证检测，可以有效地鉴别干扰。
ref: 通过选择合适的色谱柱和双柱确证检测，可以有效地辨别干扰。
通过选择合适的色谱柱和双柱确证检测，可以有效地区分干扰。
atomic_facts: ['The interference can be discriminated effectively by choosing the suitable chromatographic column.', 'The interference can be discriminated effectively by choosing the double column confirmatory detection.']
bt_tgt: Interferences can be effectively identified through appropriate column selection and dual-column verification testing.

src: The clinical data of 27 patients with symptomatic chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures combined with kyphosis treated between June 2015 and June 2017 were retrospectively analysed.
tgt: 回顾性分析2015年6月至2017年6月治疗的27例症状性慢性胸腰椎骨质疏松骨折合并后凸患者的临床资料。
ref: 回顾性分析在 2015 年 6 月至 2017 年 6 月期间治疗的 27 名有症状的慢性胸腰椎骨质疏松性骨折伴脊柱后凸患者的临床数据。
对于在 2015 年 6 月至 2017 年 6 月期间治疗的 27 名有症状的慢性胸腰椎骨质疏松性骨折伴脊柱后凸患者的临床数据进行了回顾性分析。
atomic_facts: ['The clinical data of 27 patients with symptomatic chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures combined with kyphosis were retrospectively analysed.', 'The patients were treated between June 2015 and June 2017.']
bt_tgt: The clinical data of 27 patients with symptomatic chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures and kyphosis who were treated from June 2015 to June 2017 were retrospectively analyzed.

src: Among them, there were 8 males and 19 females, with an average age of 69.5 years (range, 56-81 years).

src: Anti-vascular endothelial growth factors (anti-VEGF) have become the most common treatment modality for many retinal diseases.

bt_tgt: Anti-vascular endothelial growth factor (anti-VEGF) has become the most common treatment modality for many retinal diseases.

src: These include neovascular age-related macular degeneration (n-AMD), proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR) and retinal vein occlusions (RVO).
tgt: 这些包括新生血管年龄相关性黄斑变性 (n-AMD)、增生性糖尿病视网膜病变 (PDR) 和视网膜静脉闭塞 (RVO)。
ref: 这些疾病包括新生血管性年龄相关性黄斑变性 (n-AMD)、增殖性糖尿病视网膜病变 (PDR) 与视网膜静脉阻塞 (RVO)。
此类疾病包括新生血管性年龄相关性黄斑变性 (n-AMD)、增殖性糖尿病视网膜病变 (PDR) 与视网膜静脉阻塞 (RVO)。
atomic_facts: ['These include neovascular age-related macular degeneration (n-AMD).', 'These include proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR).', 'These include retinal vein occlusions (RVO).']
bt_tgt: These include neovascular age-related macular degeneration (n-AMD), proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR), and retinal vein occlusion (RVO).

src: Patients with retinal diseases typically have to undergo multiple injections before achieving the desired therapeutic effect.
tgt: 患有视网膜疾病的患者通常在达到期望的治疗效果之前必须接受多次注射。

患有视网膜疾病的患者通常必须进行多次注射才能实现所需的治疗效果。
atomic_facts: ['Patients with retinal diseases typically have to undergo multiple injections before achieving the desired therapeutic effect.']
bt_tgt: Patients with retinal disease often must receive multiple injections before the desired treatment effect is achieved.

src: Each injection incurs the risk of the sight-threatening complications.

ref: 每次注射都会产生风险，此类风险会出现危及视力的并发症。

atomic_facts: ['Each injection incurs the risk of sight-threatening complications.']

src: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that can seriously affect human health.
tgt: 流感病毒感染是一种可严重影响人类健康的呼吸道传染病。

src: Pregnant women, young children, the elderly, and persons with chronic illnesses are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.

bt_tgt: Pregnant women, young children, older adults, and people with chronic medical conditions are at high risk for severe illness and death related to influenza virus infection.

src: The clinical data of 27 patients with symptomatic chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures combined with kyphosis treated between June 2015 and June 2017 were retrospectively analysed.

src: Parents' gradual loss of control is balanced by attempts to idealize the parent-child relationship and to minimize the severity of the offenses committed.

src: There has been a sharp rise of reported handheld laser-induced maculopathy (HLIM) cases over the past decade, a concerning trend that may continue due to unregulated online access to high power lasers.
tgt: 在过去十年中，报告的手持激光诱发黄斑病变(HLIM)病例急剧增加，由于在线获取高功率激光不受监管，这一令人担忧的趋势可能会持续下去。
ref: 据报道，过去十年中，手持式激光诱导性黄斑病变 (HLIM) 病例急剧上升，由于不受监管的高功率激光器在线访问，这一令人担忧的趋势可能会持续下去。
在过去十年中，报告的手持式激光诱导性黄斑病变 (HLIM) 病例急剧上升，由于不受监管的高功率激光器在线访问，这一令人担忧的趋势可能会持续下去。
atomic_facts: ['There has been a sharp rise of reported handheld laser-induced maculopathy (HLIM) cases over the past decade.', 'A concerning trend that may continue due to unregulated online access to high power lasers.']
bt_tgt: Reported cases of handheld laser-induced macular degeneration (HLIM) have increased dramatically over the past decade, and because online access to high-power lasers is unregulated, this worrying trend is likely to continue.

bt_tgt: Although HLIM has unique clinical features, it is not uncommon and can masquerade as other retinal diseases.

src: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that can seriously affect human health.

流感病毒感染是一种呼吸道传染病，会严重影响人类健康。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease.', 'Influenza virus infection can seriously affect human health.']
bt_tgt: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that seriously affects human health.

src: Influenza viruses can have frequent antigenic variation and changes, which can result in rapid and widespread transmission resulting in annual epidemics and outbreaks in places of public gathering such as schools, kindergartens and nursing homes.
tgt: 流感病毒可具有频繁的抗原变异和变化，可导致快速和广泛的传播，导致每年流行，并在学校、幼儿园和疗养院等公众聚集场所爆发。
ref: 流感病毒可发生频繁的抗原变异和变化，这使其快速和广泛的传播，这导致每年在学校、幼儿园和养老院等公共集会场所爆发流行病和疫情。
流感病毒可发生频繁的抗原变异和变化，这使其快速和广泛的传播，导致每年在学校、幼儿园和养老院等公共集会场所爆发流行病和疫情。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza viruses can have frequent antigenic variation and changes.', 'Influenza viruses can result in rapid and widespread transmission.', 'Influenza viruses can result in annual epidemics and outbreaks in places of public gathering such as schools.', 'Influenza viruses can result in annual epidemics and outbreaks in places of public gathering such as kindergartens.', 'Influenza viruses can result in annual epidemics and outbreaks in places of public gathering such as nursing homes.']
bt_tgt: Influenza viruses can have frequent antigenic mutations and changes that can lead to rapid and widespread transmission, leading to annual epidemics and outbreaks in public gathering places such as schools, kindergartens, and nursing homes.

atomic_facts: ['Pregnant women are at high risk for severe illness associated with influenza virus infection.', 'Young children are at high risk for severe illness associated with influenza virus infection.', 'The elderly are at high risk for severe illness associated with influenza virus infection.', 'Persons with chronic illnesses are at high risk for severe illness associated with influenza virus infection.', 'Pregnant women are at high risk for death associated with influenza virus infection.', 'Young children are at high risk for death associated with influenza virus infection.', 'The elderly are at high risk for death associated with influenza virus infection.', 'Persons with chronic illnesses are at high risk for death associated with influenza virus infection.']
bt_tgt: Pregnant women, young children, older adults, and people with chronic medical conditions are at high risk for severe illness and death related to influenza virus infection.

src: Especially, COVID-19 pandemic might co-circulate with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza in the coming winter-spring season.
tgt: 特别是，在即将到来的冬春季节，COVID-19大流行可能与流感等其他呼吸道传染病共同传播。
ref: 特别是，在即将到来的冬春季节，COVID-19 大流行可能会与流感等其他呼吸道传染病共同传播。
特别是，在即将到来的冬春季节，COVID-19 大流行可能会与其他呼吸道传染病如流感等共同传播。
atomic_facts: ['COVID-19 pandemic might co-circulate with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza in the coming winter-spring season.']
bt_tgt: In particular, in the upcoming winter and spring seasons, the COVID-19 pandemic may co-circulate with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza.

src: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and complications from infection.
tgt: 季节性流感疫苗接种是预防流感病毒感染和感染并发症的最有效方法。
ref: 季节性流感疫苗接种是预防流感病毒感染和感染并发症的最有效方法。
季节性流感疫苗接种是预防流感病毒感染和感染并发症的最有效方法。
atomic_facts: ['Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection.', 'Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent complications from infection.']
bt_tgt: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and infection complications.

src: Except for a few major cities, influenza vaccine is a category Ⅱ vaccine, which means influenza vaccination is voluntary, and recipients must pay for it.
tgt: 除个别大城市外，流感疫苗属于二类疫苗，也就是说流感疫苗是自愿接种的，受种者必须自费。
ref: 除少数大城市外，流感疫苗属于二类疫苗，即自愿接种流感疫苗，且接种者必须付费。
除少数大城市外，流感疫苗属于 II.类疫苗，即自愿接种流感疫苗，且接种者必须付费。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza vaccine is a category Ⅱ vaccine.', 'Influenza vaccination is voluntary.', 'Recipients must pay for influenza vaccination.']
bt_tgt: Except for a few major cities, the influenza vaccine belongs to the second category of vaccines, which means that the influenza vaccine is voluntary and the recipient must pay for it at his own expense.

src: In 2018 and 2019, the China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China" .
tgt: 2018年和2019年，中国疾控中心分别发布了《中国季节性流感疫苗接种技术指南》。
ref: 2018 年和 2019 年，中国疾病预防控制中心发布了《中国流感疫苗预防接种技术指南》。
2018 年和 2019 年，中国疾病预防控制中心发布了《中国流感疫苗预防接种技术指南》。
atomic_facts: ['The China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China" in 2018.', 'The China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China" in 2019.']
bt_tgt: In 2018 and 2019, the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention released the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China".

src: In the past year, new research evidences home and abroad have been published, and new seasonal influenza vaccine has been licensed in China.
tgt: 在过去的一年里，国内外新的研究证据陆续发表，新型季节性流感疫苗在中国获得了许可。
ref: 过去一年，国内外陆续发表新的研究证据，我国已批准新型季节性流感疫苗。
过去一年，国内外陆续发表新的研究证据，我国已批准新型季节性流感疫苗。
atomic_facts: ['New research evidences home have been published.', 'New research evidences abroad have been published.', 'New seasonal influenza vaccine has been licensed in China.']
bt_tgt: In the past year, new research evidence at home and abroad has been published, and a new seasonal influenza vaccine has been licensed in China.

src: To strengthen the technical guidance for prevention and control of influenza and operational research on influenza vaccination in China, the National Immunization Advisory Committee (NIAC) Influenza Vaccination Technical Working Group (TWG), updated the 2019-2020 technical guidelines and compiled the "Technical guidelines for seasonal influenza vaccination in China (2020-2021)" .
tgt: 为加强我国流感防控技术指导和流感疫苗接种业务研究，国家免疫咨询委员会(NIAC)流感疫苗接种技术工作组(TWG)对2019-2020年技术指南进行了更新，编制了《中国季节性流感疫苗接种技术指南(2020-2021)》。
ref: 为了加强中国流感预防和控制的技术指导和流感疫苗接种业务研究，国家免疫咨询委员会 (NIAC) 更新了 2019-2020 年中国流感疫苗预防接种技术指南 (TWG)，并编制了《中国季节性流感疫苗接种技术指南（2020-2021）》。
为了加强中国流感预防和控制的技术指导和流感疫苗接种业务研究，国家免疫咨询委员会 (NIAC) 更新了 2019-2020 年中国流感疫苗预防接种技术指南 (TWG)，并编制了《中国季节性流感疫苗接种技术指南（2020-2021）》。
atomic_facts: ['The National Immunization Advisory Committee (NIAC) Influenza Vaccination Technical Working Group (TWG) updated the 2019-2020 technical guidelines.', 'The National Immunization Advisory Committee (NIAC) Influenza Vaccination Technical Working Group (TWG) compiled the "Technical guidelines for seasonal influenza vaccination in China (2020-2021)".']
bt_tgt: In order to strengthen technical guidance for influenza prevention and control in my country and research on influenza vaccination operations, the National Immunization Advisory Committee (NIAC) Influenza Vaccination Technical Working Group (TWG) updated the 2019-2020 Technical Guidelines and compiled the "China Seasonal Influenza Vaccination Technical Guidelines (2020-2021)".

src: Fifth, Influenza vaccination recommendations for 2020-2021 influenza season.
tgt: 第五，2020-2021年流感季节的流感疫苗接种建议。
ref: 五、2020-2021 年流感季节，流感疫苗接种建议。
五、2020-2021 年，流感季节时流感疫苗接种建议。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza vaccination recommendations are for the 2020-2021 influenza season.', 'Fifth']
bt_tgt: Fifth, influenza vaccination recommendations for the 2020-2021 influenza season.

src: Considering the situation of globally pandemic of COVID-19, to decrease the risk of influenza virus infection and minimize the impact on COVID-19 prevention and control, we recommend the following priority for seasonal influenza vaccination: healthcare workers, including clinical doctors and nurses, public health professionals, quarantine professionals; vulnerable groups living in nursing homes or welfare homes and staffs who take care those vulnerable groups; people work or stay in high population density places, such as teachers and students in kindergartens, primary and secondary school, prisoners and staffs of prisons; other high risk group of influenza, including adults ≥60 years of age, children aged 6-59 months, persons with specific chronic diseases, the family members and caregivers of infants <6 months of age, and pregnant women or women who plan to become pregnant during the influenza season.
tgt: 考虑到COVID-19全球大流行的情况，为了降低流感病毒感染的风险并将对COVID-19防控的影响降至最低，我们建议季节性流感疫苗接种的重点如下：医护人员，包括临床医生和护士，公共卫生专业人员，检疫专业人员；生活在养老院或福利院的弱势群体和照顾这些弱势群体的工作人员；在人口密度高的场所工作或居住的人，如幼儿园、中小学校的教师和学生、服刑人员和监狱工作人员；其他流感高危人群，包括≥60岁的成年人、6-59个月的儿童、患有特定慢性疾病的人、<6个月婴儿的家庭成员和照顾者、孕妇或计划在流感季节怀孕的妇女。
ref: 考虑到全球 COVID-19 大流行的情势，为了降低流感病毒感染的风险，最大限度地减少对 COVID-19 预防和控制的影响，我们建议季节性流感疫苗的优先接种对象如下：医护人员，包括临床医生和护士、公共卫生专业人员、检疫专业人员；生活在养老院或福利院的弱势群体以及照顾这些弱势群体的工作人员；在高人口密度场所工作或停留的人员，如幼儿园、中小学教师和学生、囚犯和监狱工作人员；其他高风险流感群体，包括 60 岁以上的成年人、 6-59 个月的儿童、特定慢性疾病患者、6 个月以下婴儿的家庭成员和照顾者、孕妇及计划在流感季节期间怀孕的女士。

考虑到全球 COVID-19 大流行的情势，为了降低流感病毒感染的风险，最大限度地减少对 COVID-19 预防和控制的影响，我们建议季节性流感疫苗的优先接种对象如下：医护人员，包括临床医生和护士，公共卫生专业人员，检疫专业人员；生活在养老院或福利院的弱势群体以及照顾这些弱势群体的工作人员；在高人口密度场所工作或停留的人员，如幼儿园，中小学的教师和学生，囚犯和监狱工作人员；其他高风险流感群体，包括 60 岁以上的成年人， 6-59 个月的儿童，特定慢性疾病患者， 6 个月以下婴儿的家庭成员和照顾者，孕妇及计划在流感季节期间怀孕的女士。
atomic_facts: ['We recommend the following priority for seasonal influenza vaccination: healthcare workers, including clinical doctors and nurses, public health professionals, quarantine professionals;', 'We recommend the following priority for seasonal influenza vaccination: vulnerable groups living in nursing homes or welfare homes and staffs who take care; people work or stay in high population density places, such as teachers and students in kindergartens, primary and secondary school, prisoners and staffs of prisons;', 'We recommend the following priority for seasonal influenza vaccination: other high risk group of influenza, including adults ≥60 years of age, children aged 6-59 months, persons with specific chronic diseases, the family members and caregivers of infants <6 months of age, and pregnant women or women who plan to become pregnant during the influenza season.']
bt_tgt: Considering the situation of the COVID-19 global pandemic, in order to reduce the risk of influenza virus infection and minimize the impact on COVID-19 prevention and control, we recommend that the focus of seasonal influenza vaccination is as follows: health care workers, including clinicians and nurses, public health professionals, quarantine professionals; vulnerable groups living in nursing homes or welfare homes and caring for these vulnerable groups Workers in groups; people who work or live in places with high population density, such as teachers and students in kindergartens, primary and secondary schools, prisoners and prison staff; other high-risk groups for influenza, including adults ≥60 years old, children 6-59 months old, people with specific chronic diseases, family members and caregivers of infants <6 months old, pregnant women or women who plan to become pregnant during the influenza season.

src: Children aged 6 months through 8 years require 2 doses of influenza vaccine administered a minimum of 4 weeks apart during their first season of vaccination for optimal protection.
tgt: 6个月至8岁的儿童需要在第一个接种季节至少间隔4周接种2剂流感疫苗，以达到最佳保护效果。
ref: 6 个月至 8 岁的儿童需要接种 2 剂流感疫苗，第一剂与第二剂至少间隔 4 周，以获得最佳保护。
6 个月至 8 岁的儿童需要接种 2 剂流感疫苗，第一剂与第二剂至少间隔 4 周，以获得最佳保护。
atomic_facts: ['Children aged 6 months through 8 years require 2 doses of influenza vaccine during their first season of vaccination for optimal protection.', 'The doses of influenza vaccine should be administered a minimum of 4 weeks apart for optimal protection.']
bt_tgt: Children 6 months to 8 years old need to receive 2 doses of influenza vaccine at least 4 weeks apart during the first vaccination season for optimal protection.

src: If they were vaccinated in 2019-2020 influenza season or a prior season, 1 dose is recommended.
tgt: 如果他们在2019-2020年流感季节或之前的流感季节接种过疫苗，建议接种1剂。
ref: 如果他们在 2019-2020 年流感季或前一季已接种疫苗，建议接种 1 剂。
如果他们在 2019-2020 年流感季或前一季已接种疫苗，建议接种 1 剂。
atomic_facts: ['If they were vaccinated in 2019-2020 influenza season, 1 dose is recommended.', 'If they were vaccinated in a prior season, 1 dose is recommended.']
bt_tgt: If they were vaccinated during the 2019-2020 flu season or a previous flu season, 1 dose is recommended.

src: People more than 8 years old require 1 dose of influenza vaccine.
tgt: 8岁以上的人需要接种1剂流感疫苗。
ref: 8 岁以上人群需要接种 1 剂流感疫苗。
8 岁以上人群需要 1 剂流感疫苗。
atomic_facts: ['People more than 8 years old require 1 dose of influenza vaccine.']
bt_tgt: Anyone over 8 years old needs 1 dose of flu vaccine.

src: It is recommended that people receive their influenza vaccination by the end of October.
tgt: 建议人们在10月底之前接种流感疫苗。
ref: 建议人们在 10 月底前接种流感疫苗。
建议人们在 10 月底前接种流感疫苗。
atomic_facts: ['It is recommended that people receive their influenza vaccination by the end of October.']
bt_tgt: It is recommended that people get a flu shot before the end of October.

src: Influenza vaccination should be offered as soon as the vaccination is available.
tgt: 一旦有了流感疫苗，就应提供流感疫苗接种。
ref: 一旦有可接种的流感疫苗，应尽快接种。
一旦有可接种的流感疫苗，就应尽快接种。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza vaccination should be offered as soon as the vaccination is available.']
bt_tgt: Influenza vaccination should be offered once it is available.

src: For the people unable to be vaccinated before the end of October, influenza vaccination will continue to be offered for the whole season.
tgt: 对于无法在10月底前接种流感疫苗的人，将继续提供整个季节的流感疫苗接种。
ref: 对于不能在 10 月底前接种疫苗的人，将继续提供整季的流感疫苗接种。
对于不能在 10 月底前接种疫苗的人，将继续提供整季的流感疫苗接种。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza vaccination will continue to be offered for the whole season.', 'For the people unable to be vaccinated before the end of October, influenza vaccination will be offered.']
bt_tgt: For those who are unable to receive a flu shot by the end of October, flu vaccinations will continue to be offered throughout the season.

src: These guidelines are intended for use by staff members of the CDCs at all levels who work on influenza control and prevention, PoVs staff members, healthcare workers from the departments of pediatrics, internal medicine, and infectious diseases, and staff members of maternity and child care institutions at all levels.
tgt: 本指南供各级疾控中心从事流感防控工作的工作人员、POV工作人员、儿科、内科、传染病科医护人员、各级妇幼保健机构工作人员使用。
ref: 本指南供各级疾病预防控制中心从事流感控制和预防的工作人员、PoV 工作人员、儿科、内科和传染病科的医护人员以及各级妇幼保健机构的工作人员使用。
本指南供各级疾病预防控制中心从事流感控制和预防的工作人员、PoV 工作人员、儿科、内科和传染病科的医护人员以及各级妇幼保健机构的工作人员使用。
atomic_facts: ['These guidelines are intended for use by staff members of the CDCs at all levels who work on influenza control and prevention.', 'The guidelines are intended for use by PoVs staff members.', 'The guidelines are intended for use by healthcare workers from the departments of pediatrics, internal medicine, and infectious diseases.', 'The guidelines are intended for use by staff members of maternity and child care institutions at all levels.']
bt_tgt: This guide is intended for use by staff engaged in influenza prevention and control at centers for disease control and prevention at all levels, POV staff, medical staff in pediatrics, internal medicine, and infectious disease departments, and staff in maternal and child health care institutions at all levels.

src: These guidelines will be updated periodically as new evidence becomes available.
tgt: 随着新证据的出现，这些指南将定期更新。
ref: 这些指南将随着新证据的出现而定期更新。
这些指南将随着新证据的出现而定期更新。

bt_tgt: These guidelines will be updated regularly as new evidence becomes available.

src: The interference can be discriminated effectively by choosing the suitable chromatographic column and double column confirmatory detection.
tgt: 通过选择合适的色谱柱和双柱确证检测，可以有效地鉴别干扰。
ref: 通过选择合适的色谱柱和双柱确证检测，可以有效地辨别干扰。
通过选择合适的色谱柱和双柱确证检测，可以有效地区分干扰。
atomic_facts: ['The interference can be discriminated effectively by choosing the suitable chromatographic column.', 'The interference can be discriminated effectively by choosing double column confirmatory detection.']
bt_tgt: Interferences can be effectively identified through appropriate column selection and dual-column confirmatory testing.

src: There were no complications such as bedsore, hypostatic pneumonia, or deep venous thrombosis.
tgt: 无褥疮、坠积性肺炎、深静脉血栓形成等并发症发生。
ref: 无褥疮、坠积性肺炎、深静脉血栓形成等并发症。
无褥疮、坠积性肺炎、深静脉血栓形成等并发症。
atomic_facts: ['There were no complications such as bedsore.', 'There were no complications such as hypostatic pneumonia.', 'There were no complications such as deep venous thrombosis.']
bt_tgt: There were no complications such as bedsores, pneumonia, or deep vein thrombosis.

src: These include neovascular age-related macular degeneration (n-AMD), proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR) and retinal vein occlusions (RVO).
tgt: 其中包括新生血管年龄相关性黄斑变性（n-AMD）、增生性糖尿病视网膜病变（PDR）和视网膜静脉阻塞（RVO）。
ref: 这些疾病包括新生血管性年龄相关性黄斑变性 (n-AMD)、增殖性糖尿病视网膜病变 (PDR) 与视网膜静脉阻塞 (RVO)。
此类疾病包括新生血管性年龄相关性黄斑变性 (n-AMD)、增殖性糖尿病视网膜病变 (PDR) 与视网膜静脉阻塞 (RVO)。
atomic_facts: ['These include neovascular age-related macular degeneration (n-AMD).', 'These include proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR).', 'These include retinal vein occlusions (RVO).']
bt_tgt: These include neovascular age-related macular degeneration (n-AMD), proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR), and retinal vein occlusion (RVO).

src: Patients with retinal diseases typically have to undergo multiple injections before achieving the desired therapeutic effect.
tgt: 患有视网膜疾病的患者通常要进行多次注射才能达到预期的治疗效果。
ref: 患有视网膜疾病的患者通常必须进行多次注射才能达到预期的治疗效果。
患有视网膜疾病的患者通常必须进行多次注射才能实现所需的治疗效果。
atomic_facts: ['Patients with retinal diseases typically have to undergo multiple injections before achieving the desired therapeutic effect.', 'The desired therapeutic effect is achieved after multiple injections for patients with retinal diseases.']
bt_tgt: Patients with retinal diseases often require multiple injections to achieve the desired therapeutic effect.

src: Each injection incurs the risk of the sight-threatening complications.
tgt: 每次注射都会引起威胁视力的并发症。
ref: 每次注射都会产生风险，此类风险会出现危及视力的并发症。
每次注射都会产生风险，此类风险会导致出现危及视力的并发症。
atomic_facts: ['Each injection incurs the risk of sight-threatening complications.']
bt_tgt: Each injection can cause vision-threatening complications.

src: In recent years, there have been various strategies that have been conceptualised.

src: Technicians and administrators of prosthodontic technology should face up to the problems and seize the opportunities, to improve the level of prosthodontic technology and train the highly educated professionals.
tgt: 口腔修复技术人员和管理者应正视问题，抓住机遇，提高口腔修复技术水平，培养高素质的专业人才。
ref: 口腔修复技术的技术人员与管理人员应正视问题、抓住机遇、提高口腔修复技术水平、培养高素质的专业人才。
atomic_facts: ['Technicians of prosthodontic technology should face up to the problems to improve the level of prosthodontic technology.', 'Technicians of prosthodontic technology should seize the opportunities to train the highly educated professionals.', 'Administrators of prosthodontic technology should face up to the problems to improve the level of prosthodontic technology.', 'Administrators of prosthodontic technology should seize the opportunities to train the highly educated professionals.']
bt_tgt: Dental restoration technicians and managers should face up to the problems, seize opportunities, improve the level of dental restoration technology, and cultivate high-quality professionals.

src: At the same time, attentions should be payed to the advantages of the traditional prosthodontic technology while grasping the development of the digital prosthodontic technology.
tgt: 同时，在把握数字化口腔修复技术发展的同时，要充分发挥传统口腔修复技术的优势。
ref: 在把握数字化口腔修复技术发展机遇的同时，要重视传统口腔修复技术的优势。
atomic_facts: ['Attentions should be payed to the advantages of the traditional prosthodontic technology.', 'Attentions should be payed to grasping the development of the digital prosthodontic technology.']
bt_tgt: At the same time, while grasping the development of digital dental restoration technology, we must give full play to the advantages of traditional dental restoration technology.

src: This article will review the clinical and diagnostic features of laser injury, with a special emphasis on the multimodal retinal findings.
tgt: 本文将回顾激光损伤的临床和诊断特点，特别是多模式视网膜表现。

src: To compare the safety and accuracy of pedicle screw placement assisted by robot system with freehand pedicle screw placement in upper thoracic surgery.
tgt: 比较机器人系统辅助椎弓根螺钉置入术与徒手椎弓根螺钉置入术在上胸科手术中的安全性和准确性。

bt_tgt: To compare the safety and accuracy of robotic system-assisted pedicle screw placement versus freehand pedicle screw placement in upper thoracic surgery.

src: When using KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 gas chromatographic column, the retention time of sevoflurane, isoflurane and ethanol is similar, especially that of sevoflurane and ethanol, and sevoflurane obviously interferes with the determination of ethanol content in blood.
tgt: 采用KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2气相色谱柱时，七氟醚、异氟醚和乙醇的保留时间相近，特别是七氟醚和乙醇的保留时间相近，七氟醚对血液中乙醇含量的测定有明显干扰。
ref: 使用 KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 气相色谱柱时，七氟烷、异氟烷和乙醇的保留时间相似，特别是七氟烷和乙醇的保留时间，七氟烷明显干扰血液中乙醇含量的测定。
使用 KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 气相色谱柱时，七氟烷、异氟烷和乙醇的保留时间相似，特别是七氟烷和乙醇的保留时间，七氟烷明显干扰血液中乙醇含量的测定。
使用 KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 气相色谱柱时，七氟烷、异氟烷和乙醇的保留时间相似，特别是七氟烷和乙醇的保留时间，七氟烷明显干扰血液中乙醇含量的测定。
使用 KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 气相色谱柱时，七氟烷、异氟烷和乙醇的保留时间相似，特别是七氟烷和乙醇的保留时间，七氟烷明显干扰血液中乙醇含量的测定。
atomic_facts: ['When using KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 gas chromatographic column, the retention time of sevoflurane is similar.', 'When using KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 gas chromatographic column, the retention time of isoflurane is similar.', 'When using KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 gas chromatographic column, the retention time of ethanol is similar.', 'Especially, the retention time of sevoflurane is similar to the retention time of ethanol.', 'Sevoflurane obviously interferes with the determination of ethanol content in blood.']
bt_tgt: When using KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 gas chromatography column, the retention times of sevoflurane, isoflurane and ethanol are similar, especially the retention times of sevoflurane and ethanol are similar. Sevoflurane has obvious interference on the determination of ethanol content in blood.

src: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that can seriously affect human health.
tgt: 流感病毒感染是一种严重影响人类健康的呼吸道传染病。
ref: 流感病毒感染是一种呼吸道传染病，会严重影响人类健康。
流感病毒感染是一种呼吸道传染病，会严重影响人类健康。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease.', 'Influenza virus infection can seriously affect human health.']
bt_tgt: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that seriously affects human health.

src: Influenza viruses can have frequent antigenic variation and changes, which can result in rapid and widespread transmission resulting in annual epidemics and outbreaks in places of public gathering such as schools, kindergartens and nursing homes.
tgt: 流感病毒可能具有频繁的抗原变异和变化，从而导致迅速和广泛的传播，导致每年在学校、幼儿园和养老院等公众聚集场所流行和暴发。
ref: 流感病毒可发生频繁的抗原变异和变化，这使其快速和广泛的传播，这导致每年在学校、幼儿园和养老院等公共集会场所爆发流行病和疫情。
流感病毒可发生频繁的抗原变异和变化，这使其快速和广泛的传播，导致每年在学校、幼儿园和养老院等公共集会场所爆发流行病和疫情。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza viruses can have frequent antigenic variation and changes.', 'Frequent antigenic changes in influenza viruses can result in rapid and widespread transmission.', 'Rapid and widespread transmission of influenza viruses can result in annual epidemics.', 'Annual epidemics can occur in places of public gathering such as schools, kindergartens, and nursing homes.', 'Outbreaks of influenza can occur in places of public gathering such as schools, kindergartens, and nursing homes.']
bt_tgt: Influenza viruses may have frequent antigenic mutations and changes, leading to rapid and widespread transmission, leading to annual epidemics and outbreaks in public gathering places such as schools, kindergartens, and nursing homes.

src: Pregnant women, young children, the elderly, and persons with chronic illnesses are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.
tgt: 孕妇、幼儿、老年人和慢性病患者是流感病毒感染导致严重疾病和死亡的高危人群。
ref: 孕妇、幼儿、老人和慢性病患者是感染流感病毒的高风险人群，他们极有可能感染严重疾病、死亡。
孕妇、幼儿、老人和慢性病患者是感染流感病毒的高风险人群，他们极有可能感染严重疾病和死亡。
atomic_facts: ['Pregnant women are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.', 'Young children are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.', 'The elderly are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.', 'Persons with chronic illnesses are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.']
bt_tgt: Pregnant women, young children, the elderly, and people with chronic diseases are at high risk for severe illness and death from influenza virus infection.

src: Especially, COVID-19 pandemic might co-circulate with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza in the coming winter-spring season.
tgt: 尤其是在即将到来的冬春季节，COVID-19大流行可能与流感等其他呼吸道传染病共同传播。
ref: 特别是，在即将到来的冬春季节，COVID-19 大流行可能会与流感等其他呼吸道传染病共同传播。
特别是，在即将到来的冬春季节，COVID-19 大流行可能会与其他呼吸道传染病如流感等共同传播。
atomic_facts: ['COVID-19 pandemic might co-circulate with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza in the coming winter-spring season.']
bt_tgt: Especially in the upcoming winter and spring, the COVID-19 pandemic may co-circulate with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza.

src: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and complications from infection.
tgt: 季节性流感疫苗接种是预防流感病毒感染及感染并发症的最有效方法。
ref: 季节性流感疫苗接种是预防流感病毒感染和感染并发症的最有效方法。
季节性流感疫苗接种是预防流感病毒感染和感染并发症的最有效方法。
atomic_facts: ['Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection.', 'Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent complications from influenza virus infection.']
bt_tgt: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and its complications.

src: In 2018 and 2019, the China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China" .
tgt: 2018年和2019年，中国疾控中心发布了《中国季节性流感疫苗接种技术指南》。
ref: 2018 年和 2019 年，中国疾病预防控制中心发布了《中国流感疫苗预防接种技术指南》。
2018 年和 2019 年，中国疾病预防控制中心发布了《中国流感疫苗预防接种技术指南》。
atomic_facts: ['The China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China" in 2018.', 'The China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China" in 2019.']
bt_tgt: In 2018 and 2019, the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China."

src: In the past year, new research evidences home and abroad have been published, and new seasonal influenza vaccine has been licensed in China.
tgt: 近一年来，国内外新的研究证据陆续发表，新型季节性流感疫苗在我国获得了许可。
ref: 过去一年，国内外陆续发表新的研究证据，我国已批准新型季节性流感疫苗。
过去一年，国内外陆续发表新的研究证据，我国已批准新型季节性流感疫苗。
atomic_facts: ['New research evidences have been published in the past year.', 'New research evidences have been published abroad.', 'A new seasonal influenza vaccine has been licensed in China.']
bt_tgt: In the past year, new research evidence at home and abroad has been published, and a new seasonal influenza vaccine has been licensed in my country.

src: To strengthen the technical guidance for prevention and control of influenza and operational research on influenza vaccination in China, the National Immunization Advisory Committee (NIAC) Influenza Vaccination Technical Working Group (TWG), updated the 2019-2020 technical guidelines and compiled the "Technical guidelines for seasonal influenza vaccination in China (2020-2021)" .
tgt: 为加强我国流感防控技术指导和流感疫苗接种业务研究，国家免疫咨询委员会流感疫苗接种技术工作组，更新了2019-2020年技术指南，编制了《中国季节性流感疫苗接种技术指南（2020-2021）》。
ref: 为了加强中国流感预防和控制的技术指导和流感疫苗接种业务研究，国家免疫咨询委员会 (NIAC) 更新了 2019-2020 年中国流感疫苗预防接种技术指南 (TWG)，并编制了《中国季节性流感疫苗接种技术指南（2020-2021）》。
为了加强中国流感预防和控制的技术指导和流感疫苗接种业务研究，国家免疫咨询委员会 (NIAC) 更新了 2019-2020 年中国流感疫苗预防接种技术指南 (TWG)，并编制了《中国季节性流感疫苗接种技术指南（2020-2021）》。
atomic_facts: ['The National Immunization Advisory Committee (NIAC) Influenza Vaccination Technical Working Group (TWG) updated the 2019-2020 technical guidelines.', 'The National Immunization Advisory Committee (NIAC) Influenza Vaccination Technical Working Group (TWG) compiled the "Technical guidelines for seasonal influenza vaccination in China (2020-2021)" .', 'The National Immunization Advisory Committee (NIAC) Influenza Vaccination Technical Working Group (TWG) strengthened the technical guidance for prevention and control of influenza in China.', 'The National Immunization Advisory Committee (NIAC) Influenza Vaccination Technical Working Group (TWG) conducted operational research on influenza vaccination in China.']
bt_tgt: In order to strengthen technical guidance for influenza prevention and control and research on influenza vaccination operations in my country, the Influenza Vaccination Technical Working Group of the National Advisory Committee on Immunization updated the 2019-2020 technical guidelines and compiled the "China Seasonal Influenza Vaccination Technical Guidelines (2020-2021)".

src: Fifth, Influenza vaccination recommendations for 2020-2021 influenza season.
tgt: 第五，2020-2021流感季节流感疫苗接种建议。
ref: 五、2020-2021 年流感季节，流感疫苗接种建议。
五、2020-2021 年，流感季节时流感疫苗接种建议。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza vaccination recommendations are for the 2020-2021 influenza season.', 'Fifth']
bt_tgt: Fifth, influenza vaccination recommendations for the 2020-2021 influenza season.

src: Children aged 6 months through 8 years require 2 doses of influenza vaccine administered a minimum of 4 weeks apart during their first season of vaccination for optimal protection.
tgt: 6个月至8岁的儿童在第一个接种季节需要至少间隔4周注射2剂流感疫苗，以获得最佳保护。
ref: 6 个月至 8 岁的儿童需要接种 2 剂流感疫苗，第一剂与第二剂至少间隔 4 周，以获得最佳保护。
6 个月至 8 岁的儿童需要接种 2 剂流感疫苗，第一剂与第二剂至少间隔 4 周，以获得最佳保护。
atomic_facts: ['Children aged 6 months through 8 years require 2 doses of influenza vaccine administered during their first season of vaccination.', 'The doses should be given a minimum of 4 weeks apart for optimal protection.']
bt_tgt: Children 6 months to 8 years old need 2 doses of influenza vaccine at least 4 weeks apart during the first vaccination season for optimal protection.

src: People more than 8 years old require 1 dose of influenza vaccine.
tgt: 8岁以上的人需要注射1剂流感疫苗。
ref: 8 岁以上人群需要接种 1 剂流感疫苗。
8 岁以上人群需要 1 剂流感疫苗。
atomic_facts: ['People more than 8 years old require 1 dose of influenza vaccine.']
bt_tgt: People over 8 years old need 1 dose of flu vaccine.

src: It is recommended that people receive their influenza vaccination by the end of October.

ref: 建议人们在 10 月底前接种流感疫苗。
建议人们在 10 月底前接种流感疫苗。
atomic_facts: ['People are recommended to receive their influenza vaccination.', 'The recommended time for receiving the influenza vaccination is by the end of October.']
bt_tgt: It is recommended that people get a flu shot before the end of October.

src: Influenza vaccination should be offered as soon as the vaccination is available.
tgt: 一旦有疫苗接种，就应立即提供流感疫苗接种。
ref: 一旦有可接种的流感疫苗，应尽快接种。
一旦有可接种的流感疫苗，就应尽快接种。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza vaccination should be offered as soon as the vaccination is available.']
bt_tgt: Influenza vaccination should be offered as soon as vaccination is available.

src: These guidelines are intended for use by staff members of the CDCs at all levels who work on influenza control and prevention, PoVs staff members, healthcare workers from the departments of pediatrics, internal medicine, and infectious diseases, and staff members of maternity and child care institutions at all levels.
tgt: 本指南适用于各级疾控中心流感防控工作人员、预防接种人员、儿科、内科、传染科医护人员和各级妇幼保健机构工作人员。
ref: 本指南供各级疾病预防控制中心从事流感控制和预防的工作人员、PoV 工作人员、儿科、内科和传染病科的医护人员以及各级妇幼保健机构的工作人员使用。
本指南供各级疾病预防控制中心从事流感控制和预防的工作人员、PoV 工作人员、儿科、内科和传染病科的医护人员以及各级妇幼保健机构的工作人员使用。
atomic_facts: ['These guidelines are intended for use by staff members of the CDCs at all levels who work on influenza control and prevention.', 'These guidelines are intended for use by PoVs staff members.', 'These guidelines are intended for use by healthcare workers from the departments of pediatrics, internal medicine, and infectious diseases.', 'These guidelines are intended for use by staff members of maternity and child care institutions at all levels.']
bt_tgt: This guideline is applicable to influenza prevention and control staff at centers for disease control and prevention at all levels, vaccinators, medical staff in pediatrics, internal medicine, and infectious diseases departments, and staff in maternal and child health care institutions at all levels.

src: These guidelines will be updated periodically as new evidence becomes available.

这些指南将随着新证据的出现而定期更新。
atomic_facts: ['These guidelines will be updated periodically as new evidence becomes available.', 'New evidence becomes available periodically.']
bt_tgt: These guidelines will be updated regularly as new evidence becomes available.

src: The interference can be discriminated effectively by choosing the suitable chromatographic column and double column confirmatory detection.
tgt: 通过选择合适的色谱柱和双柱确证检测，可以有效地鉴别干扰。

src: The clinical data of 27 patients with symptomatic chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures combined with kyphosis treated between June 2015 and June 2017 were retrospectively analysed.
tgt: 回顾性分析2015年6月至2017年6月27例有症状的慢性胸腰椎骨质疏松性骨折合并后凸畸形患者的临床资料。

对于在 2015 年 6 月至 2017 年 6 月期间治疗的 27 名有症状的慢性胸腰椎骨质疏松性骨折伴脊柱后凸患者的临床数据进行了回顾性分析。
atomic_facts: ['The clinical data of 27 patients with symptomatic chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures combined with kyphosis were retrospectively analysed.', 'The patients were treated between June 2015 and June 2017.']
bt_tgt: The clinical data of 27 patients with symptomatic chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures and kyphosis from June 2015 to June 2017 were retrospectively analyzed.

src: Among them, there were 8 males and 19 females, with an average age of 69.5 years (range, 56-81 years).

src: The incisions healed by first intention in 26 cases, and 1 incision healed after dressing change due to poor blood glucose control.

bt_tgt: Twenty-six cases of incisions healed initially, and 1 case healed after dressing change due to poor blood sugar control.

src: The most feared of these complications is endophthalmitis, a severe infection of the eye with extremely poor visual outcomes.
tgt: 这些并发症中最可怕的是眼内炎，这是一种严重的眼部感染，视力预后极差。

src: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that can seriously affect human health.
tgt: 流感病毒感染是一种严重影响人体健康的呼吸道传染病。
ref: 流感病毒感染是一种呼吸道传染病，会严重影响人类健康。

atomic_facts: ['Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease.', 'Influenza virus infection can seriously affect human health.']
bt_tgt: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that seriously affects human health.

src: Influenza viruses can have frequent antigenic variation and changes, which can result in rapid and widespread transmission resulting in annual epidemics and outbreaks in places of public gathering such as schools, kindergartens and nursing homes.
tgt: 流感病毒可能具有频繁的抗原变异和变化，这可能导致迅速和广泛的传播，导致学校、幼儿园和养老院等公共聚集地的年度流行和暴发。
ref: 流感病毒可发生频繁的抗原变异和变化，这使其快速和广泛的传播，这导致每年在学校、幼儿园和养老院等公共集会场所爆发流行病和疫情。
流感病毒可发生频繁的抗原变异和变化，这使其快速和广泛的传播，导致每年在学校、幼儿园和养老院等公共集会场所爆发流行病和疫情。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza viruses can have frequent antigenic variation.', 'Influenza viruses can have changes.', 'Changes can result in rapid and widespread transmission.', 'Changes can result in annual epidemics.', 'Changes can result in outbreaks in places of public gathering such as schools.', 'Changes can result in outbreaks in places of public gathering such as kindergartens.', 'Changes can result in outbreaks in places of public gathering such as nursing homes.']
bt_tgt: Influenza viruses may have frequent antigenic mutations and changes, which may lead to rapid and widespread transmission, leading to annual epidemics and outbreaks in public gathering places such as schools, kindergartens, and nursing homes.

src: Digital prosthodontic technology has brought great changes to the prosthodontic technology in China by improving the quality of prostheses, adding new types of restorations, changing the manufacturing methods of restorations from handmade to computer-aided manufacturing, bringing new operating models of dental laboratories, and promoting the academic status of the prosthodontic technology.

ref: 数字化修复技术提高修复体质量，增加新的修复体类型，将修复体制造方式从手工制造转变为计算机辅助制造，引入全新的口腔实验室的操作模式及巩固修复技术的学术地位，给中国的修复技术带来巨变。

atomic_facts: ['Digital prosthodontic technology has brought great changes to the prosthodontic technology in China.', 'Digital prosthodontic technology has improved the quality of prostheses.', 'Digital prosthodontic technology has added new types of restorations.', 'Digital prosthodontic technology has changed the manufacturing methods of restorations from handmade to computer-aided manufacturing.', 'Digital prosthodontic technology has brought new operating models of dental laboratories.', 'Digital prosthodontic technology has promoted the academic status of the prosthodontic technology.']

src: Digital prosthodontic technology still has some problems, such as insufficient precision for some manufacturing methods and shortage of professionals.

bt_tgt: There are still some issues with digital prosthodontics, such as the lack of precision in some manufacturing methods and the shortage of professionals.

src: Technicians and administrators of prosthodontic technology should face up to the problems and seize the opportunities, to improve the level of prosthodontic technology and train the highly educated professionals.

bt_tgt: Fifth, influenza vaccination recommendations for the 2020-2021 influenza season.

src: The recommendations described in this report include the following: Points of Vaccination clinics (PoVs) should provide influenza vaccination to all persons aged 6 months and above who are willing to be vaccinated and do not have contraindications.
tgt: 本报告所述的建议包括：接种点诊所（POV）应向所有愿意接种疫苗且无禁忌症的6个月及以上的人提供流感疫苗接种。
ref: 本报告中描述的建议包括以下内容：疫苗接种点诊所 (POV) 应向所有 6 个月及以上愿意接种疫苗、无禁忌症人士提供流感疫苗接种。
本报告中描述的建议包括以下内容：疫苗接种点诊所 (POV) 应向所有 6 个月及以上愿意接种疫苗、无禁忌症的人提供流感疫苗接种。
atomic_facts: ['The recommendations described in this report include the following.', 'Points of Vaccination clinics (PoVs) should provide influenza vaccination to all persons aged 6 months and above.', 'All persons who are willing to be vaccinated and do not have contraindications should receive influenza vaccination.']
bt_tgt: Recommendations described in this report include: Influenza vaccination should be offered at point-of-vaccination clinics (POV) to all persons 6 months of age and older who are willing to be vaccinated and have no contraindications.

src: People more than 8 years old require 1 dose of influenza vaccine.
tgt: 8岁以上的人需要1剂流感疫苗。
ref: 8 岁以上人群需要接种 1 剂流感疫苗。
8 岁以上人群需要 1 剂流感疫苗。
atomic_facts: ['People more than 8 years old require 1 dose of influenza vaccine.']
bt_tgt: Anyone over 8 years old needs 1 dose of flu vaccine.

src: It is recommended that people receive their influenza vaccination by the end of October.
tgt: 建议人们在10月底前接种流感疫苗。
ref: 建议人们在 10 月底前接种流感疫苗。
建议人们在 10 月底前接种流感疫苗。
atomic_facts: ['It is recommended that people receive their influenza vaccination by the end of October.']
bt_tgt: It is recommended that people get a flu shot before the end of October.

src: For the people unable to be vaccinated before the end of October, influenza vaccination will continue to be offered for the whole season.
tgt: 对于10月底以前无法接种疫苗的人，将继续提供全季流感疫苗接种。
ref: 对于不能在 10 月底前接种疫苗的人，将继续提供整季的流感疫苗接种。
对于不能在 10 月底前接种疫苗的人，将继续提供整季的流感疫苗接种。
atomic_facts: ['For the people unable to be vaccinated before the end of October, influenza vaccination will continue to be offered for the whole season.', 'Influenza vaccination will continue to be offered for the whole season.']
bt_tgt: Full-season influenza vaccination will continue to be offered to those who are unable to receive the vaccine before the end of October.

src: These guidelines will be updated periodically as new evidence becomes available.
tgt: 随着新证据的出现，这些指南将定期更新。
ref: 这些指南将随着新证据的出现而定期更新。
这些指南将随着新证据的出现而定期更新。
atomic_facts: ['These guidelines will be updated periodically.', 'New evidence becomes available.']
bt_tgt: These guidelines will be updated regularly as new evidence becomes available.

src: When using KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 gas chromatographic column, the retention time of sevoflurane, isoflurane and ethanol is similar, especially that of sevoflurane and ethanol, and sevoflurane obviously interferes with the determination of ethanol content in blood.
tgt: 使用KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2气相色谱柱时，七氟醚，异氟醚和乙醇的保留时间相似，尤其是七氟醚和乙醇的保留时间，七氟醚明显干扰血液中乙醇含量的测定。
ref: 使用 KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 气相色谱柱时，七氟烷、异氟烷和乙醇的保留时间相似，特别是七氟烷和乙醇的保留时间，七氟烷明显干扰血液中乙醇含量的测定。
使用 KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 气相色谱柱时，七氟烷、异氟烷和乙醇的保留时间相似，特别是七氟烷和乙醇的保留时间，七氟烷明显干扰血液中乙醇含量的测定。
使用 KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 气相色谱柱时，七氟烷、异氟烷和乙醇的保留时间相似，特别是七氟烷和乙醇的保留时间，七氟烷明显干扰血液中乙醇含量的测定。
使用 KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 气相色谱柱时，七氟烷、异氟烷和乙醇的保留时间相似，特别是七氟烷和乙醇的保留时间，七氟烷明显干扰血液中乙醇含量的测定。
atomic_facts: ['When using KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 gas chromatographic column, the retention time of sevoflurane, isoflurane and ethanol is similar.', 'The retention time of sevoflurane and ethanol is similar.', 'Sevoflurane obviously interferes with the determination of ethanol content in blood.']
bt_tgt: When using the KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 gas chromatography column, the retention times of sevoflurane, isoflurane and ethanol are similar, especially the retention times of sevoflurane and ethanol. Sevoflurane obviously interferes with the determination of ethanol content in blood.

src: The interference can be discriminated effectively by choosing the suitable chromatographic column and double column confirmatory detection.
tgt: 通过选择合适的色谱柱和双柱确认检测可以有效区分干扰。
ref: 通过选择合适的色谱柱和双柱确证检测，可以有效地辨别干扰。
通过选择合适的色谱柱和双柱确证检测，可以有效地区分干扰。
atomic_facts: ['The interference can be discriminated effectively by choosing the suitable chromatographic column.', 'The interference can be discriminated effectively by choosing the double column confirmatory detection.']
bt_tgt: Interferences can be effectively differentiated through appropriate column selection and dual-column confirmation detection.

src: The clinical data of 27 patients with symptomatic chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures combined with kyphosis treated between June 2015 and June 2017 were retrospectively analysed.
tgt: 回顾性分析2015年6月至2017年6月收治的27例有症状的慢性胸腰椎骨质疏松性骨折合并后凸畸形患者的临床资料。
ref: 回顾性分析在 2015 年 6 月至 2017 年 6 月期间治疗的 27 名有症状的慢性胸腰椎骨质疏松性骨折伴脊柱后凸患者的临床数据。
对于在 2015 年 6 月至 2017 年 6 月期间治疗的 27 名有症状的慢性胸腰椎骨质疏松性骨折伴脊柱后凸患者的临床数据进行了回顾性分析。
atomic_facts: ['The clinical data of 27 patients with symptomatic chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures combined with kyphosis were retrospectively analysed.', 'The patients were treated between June 2015 and June 2017.']
bt_tgt: The clinical data of 27 patients with symptomatic chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures and kyphosis who were admitted from June 2015 to June 2017 were retrospectively analyzed.

src: Among them, there were 8 males and 19 females, with an average age of 69.5 years (range, 56-81 years).

bt_tgt: Among them, there were 8 males and 19 females, with an average age of 69.5 years (56-81 years).

src: Anti-vascular endothelial growth factors (anti-VEGF) have become the most common treatment modality for many retinal diseases.
tgt: 抗血管内皮生长因子（抗VEGF）已成为许多视网膜疾病最常见的治疗方式。
ref: 抗血管内皮生长因子（抗-VEGF）已成为许多视网膜疾病最常见的治疗方式。
抗血管内皮生长因子（抗-VEGF）已成为许多视网膜疾病最常见的治疗方式。
atomic_facts: ['Anti-vascular endothelial growth factors (anti-VEGF) have become the most common treatment modality for many retinal diseases.']
bt_tgt: Anti-vascular endothelial growth factor (anti-VEGF) has become the most common treatment modality for many retinal diseases.

src: These include neovascular age-related macular degeneration (n-AMD), proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR) and retinal vein occlusions (RVO).
tgt: 这些包括新生血管性年龄相关性黄斑变性（n-AMD）、增生性糖尿病视网膜病变（PDR）和视网膜静脉阻塞（RVO）。
ref: 这些疾病包括新生血管性年龄相关性黄斑变性 (n-AMD)、增殖性糖尿病视网膜病变 (PDR) 与视网膜静脉阻塞 (RVO)。
此类疾病包括新生血管性年龄相关性黄斑变性 (n-AMD)、增殖性糖尿病视网膜病变 (PDR) 与视网膜静脉阻塞 (RVO)。
atomic_facts: ['These include neovascular age-related macular degeneration (n-AMD).', 'These include proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR).', 'These include retinal vein occlusions (RVO).']
bt_tgt: These include neovascular age-related macular degeneration (n-AMD), proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR), and retinal vein occlusion (RVO).

src: Patients with retinal diseases typically have to undergo multiple injections before achieving the desired therapeutic effect.
tgt: 视网膜疾病患者通常必须接受多次注射才能达到预期的治疗效果。
ref: 患有视网膜疾病的患者通常必须进行多次注射才能达到预期的治疗效果。
患有视网膜疾病的患者通常必须进行多次注射才能实现所需的治疗效果。
atomic_facts: ['Patients with retinal diseases typically have to undergo multiple injections before achieving the desired therapeutic effect.']
bt_tgt: Patients with retinal diseases often must receive multiple injections to achieve the desired therapeutic effect.

src: Each injection incurs the risk of the sight-threatening complications.
tgt: 每次注射都有危及视力的并发症的风险。
ref: 每次注射都会产生风险，此类风险会出现危及视力的并发症。
每次注射都会产生风险，此类风险会导致出现危及视力的并发症。
atomic_facts: ['Each injection incurs the risk of sight-threatening complications.']
bt_tgt: Each injection carries a risk of vision-threatening complications.

src: These include non-biodegradable implants, nano-formulations and hydrogels.
tgt: 其中包括不可生物降解的植入物、纳米制剂和水凝胶。

其中包括不可生物降解的植入物、纳米配方和水凝胶。

src: In this review, the barriers of drug delivery to the posterior segment of the eye will be explained.

src: Technicians and administrators of prosthodontic technology should face up to the problems and seize the opportunities, to improve the level of prosthodontic technology and train the highly educated professionals.
tgt: 口腔修复技术人员和管理人员应正视问题，抓住机遇，提高口腔修复技术水平，培养高学历专业人才。
ref: 口腔修复技术的技术人员与管理人员应正视问题、抓住机遇、提高口腔修复技术水平、培养高素质的专业人才。
atomic_facts: ['Technicians and administrators of prosthodontic technology should face up to the problems to improve the level of prosthodontic technology.', 'Technicians and administrators of prosthodontic technology should seize the opportunities to train the highly educated professionals.']
bt_tgt: Dental prosthodontics technicians and managers should face up to the problems, seize opportunities, improve the level of dental prosthodontics technology, and cultivate highly educated professionals.

src: At the same time, attentions should be payed to the advantages of the traditional prosthodontic technology while grasping the development of the digital prosthodontic technology.
tgt: 同时，在把握数字口腔修复技术发展的同时，应重视传统口腔修复技术的优势。
ref: 在把握数字化口腔修复技术发展机遇的同时，要重视传统口腔修复技术的优势。
atomic_facts: ['Attentions should be payed to the advantages of the traditional prosthodontic technology.', 'Attentions should be payed to grasping the development of the digital prosthodontic technology.']
bt_tgt: At the same time, while grasping the development of digital dental restoration technology, we should pay attention to the advantages of traditional dental restoration technology.

src: The dentists and the dental technicians should learn together and enhance communication to each other, to promote the progress of digital prosthodontic technology in China.
tgt: 牙医和牙科技师应该共同学习，加强交流，促进数字口腔修复技术在中国的进步。

bt_tgt: Dentists and dental technicians should study together, strengthen communication, and promote the progress of digital dental restoration technology in China.

src: This article will review the clinical and diagnostic features of laser injury, with a special emphasis on the multimodal retinal findings.

src: A meta-analysis of 2530 eyes from 48 real-world studies of therapies for macular oedema secondary to BRVO was conducted.

src: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that can seriously affect human health.
tgt: 流感病毒感染是一种呼吸道传染病，可严重影响人体健康。
ref: 流感病毒感染是一种呼吸道传染病，会严重影响人类健康。
流感病毒感染是一种呼吸道传染病，会严重影响人类健康。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease.', 'Influenza virus infection can seriously affect human health.']
bt_tgt: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that can seriously affect human health.

src: According to WHO estimation, seasonal influenza epidemics have caused an annually 3 to 5 million severe cases and 290 000 to 650 000 deaths globally.
tgt: 根据世界卫生组织的估计，季节性流感流行每年在全球造成300万至500万严重病例和29万至65万人死亡。
ref: 根据世卫组织的预估，季节性流感疫情每年在全球产生 300 万 - 500 万严重病例和 29 万 - 65 万死亡病例。

bt_tgt: According to World Health Organization estimates, seasonal influenza epidemics cause 3 million to 5 million severe cases and 290,000 to 650,000 deaths globally each year.

src: Especially, COVID-19 pandemic might co-circulate with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza in the coming winter-spring season.
tgt: 特别是，在即将到来的冬春季节，新冠肺炎大流行可能与流感等其他呼吸道传染病共同传播。

atomic_facts: ['COVID-19 pandemic might co-circulate with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza in the coming winter-spring season.']

src: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and complications from infection.
tgt: 季节性流感疫苗接种是预防流感病毒感染和感染并发症的最有效方法。
ref: 季节性流感疫苗接种是预防流感病毒感染和感染并发症的最有效方法。
季节性流感疫苗接种是预防流感病毒感染和感染并发症的最有效方法。
atomic_facts: ['Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection.', 'Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent complications from infection.']
bt_tgt: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and infection complications.

src: Except for a few major cities, influenza vaccine is a category Ⅱ vaccine, which means influenza vaccination is voluntary, and recipients must pay for it.
tgt: 除少数大城市外，流感疫苗为Ⅱ类疫苗，这意味着流感疫苗接种是自愿的，接种者必须付费。

除少数大城市外，流感疫苗属于 II.类疫苗，即自愿接种流感疫苗，且接种者必须付费。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza vaccine is a category Ⅱ vaccine.', 'Influenza vaccination is voluntary.', 'Recipients must pay for influenza vaccination.']
bt_tgt: Except for a few major cities, the flu vaccine is a Category II vaccine, which means that flu vaccination is voluntary and recipients must pay.

src: In 2018 and 2019, the China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China" .
tgt: 2018年和2019年，中国疾控中心发布了《中国季节性流感疫苗接种技术指南》。
ref: 2018 年和 2019 年，中国疾病预防控制中心发布了《中国流感疫苗预防接种技术指南》。

atomic_facts: ['The China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China" in 2018.', 'The China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China" in 2019.']
bt_tgt: In 2018 and 2019, the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China."

src: In the past year, new research evidences home and abroad have been published, and new seasonal influenza vaccine has been licensed in China.
tgt: 在过去的一年里，国内外发表了新的研究证据，新的季节性流感疫苗在中国获得了许可。
ref: 过去一年，国内外陆续发表新的研究证据，我国已批准新型季节性流感疫苗。
过去一年，国内外陆续发表新的研究证据，我国已批准新型季节性流感疫苗。
atomic_facts: ['New research evidences have been published in the past year.', 'New research evidences have been published abroad.', 'A new seasonal influenza vaccine has been licensed in China.']
bt_tgt: Over the past year, new research evidence has been published at home and abroad, and new seasonal influenza vaccines have been licensed in China.

src: Children aged 6 months through 8 years require 2 doses of influenza vaccine administered a minimum of 4 weeks apart during their first season of vaccination for optimal protection.
tgt: 6个月至8岁的儿童需要接种2剂流感疫苗，在接种疫苗的第一个季节至少间隔4周，以获得最佳保护。
ref: 6 个月至 8 岁的儿童需要接种 2 剂流感疫苗，第一剂与第二剂至少间隔 4 周，以获得最佳保护。
6 个月至 8 岁的儿童需要接种 2 剂流感疫苗，第一剂与第二剂至少间隔 4 周，以获得最佳保护。
atomic_facts: ['Children aged 6 months through 8 years require 2 doses of influenza vaccine administered during their first season of vaccination for optimal protection.', 'The doses should be given a minimum of 4 weeks apart for optimal protection.']
bt_tgt: Children 6 months to 8 years old need 2 doses of influenza vaccine, at least 4 weeks apart during the first season of vaccination, for optimal protection.

src: People more than 8 years old require 1 dose of influenza vaccine.
tgt: 8岁以上的人需要接种1剂流感疫苗。
ref: 8 岁以上人群需要接种 1 剂流感疫苗。
8 岁以上人群需要 1 剂流感疫苗。
atomic_facts: ['People more than 8 years old require 1 dose of influenza vaccine.']
bt_tgt: Anyone over 8 years old needs 1 dose of flu vaccine.

src: It is recommended that people receive their influenza vaccination by the end of October.
tgt: 建议人们在10月底前接种流感疫苗。
ref: 建议人们在 10 月底前接种流感疫苗。
建议人们在 10 月底前接种流感疫苗。
atomic_facts: ['It is recommended that people receive their influenza vaccination by the end of October.']
bt_tgt: It is recommended that people get a flu shot before the end of October.

src: For the people unable to be vaccinated before the end of October, influenza vaccination will continue to be offered for the whole season.
tgt: 对于10月底前无法接种疫苗的人，将继续提供整个季节的流感疫苗接种。
ref: 对于不能在 10 月底前接种疫苗的人，将继续提供整季的流感疫苗接种。
对于不能在 10 月底前接种疫苗的人，将继续提供整季的流感疫苗接种。
atomic_facts: ['For the people unable to be vaccinated before the end of October, influenza vaccination will continue to be offered for the whole season.', 'Influenza vaccination will continue to be offered for the whole season.']
bt_tgt: For those who cannot be vaccinated before the end of October, flu vaccinations will continue to be offered throughout the season.

src: These guidelines are intended for use by staff members of the CDCs at all levels who work on influenza control and prevention, PoVs staff members, healthcare workers from the departments of pediatrics, internal medicine, and infectious diseases, and staff members of maternity and child care institutions at all levels.
tgt: 这些指引适用于从事流感控制和预防工作的各级疾控中心工作人员、POV工作人员、儿科、内科和传染病部门的医务人员以及各级妇幼保健机构的工作人员。

bt_tgt: These guidelines apply to CDC staff at all levels engaged in influenza control and prevention, POV staff, medical staff in pediatrics, internal medicine, and infectious disease departments, and staff in maternal and child health care facilities at all levels.

src: The clinical data of 27 patients with symptomatic chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures combined with kyphosis treated between June 2015 and June 2017 were retrospectively analysed.

src: These include neovascular age-related macular degeneration (n-AMD), proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR) and retinal vein occlusions (RVO).
tgt: 包括新生血管性年龄相关性黄斑变性(n-AMD)、增殖性糖尿病视网膜病变(PDR)和视网膜静脉阻塞(RVO)。

bt_tgt: These include neovascular age-related macular degeneration (n-AMD), proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR), and retinal vein occlusion (RVO).

src: However, these drugs are administered via intravitreal injections that are associated with sight-threatening complications.

bt_tgt: However, these drugs are administered via intravitreal injections, which have been associated with vision-threatening complications.

src: Patients with retinal diseases typically have to undergo multiple injections before achieving the desired therapeutic effect.
tgt: 患有视网膜疾病的患者通常需要进行多次注射才能达到预期的治疗效果。

atomic_facts: ['Patients with retinal diseases typically have to undergo multiple injections before achieving the desired therapeutic effect.']
bt_tgt: Patients with retinal diseases often require multiple injections to achieve the desired therapeutic effect.

src: Each injection incurs the risk of the sight-threatening complications.

atomic_facts: ['Each injection incurs the risk of the sight-threatening complications.']

src: Parents' gradual loss of control is balanced by attempts to idealize the parent-child relationship and to minimize the severity of the offenses committed.
tgt: 试图将亲子关系理想化，并将所犯罪行的严重程度降到最低，以此来平衡父母逐渐失去控制的情况。
ref: 在父母逐渐失去控制的平衡中，他们试图将父母与子女的关系理想化，并尽量减少罪行的严重程度。

bt_tgt: An attempt to idealize the parent-child relationship and minimize the severity of the crime committed as a counterbalance to the parent's gradual loss of control.

src: There has been a sharp rise of reported handheld laser-induced maculopathy (HLIM) cases over the past decade, a concerning trend that may continue due to unregulated online access to high power lasers.
tgt: 在过去十年中，报告的手持激光诱发黄斑病变(HLIM)病例急剧增加，由于高功率激光的在线访问不受监管，这一令人担忧的趋势可能会持续下去。
ref: 据报道，过去十年中，手持式激光诱导性黄斑病变 (HLIM) 病例急剧上升，由于不受监管的高功率激光器在线访问，这一令人担忧的趋势可能会持续下去。
在过去十年中，报告的手持式激光诱导性黄斑病变 (HLIM) 病例急剧上升，由于不受监管的高功率激光器在线访问，这一令人担忧的趋势可能会持续下去。
atomic_facts: ['There has been a sharp rise of reported handheld laser-induced maculopathy (HLIM) cases over the past decade.', 'A concerning trend may continue due to unregulated online access to high power lasers.', 'The rise of handheld laser-induced maculopathy cases is a concerning trend.']
bt_tgt: Reported cases of handheld laser-induced macular degeneration (HLIM) have increased dramatically over the past decade, and with unregulated online access to high-power lasers, this worrying trend is likely to continue.

src: Though HLIM has distinct clinical features, not uncommonly it may masquerade as other retinal disorders.

尽管 HLIM 具有明显的临床特征，但它可能伪装成其他视网膜疾病。
atomic_facts: ['HLIM has distinct clinical features.', 'HLIM may masquerade as other retinal disorders.', 'HLIM not uncommonly masquerades as other retinal disorders.']
bt_tgt: Although HLIM has unique clinical features, it is not uncommon and can masquerade as other retinal diseases.

src: This article will review the clinical and diagnostic features of laser injury, with a special emphasis on the multimodal retinal findings.

src: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that can seriously affect human health.
tgt: 流感病毒感染是一种严重影响人类健康的呼吸道传染病。
ref: 流感病毒感染是一种呼吸道传染病，会严重影响人类健康。
流感病毒感染是一种呼吸道传染病，会严重影响人类健康。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease.', 'Influenza virus infection can seriously affect human health.']
bt_tgt: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that seriously affects human health.

src: Influenza viruses can have frequent antigenic variation and changes, which can result in rapid and widespread transmission resulting in annual epidemics and outbreaks in places of public gathering such as schools, kindergartens and nursing homes.
tgt: 流感病毒可具有频繁的抗原变异和变化，可导致快速和广泛的传播，导致每年流行，并在学校、幼儿园和疗养院等公众聚集场所爆发。
ref: 流感病毒可发生频繁的抗原变异和变化，这使其快速和广泛的传播，这导致每年在学校、幼儿园和养老院等公共集会场所爆发流行病和疫情。
流感病毒可发生频繁的抗原变异和变化，这使其快速和广泛的传播，导致每年在学校、幼儿园和养老院等公共集会场所爆发流行病和疫情。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza viruses can have frequent antigenic variation and changes.', 'Antigenic variation in influenza viruses can result in rapid and widespread transmission.', 'Antigenic changes in influenza viruses can result in rapid and widespread transmission.', 'Rapid and widespread transmission of influenza viruses can result in annual epidemics.', 'Rapid and widespread transmission of influenza viruses can result in outbreaks in places of public gathering such as schools.', 'Rapid and widespread transmission of influenza viruses can result in outbreaks in places of public gathering such as kindergartens.', 'Rapid and widespread transmission of influenza viruses can result in outbreaks in places of public gathering such as nursing homes.']
bt_tgt: Influenza viruses can have frequent antigenic mutations and changes that can lead to rapid and widespread transmission, leading to annual epidemics and outbreaks in public gathering places such as schools, kindergartens, and nursing homes.

src: Especially, COVID-19 pandemic might co-circulate with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza in the coming winter-spring season.
tgt: 特别是，在即将到来的冬春季节，COVID-19大流行可能与流感等其他呼吸道传染病共同传播。
ref: 特别是，在即将到来的冬春季节，COVID-19 大流行可能会与流感等其他呼吸道传染病共同传播。

atomic_facts: ['COVID-19 pandemic might co-circulate with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza in the coming winter-spring season.']
bt_tgt: In particular, in the upcoming winter and spring seasons, the COVID-19 pandemic may co-circulate with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza.

src: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and complications from infection.
tgt: 季节性流感疫苗接种是预防流感病毒感染和感染并发症的最有效方法。
ref: 季节性流感疫苗接种是预防流感病毒感染和感染并发症的最有效方法。
季节性流感疫苗接种是预防流感病毒感染和感染并发症的最有效方法。
atomic_facts: ['Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection.', 'Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent complications from influenza virus infection.']
bt_tgt: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and infection complications.

src: Except for a few major cities, influenza vaccine is a category Ⅱ vaccine, which means influenza vaccination is voluntary, and recipients must pay for it.
tgt: 除少数大城市外，流感疫苗属于二类疫苗，这意味着流感疫苗接种是自愿的，受种者必须付费。

除少数大城市外，流感疫苗属于 II.类疫苗，即自愿接种流感疫苗，且接种者必须付费。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza vaccine is a category Ⅱ vaccine.', 'Influenza vaccination is voluntary.', 'Recipients must pay for influenza vaccination.']
bt_tgt: Except for a few major cities, the flu vaccine is a Category II vaccine, which means that flu vaccination is voluntary and recipients must pay.

src: In 2018 and 2019, the China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China" .

atomic_facts: ['In 2018, the China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China".', 'In 2019, the China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China".']
bt_tgt: In 2018 and 2019, the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China."

src: In the past year, new research evidences home and abroad have been published, and new seasonal influenza vaccine has been licensed in China.
tgt: 在过去的一年里，国内外发表了新的研究证据，新的季节性流感疫苗在中国获得了许可。

bt_tgt: Over the past year, new research evidence has been published at home and abroad, and new seasonal influenza vaccines have been licensed in China.

src: To strengthen the technical guidance for prevention and control of influenza and operational research on influenza vaccination in China, the National Immunization Advisory Committee (NIAC) Influenza Vaccination Technical Working Group (TWG), updated the 2019-2020 technical guidelines and compiled the "Technical guidelines for seasonal influenza vaccination in China (2020-2021)" .
tgt: 为加强我国流感防控技术指导和流感疫苗接种业务研究，国家免疫咨询委员会(NIAC)流感疫苗接种技术工作组(TWG)对2019-2020年技术指南进行了更新，编制了《中国季节性流感疫苗接种技术指南(2020-2021)》。
ref: 为了加强中国流感预防和控制的技术指导和流感疫苗接种业务研究，国家免疫咨询委员会 (NIAC) 更新了 2019-2020 年中国流感疫苗预防接种技术指南 (TWG)，并编制了《中国季节性流感疫苗接种技术指南（2020-2021）》。
为了加强中国流感预防和控制的技术指导和流感疫苗接种业务研究，国家免疫咨询委员会 (NIAC) 更新了 2019-2020 年中国流感疫苗预防接种技术指南 (TWG)，并编制了《中国季节性流感疫苗接种技术指南（2020-2021）》。
atomic_facts: ['The National Immunization Advisory Committee (NIAC) Influenza Vaccination Technical Working Group (TWG) strengthened the technical guidance for prevention and control of influenza in China.', 'The National Immunization Advisory Committee (NIAC) Influenza Vaccination Technical Working Group (TWG) conducted operational research on influenza vaccination in China.', 'The National Immunization Advisory Committee (NIAC) Influenza Vaccination Technical Working Group (TWG) updated the 2019-2020 technical guidelines.', 'The National Immunization Advisory Committee (NIAC) Influenza Vaccination Technical Working Group (TWG) compiled the "Technical guidelines for seasonal influenza vaccination in China (2020-2021)" .']
bt_tgt: In order to strengthen technical guidance for influenza prevention and control in my country and research on influenza vaccination operations, the National Immunization Advisory Committee (NIAC) Influenza Vaccination Technical Working Group (TWG) updated the 2019-2020 Technical Guidelines and compiled the "China Seasonal Influenza Vaccination Technical Guidelines (2020-2021)".

src: Fifth, Influenza vaccination recommendations for 2020-2021 influenza season.

src: Children aged 6 months through 8 years require 2 doses of influenza vaccine administered a minimum of 4 weeks apart during their first season of vaccination for optimal protection.
tgt: 6个月至8岁的儿童需要在接种疫苗的第一个季节至少间隔4周接种2剂流感疫苗，以获得最佳保护。

6 个月至 8 岁的儿童需要接种 2 剂流感疫苗，第一剂与第二剂至少间隔 4 周，以获得最佳保护。

bt_tgt: Children 6 months to 8 years old need 2 doses of influenza vaccine at least 4 weeks apart during the first season of vaccination for optimal protection.

src: If they were vaccinated in 2019-2020 influenza season or a prior season, 1 dose is recommended.

bt_tgt: If they were vaccinated during the 2019-2020 flu season or a previous flu season, 1 dose is recommended.

src: People more than 8 years old require 1 dose of influenza vaccine.

src: It is recommended that people receive their influenza vaccination by the end of October.

建议人们在 10 月底前接种流感疫苗。

src: Influenza vaccination should be offered as soon as the vaccination is available.

ref: 一旦有可接种的流感疫苗，应尽快接种。
一旦有可接种的流感疫苗，就应尽快接种。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza vaccination should be offered as soon as the vaccination is available.']

src: For the people unable to be vaccinated before the end of October, influenza vaccination will continue to be offered for the whole season.
