bt_tgt: For those who are unable to receive the flu vaccine before the end of October, flu vaccination will continue to be offered throughout the season.

src: These guidelines are intended for use by staff members of the CDCs at all levels who work on influenza control and prevention, PoVs staff members, healthcare workers from the departments of pediatrics, internal medicine, and infectious diseases, and staff members of maternity and child care institutions at all levels.
tgt: 本指南供各级疾控中心从事流感防控工作的工作人员、POV工作人员、儿科、内科、传染病科医护人员、各级妇幼保健机构工作人员使用。

bt_tgt: This guide is intended for use by staff engaged in influenza prevention and control at centers for disease control and prevention at all levels, POV staff, medical staff in pediatrics, internal medicine, and infectious disease departments, and staff in maternal and child health care institutions at all levels.

src: These guidelines will be updated periodically as new evidence becomes available.

src: When using KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 gas chromatographic column, the retention time of sevoflurane, isoflurane and ethanol is similar, especially that of sevoflurane and ethanol, and sevoflurane obviously interferes with the determination of ethanol content in blood.
tgt: 当使用KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2气相色谱柱时，七氟醚、异氟醚和乙醇的保留时间相似，尤其是七氟醚和乙醇的保留时间，且七氟醚明显干扰血液中乙醇含量的测定。
ref: 使用 KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 气相色谱柱时，七氟烷、异氟烷和乙醇的保留时间相似，特别是七氟烷和乙醇的保留时间，七氟烷明显干扰血液中乙醇含量的测定。
使用 KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 气相色谱柱时，七氟烷、异氟烷和乙醇的保留时间相似，特别是七氟烷和乙醇的保留时间，七氟烷明显干扰血液中乙醇含量的测定。

atomic_facts: ['When using KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 gas chromatographic column, the retention time of sevoflurane, isoflurane, and ethanol is similar.', 'Especially, the retention time of sevoflurane and ethanol is similar.', 'Sevoflurane obviously interferes with the determination of ethanol content in blood.']
bt_tgt: When using the KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 gas chromatography column, the retention times of sevoflurane, isoflurane and ethanol are similar, especially the retention times of sevoflurane and ethanol, and sevoflurane significantly interferes with the determination of ethanol content in blood.

src: The interference can be discriminated effectively by choosing the suitable chromatographic column and double column confirmatory detection.

src: Among them, there were 8 males and 19 females, with an average age of 69.5 years (range, 56-81 years).

src: There were no complications such as bedsore, hypostatic pneumonia, or deep venous thrombosis.

atomic_facts: ['There were no complications such as bedsore.', 'There were no complications such as hypostatic pneumonia.', 'There were no complications such as deep venous thrombosis.']
bt_tgt: There were no complications such as bedsores, pneumonia, or deep vein thrombosis.

src: These include neovascular age-related macular degeneration (n-AMD), proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR) and retinal vein occlusions (RVO).

src: However, these drugs are administered via intravitreal injections that are associated with sight-threatening complications.

bt_tgt: However, these drugs are administered via intravitreal injection, which is associated with vision-threatening complications.

src: Patients with retinal diseases typically have to undergo multiple injections before achieving the desired therapeutic effect.
tgt: 患有视网膜疾病的患者通常要经过多次注射才能达到预期的治疗效果。
ref: 患有视网膜疾病的患者通常必须进行多次注射才能达到预期的治疗效果。

src: Each injection incurs the risk of the sight-threatening complications.

src: There has been a sharp rise of reported handheld laser-induced maculopathy (HLIM) cases over the past decade, a concerning trend that may continue due to unregulated online access to high power lasers.
tgt: 在过去十年中，报告的手持激光诱发黄斑病变(HLIM)病例急剧增加，由于高功率激光的在线访问不受监管，这一令人担忧的趋势可能会持续下去。
ref: 据报道，过去十年中，手持式激光诱导性黄斑病变 (HLIM) 病例急剧上升，由于不受监管的高功率激光器在线访问，这一令人担忧的趋势可能会持续下去。
在过去十年中，报告的手持式激光诱导性黄斑病变 (HLIM) 病例急剧上升，由于不受监管的高功率激光器在线访问，这一令人担忧的趋势可能会持续下去。
atomic_facts: ['There has been a sharp rise of reported handheld laser-induced maculopathy (HLIM) cases over the past decade.', 'A concerning trend may continue due to unregulated online access to high power lasers.']
bt_tgt: Reported cases of handheld laser-induced macular degeneration (HLIM) have increased dramatically over the past decade, and with unregulated online access to high-power lasers, this worrying trend is likely to continue.

src: Though HLIM has distinct clinical features, not uncommonly it may masquerade as other retinal disorders.

bt_tgt: Although HLIM has unique clinical features, it is not uncommon and can masquerade as other retinal diseases.

src: This article will review the clinical and diagnostic features of laser injury, with a special emphasis on the multimodal retinal findings.

src: This review assessed the real-world evidence of the management of macular oedema secondary to branch retinal vein occlusion (BRVO).

src: There is an urgent need for consensus on the minimum efficacy, treatment burden and safety data to collect to strengthen the real-world evidence base.

src: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that can seriously affect human health.
tgt: 流感病毒感染是一种严重影响人类健康的呼吸道传染病。
ref: 流感病毒感染是一种呼吸道传染病，会严重影响人类健康。
流感病毒感染是一种呼吸道传染病，会严重影响人类健康。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease.', 'Influenza virus infection can seriously affect human health.']
bt_tgt: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that seriously affects human health.

src: Influenza viruses can have frequent antigenic variation and changes, which can result in rapid and widespread transmission resulting in annual epidemics and outbreaks in places of public gathering such as schools, kindergartens and nursing homes.
tgt: 流感病毒可具有频繁的抗原变异和变化，这可导致快速和广泛的传播，导致每年流行，并在学校、幼儿园和疗养院等公众聚集场所爆发。
ref: 流感病毒可发生频繁的抗原变异和变化，这使其快速和广泛的传播，这导致每年在学校、幼儿园和养老院等公共集会场所爆发流行病和疫情。
流感病毒可发生频繁的抗原变异和变化，这使其快速和广泛的传播，导致每年在学校、幼儿园和养老院等公共集会场所爆发流行病和疫情。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza viruses can have frequent antigenic variation and changes.', 'Frequent antigenic variation and changes can result in rapid and widespread transmission.', 'Rapid and widespread transmission can result in annual epidemics.', 'Rapid and widespread transmission can result in outbreaks in places of public gathering such as schools, kindergartens, and nursing homes.']
bt_tgt: Influenza viruses can possess frequent antigenic mutations and changes, which can lead to rapid and widespread transmission, resulting in annual epidemics and outbreaks in public gathering places such as schools, kindergartens, and nursing homes.

src: Pregnant women, young children, the elderly, and persons with chronic illnesses are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.
tgt: 孕妇、幼儿、老年人和慢性病患者患与流感病毒感染相关的重症和死亡的风险很高。
ref: 孕妇、幼儿、老人和慢性病患者是感染流感病毒的高风险人群，他们极有可能感染严重疾病、死亡。
孕妇、幼儿、老人和慢性病患者是感染流感病毒的高风险人群，他们极有可能感染严重疾病和死亡。
atomic_facts: ['Pregnant women are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.', 'Young children are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.', 'The elderly are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.', 'Persons with chronic illnesses are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.']
bt_tgt: Pregnant women, young children, older adults, and people with chronic medical conditions are at high risk for severe illness and death related to influenza virus infection.

src: Especially, COVID-19 pandemic might co-circulate with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza in the coming winter-spring season.
tgt: 特别是，在即将到来的冬春季节，COVID-19大流行可能与流感等其他呼吸道传染病共同传播。
ref: 特别是，在即将到来的冬春季节，COVID-19 大流行可能会与流感等其他呼吸道传染病共同传播。

atomic_facts: ['COVID-19 pandemic might co-circulate with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza in the coming winter-spring season.']
bt_tgt: In particular, in the upcoming winter and spring seasons, the COVID-19 pandemic may co-circulate with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza.

src: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and complications from infection.
tgt: 季节性流感疫苗接种是预防流感病毒感染和感染并发症的最有效方法。
ref: 季节性流感疫苗接种是预防流感病毒感染和感染并发症的最有效方法。
季节性流感疫苗接种是预防流感病毒感染和感染并发症的最有效方法。
atomic_facts: ['Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection.', 'Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent complications from influenza virus infection.']
bt_tgt: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and infection complications.

src: Except for a few major cities, influenza vaccine is a category Ⅱ vaccine, which means influenza vaccination is voluntary, and recipients must pay for it.
tgt: 除个别大城市外，流感疫苗都是二类疫苗，也就是说流感疫苗是自愿接种的，受种者必须自费。
ref: 除少数大城市外，流感疫苗属于二类疫苗，即自愿接种流感疫苗，且接种者必须付费。
除少数大城市外，流感疫苗属于 II.类疫苗，即自愿接种流感疫苗，且接种者必须付费。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza vaccine is a category Ⅱ vaccine.', 'Influenza vaccination is voluntary.', 'Recipients must pay for influenza vaccination.']
bt_tgt: Except for a few major cities, influenza vaccines are Category II vaccines, which means that influenza vaccination is voluntary and recipients must pay for themselves.

src: In 2018 and 2019, the China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China" .

2018 年和 2019 年，中国疾病预防控制中心发布了《中国流感疫苗预防接种技术指南》。
atomic_facts: ['In 2018, the China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China".', 'In 2019, the China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China".']
bt_tgt: In 2018 and 2019, the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention released the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China".

src: In the past year, new research evidences home and abroad have been published, and new seasonal influenza vaccine has been licensed in China.
tgt: 在过去的一年里，国内外发表了新的研究证据，新的季节性流感疫苗在中国获得了许可。

过去一年，国内外陆续发表新的研究证据，我国已批准新型季节性流感疫苗。
atomic_facts: ['New research evidences have been published in the past year.', 'New research evidences have been published abroad.', 'A new seasonal influenza vaccine has been licensed in China.']
bt_tgt: Over the past year, new research evidence has been published at home and abroad, and new seasonal influenza vaccines have been licensed in China.

src: To strengthen the technical guidance for prevention and control of influenza and operational research on influenza vaccination in China, the National Immunization Advisory Committee (NIAC) Influenza Vaccination Technical Working Group (TWG), updated the 2019-2020 technical guidelines and compiled the "Technical guidelines for seasonal influenza vaccination in China (2020-2021)" .
tgt: 为加强我国流感防控技术指导和流感疫苗接种业务研究，国家免疫咨询委员会(NIAC)流感疫苗接种技术工作组(TWG)对2019-2020年技术指南进行了更新，编制了《中国季节性流感疫苗接种技术指南(2020-2021)》

atomic_facts: ['The National Immunization Advisory Committee (NIAC) Influenza Vaccination Technical Working Group (TWG) in China strengthened the technical guidance for prevention and control of influenza.', 'The National Immunization Advisory Committee (NIAC) Influenza Vaccination Technical Working Group (TWG) in China conducted operational research on influenza vaccination.', 'The National Immunization Advisory Committee (NIAC) Influenza Vaccination Technical Working Group (TWG) in China updated the 2019-2020 technical guidelines.', 'The National Immunization Advisory Committee (NIAC) Influenza Vaccination Technical Working Group (TWG) in China compiled the "Technical guidelines for seasonal influenza vaccination in China (2020-2021)".']
bt_tgt: In order to strengthen technical guidance for influenza prevention and control in my country and research on influenza vaccination operations, the National Immunization Advisory Committee (NIAC) Influenza Vaccination Technical Working Group (TWG) updated the 2019-2020 Technical Guidelines and compiled the "China Seasonal Influenza Vaccination Technical Guidelines (2020-2021)"

src: Fifth, Influenza vaccination recommendations for 2020-2021 influenza season.

src: Children aged 6 months through 8 years require 2 doses of influenza vaccine administered a minimum of 4 weeks apart during their first season of vaccination for optimal protection.
tgt: 6个月至8岁的儿童需要在第一个接种季节至少间隔4周接种2剂流感疫苗，以达到最佳保护效果。
ref: 6 个月至 8 岁的儿童需要接种 2 剂流感疫苗，第一剂与第二剂至少间隔 4 周，以获得最佳保护。
6 个月至 8 岁的儿童需要接种 2 剂流感疫苗，第一剂与第二剂至少间隔 4 周，以获得最佳保护。
atomic_facts: ['Children aged 6 months through 8 years require 2 doses of influenza vaccine during their first season of vaccination.', 'The doses should be administered a minimum of 4 weeks apart for optimal protection.']
bt_tgt: Children 6 months to 8 years old need to receive 2 doses of influenza vaccine at least 4 weeks apart during the first vaccination season for optimal protection.

src: If they were vaccinated in 2019-2020 influenza season or a prior season, 1 dose is recommended.

如果他们在 2019-2020 年流感季或前一季已接种疫苗，建议接种 1 剂。
atomic_facts: ['If they were vaccinated in 2019-2020 influenza season, 1 dose is recommended.', 'If they were vaccinated in a prior season, 1 dose is recommended.']
bt_tgt: If they were vaccinated during the 2019-2020 flu season or a previous flu season, 1 dose is recommended.

src: People more than 8 years old require 1 dose of influenza vaccine.

ref: 8 岁以上人群需要接种 1 剂流感疫苗。
8 岁以上人群需要 1 剂流感疫苗。
atomic_facts: ['People more than 8 years old require 1 dose of influenza vaccine.']
bt_tgt: Anyone over 8 years old needs 1 dose of flu vaccine.

src: It is recommended that people receive their influenza vaccination by the end of October.

ref: 建议人们在 10 月底前接种流感疫苗。
建议人们在 10 月底前接种流感疫苗。
atomic_facts: ['It is recommended that people receive their influenza vaccination by the end of October.']

src: Influenza vaccination should be offered as soon as the vaccination is available.

ref: 一旦有可接种的流感疫苗，应尽快接种。
一旦有可接种的流感疫苗，就应尽快接种。

src: For the people unable to be vaccinated before the end of October, influenza vaccination will continue to be offered for the whole season.
tgt: 对于无法在10月底前接种流感疫苗的人，将继续提供整个季节的流感疫苗接种。

对于不能在 10 月底前接种疫苗的人，将继续提供整季的流感疫苗接种。
atomic_facts: ['For the people unable to be vaccinated before the end of October, influenza vaccination will continue to be offered for the whole season.']
bt_tgt: For those who are unable to receive a flu shot by the end of October, flu vaccinations will continue to be offered throughout the season.

src: These guidelines are intended for use by staff members of the CDCs at all levels who work on influenza control and prevention, PoVs staff members, healthcare workers from the departments of pediatrics, internal medicine, and infectious diseases, and staff members of maternity and child care institutions at all levels.

src: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that can seriously affect human health.
tgt: 流感病毒感染是一种呼吸道传染病，可严重影响人体健康。
ref: 流感病毒感染是一种呼吸道传染病，会严重影响人类健康。

atomic_facts: ['Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease.', 'Influenza virus infection can seriously affect human health.']
bt_tgt: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that can seriously affect human health.

src: According to WHO estimation, seasonal influenza epidemics have caused an annually 3 to 5 million severe cases and 290 000 to 650 000 deaths globally.
tgt: 根据世界卫生组织的估计，季节性流感流行每年在全球造成300万至500万严重病例和29万至65万人死亡。

src: Especially, COVID-19 pandemic might co-circulate with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza in the coming winter-spring season.

src: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and complications from infection.

bt_tgt: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and infection complications.

src: Except for a few major cities, influenza vaccine is a category Ⅱ vaccine, which means influenza vaccination is voluntary, and recipients must pay for it.

bt_tgt: Except for a few major cities, the flu vaccine is a Category II vaccine, which means that flu vaccination is voluntary and recipients must pay.

src: In 2018 and 2019, the China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China" .

ref: 2018 年和 2019 年，中国疾病预防控制中心发布了《中国流感疫苗预防接种技术指南》。
2018 年和 2019 年，中国疾病预防控制中心发布了《中国流感疫苗预防接种技术指南》。
atomic_facts: ['The China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China" in 2018.', 'The China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China" in 2019.']
bt_tgt: In 2018 and 2019, the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China."

src: In the past year, new research evidences home and abroad have been published, and new seasonal influenza vaccine has been licensed in China.
tgt: 在过去的一年里，国内外发表了新的研究证据，新的季节性流感疫苗在中国获得了许可。
ref: 过去一年，国内外陆续发表新的研究证据，我国已批准新型季节性流感疫苗。
过去一年，国内外陆续发表新的研究证据，我国已批准新型季节性流感疫苗。
atomic_facts: ['New research evidences have been published.', 'New research evidences have been published home.', 'New research evidences have been published abroad.', 'New seasonal influenza vaccine has been licensed in China.']
bt_tgt: Over the past year, new research evidence has been published at home and abroad, and new seasonal influenza vaccines have been licensed in China.

src: Children aged 6 months through 8 years require 2 doses of influenza vaccine administered a minimum of 4 weeks apart during their first season of vaccination for optimal protection.
tgt: 6个月至8岁的儿童需要两剂流感疫苗，在第一个接种季节至少间隔4周接种，以获得最佳保护。
ref: 6 个月至 8 岁的儿童需要接种 2 剂流感疫苗，第一剂与第二剂至少间隔 4 周，以获得最佳保护。
6 个月至 8 岁的儿童需要接种 2 剂流感疫苗，第一剂与第二剂至少间隔 4 周，以获得最佳保护。
atomic_facts: ['Children aged 6 months through 8 years require 2 doses of influenza vaccine administered during their first season of vaccination.', 'The doses should be administered a minimum of 4 weeks apart for optimal protection.']
bt_tgt: Children 6 months to 8 years old need two doses of flu vaccine, given at least 4 weeks apart during the first vaccination season, for optimal protection.

src: People more than 8 years old require 1 dose of influenza vaccine.
tgt: 8岁以上的人需要接种1剂流感疫苗。
ref: 8 岁以上人群需要接种 1 剂流感疫苗。
8 岁以上人群需要 1 剂流感疫苗。
atomic_facts: ['People more than 8 years old require 1 dose of influenza vaccine.']
bt_tgt: Anyone over 8 years old needs 1 dose of flu vaccine.

src: It is recommended that people receive their influenza vaccination by the end of October.
tgt: 建议人们在10月底之前接种流感疫苗。

建议人们在 10 月底前接种流感疫苗。
atomic_facts: ['It is recommended that people receive their influenza vaccination by the end of October.']
bt_tgt: It is recommended that people get a flu shot before the end of October.

src: For the people unable to be vaccinated before the end of October, influenza vaccination will continue to be offered for the whole season.
tgt: 对于10月底前无法接种疫苗的人，将继续提供整个季节的流感疫苗接种。
ref: 对于不能在 10 月底前接种疫苗的人，将继续提供整季的流感疫苗接种。

atomic_facts: ['For the people unable to be vaccinated before the end of October, influenza vaccination will continue to be offered for the whole season.']
bt_tgt: For those who cannot be vaccinated before the end of October, flu vaccinations will continue to be offered throughout the season.

src: When using KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 gas chromatographic column, the retention time of sevoflurane, isoflurane and ethanol is similar, especially that of sevoflurane and ethanol, and sevoflurane obviously interferes with the determination of ethanol content in blood.

ref: 使用 KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 气相色谱柱时，七氟烷、异氟烷和乙醇的保留时间相似，特别是七氟烷和乙醇的保留时间，七氟烷明显干扰血液中乙醇含量的测定。

atomic_facts: ['When using KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 gas chromatographic column, the retention time of sevoflurane, isoflurane and ethanol is similar.', 'Especially that of sevoflurane and ethanol.', 'Sevoflurane obviously interferes with the determination of ethanol content in blood.']
bt_tgt: When using the KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 gas chromatography column, the retention times of sevoflurane, isoflurane and ethanol are similar, especially the retention times of sevoflurane and ethanol. Sevoflurane significantly interferes with the determination of ethanol content in blood.

src: The interference can be discriminated effectively by choosing the suitable chromatographic column and double column confirmatory detection.

bt_tgt: Proper column selection and dual-column verification testing can effectively identify interferences.

src: The clinical data of 27 patients with symptomatic chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures combined with kyphosis treated between June 2015 and June 2017 were retrospectively analysed.
tgt: 回顾性分析2015年6月至2017年6月治疗的27例症状性慢性胸腰椎骨质疏松性骨折合并后凸患者的临床资料。

atomic_facts: ['The clinical data of 27 patients with symptomatic chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures combined with kyphosis were retrospectively analysed.', 'The patients were treated between June 2015 and June 2017.']
bt_tgt: The clinical data of 27 patients with symptomatic chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures and kyphosis treated from June 2015 to June 2017 were retrospectively analyzed.

src: Among them, there were 8 males and 19 females, with an average age of 69.5 years (range, 56-81 years).

src: These include neovascular age-related macular degeneration (n-AMD), proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR) and retinal vein occlusions (RVO).

src: Patients with retinal diseases typically have to undergo multiple injections before achieving the desired therapeutic effect.
tgt: 患有视网膜疾病的患者通常在达到期望的治疗效果之前必须接受多次注射。
ref: 患有视网膜疾病的患者通常必须进行多次注射才能达到预期的治疗效果。

atomic_facts: ['Patients with retinal diseases typically have to undergo multiple injections before achieving the desired therapeutic effect.']
bt_tgt: Patients with retinal disease often must receive multiple injections before the desired treatment effect is achieved.

src: Each injection incurs the risk of the sight-threatening complications.

atomic_facts: ['Each injection incurs the risk of sight-threatening complications.']

src: The influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes on determination of ethanol content in blood sample by headspace gas chromatography was explored under the different detection conditions of KB-BAC1/ KB-BAC2 and J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column.

ref: 探讨了在 KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 和 J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 气相色谱柱不同检测条件下，探讨卤代羟基烷对顶空气相色谱法测定血样中乙醇含量的影响。

src: Pregnant women, young children, the elderly, and persons with chronic illnesses are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.

src: The most feared of these complications is endophthalmitis, a severe infection of the eye with extremely poor visual outcomes.

src: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that can seriously affect human health.
tgt: 流感病毒感染是一种严重影响人类健康的呼吸道传染病。
ref: 流感病毒感染是一种呼吸道传染病，会严重影响人类健康。
流感病毒感染是一种呼吸道传染病，会严重影响人类健康。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease.', 'Influenza virus infection can seriously affect human health.']
bt_tgt: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that seriously affects human health.

src: Influenza viruses can have frequent antigenic variation and changes, which can result in rapid and widespread transmission resulting in annual epidemics and outbreaks in places of public gathering such as schools, kindergartens and nursing homes.
tgt: 流感病毒可能发生频繁的抗原变异和变化，这可能导致迅速和广泛的传播，从而每年都造成流行病，并在学校、幼儿园和疗养院等公众聚集场所爆发疫情。
ref: 流感病毒可发生频繁的抗原变异和变化，这使其快速和广泛的传播，这导致每年在学校、幼儿园和养老院等公共集会场所爆发流行病和疫情。
流感病毒可发生频繁的抗原变异和变化，这使其快速和广泛的传播，导致每年在学校、幼儿园和养老院等公共集会场所爆发流行病和疫情。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza viruses can have frequent antigenic variation and changes.', 'Antigenic variation and changes can result in rapid and widespread transmission.', 'Antigenic variation and changes can result in annual epidemics.', 'Antigenic variation and changes can result in outbreaks in places of public gathering such as schools, kindergartens, and nursing homes.']
bt_tgt: Influenza viruses may undergo frequent antigenic mutations and changes, which may lead to rapid and widespread transmission, resulting in annual epidemics and outbreaks in public gathering places such as schools, kindergartens, and nursing homes.

src: Pregnant women, young children, the elderly, and persons with chronic illnesses are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.
tgt: 孕妇、幼儿、老人和慢性病患者感染流感病毒后患重病和死亡的风险很高。
ref: 孕妇、幼儿、老人和慢性病患者是感染流感病毒的高风险人群，他们极有可能感染严重疾病、死亡。
孕妇、幼儿、老人和慢性病患者是感染流感病毒的高风险人群，他们极有可能感染严重疾病和死亡。
atomic_facts: ['Pregnant women are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.', 'Young children are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.', 'The elderly are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.', 'Persons with chronic illnesses are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.']
bt_tgt: Pregnant women, young children, the elderly, and people with chronic medical conditions are at high risk for severe illness and death from influenza viruses.

src: Especially, COVID-19 pandemic might co-circulate with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza in the coming winter-spring season.

ref: 特别是，在即将到来的冬春季节，COVID-19 大流行可能会与流感等其他呼吸道传染病共同传播。

bt_tgt: Especially in the coming winter and spring, the novel coronavirus pneumonia (COVID-19) may be cross-transmitted with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza.

src: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and complications from infection.

bt_tgt: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and infection complications.

bt_tgt: In 2018 and 2019, the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China."

src: In the past year, new research evidences home and abroad have been published, and new seasonal influenza vaccine has been licensed in China.
tgt: 近一年来，国内外发表了新的研究证据，新型季节性流感疫苗在我国获准上市。
ref: 过去一年，国内外陆续发表新的研究证据，我国已批准新型季节性流感疫苗。
过去一年，国内外陆续发表新的研究证据，我国已批准新型季节性流感疫苗。
atomic_facts: ['New research evidences have been published in the past year.', 'New research evidences have been published abroad.', 'New seasonal influenza vaccine has been licensed in China.']
bt_tgt: In the past year, new research evidence has been published at home and abroad, and a new seasonal influenza vaccine has been approved for marketing in my country.

src: Second, policies and measures for influenza prevention and control issued by National Health Commission (PRC) in the past year.
tgt: 第二，国家卫生健康委员会过去一年发布的流感防控政策措施。
ref: 二、近一年来国家卫生健康委员会 (PRC) 出台流感防控政策和措施。
二、近一年来国家卫生健康委员会 (PRC) 出台的流感防控政策和措施。
atomic_facts: ['Policies for influenza prevention and control were issued by National Health Commission (PRC) in the past year.', 'Measures for influenza prevention and control were issued by National Health Commission (PRC) in the past year.']
bt_tgt: Second, the influenza prevention and control policies and measures issued by the National Health Commission in the past year.

src: Fifth, Influenza vaccination recommendations for 2020-2021 influenza season.
tgt: 第五，2020-2021流感季节流感疫苗接种建议。
ref: 五、2020-2021 年流感季节，流感疫苗接种建议。
五、2020-2021 年，流感季节时流感疫苗接种建议。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza vaccination recommendations are for the 2020-2021 influenza season.', 'Fifth, Influenza vaccination recommendations are for the 2020-2021 influenza season.']
bt_tgt: Fifth, influenza vaccination recommendations for the 2020-2021 influenza season.

src: The recommendations described in this report include the following: Points of Vaccination clinics (PoVs) should provide influenza vaccination to all persons aged 6 months and above who are willing to be vaccinated and do not have contraindications.
tgt: 本报告所述建议包括以下内容：疫苗接种门诊点应向所有愿意接种流感疫苗且无禁忌证的6个月及以上人群提供流感疫苗接种。
ref: 本报告中描述的建议包括以下内容：疫苗接种点诊所 (POV) 应向所有 6 个月及以上愿意接种疫苗、无禁忌症人士提供流感疫苗接种。
本报告中描述的建议包括以下内容：疫苗接种点诊所 (POV) 应向所有 6 个月及以上愿意接种疫苗、无禁忌症的人提供流感疫苗接种。
atomic_facts: ['Points of Vaccination clinics (PoVs) should provide influenza vaccination to all persons aged 6 months and above who are willing to be vaccinated.', 'Points of Vaccination clinics (PoVs) should not provide influenza vaccination to persons with contraindications.']
bt_tgt: Recommendations described in this report include the following: Vaccination clinics should offer influenza vaccination to all persons 6 months of age and older who are willing to receive influenza vaccine and have no contraindications.

src: If they were vaccinated in 2019-2020 influenza season or a prior season, 1 dose is recommended.
tgt: 如果在2019-2020年流感季节或之前季节接种过疫苗，建议接种1剂。
ref: 如果他们在 2019-2020 年流感季或前一季已接种疫苗，建议接种 1 剂。
如果他们在 2019-2020 年流感季或前一季已接种疫苗，建议接种 1 剂。
atomic_facts: ['If they were vaccinated in 2019-2020 influenza season, 1 dose is recommended.', 'If they were vaccinated in a prior season, 1 dose is recommended.']
bt_tgt: If vaccinated during the 2019-2020 flu season or previous seasons, 1 dose is recommended.

src: People more than 8 years old require 1 dose of influenza vaccine.
tgt: 8岁以上人群接种1剂流感疫苗。
ref: 8 岁以上人群需要接种 1 剂流感疫苗。
8 岁以上人群需要 1 剂流感疫苗。
atomic_facts: ['People more than 8 years old require 1 dose of influenza vaccine.']
bt_tgt: People over 8 years old should receive 1 dose of influenza vaccine.

src: It is recommended that people receive their influenza vaccination by the end of October.
tgt: 建议人们在10月底前接种流感疫苗。
ref: 建议人们在 10 月底前接种流感疫苗。
建议人们在 10 月底前接种流感疫苗。
atomic_facts: ['It is recommended that people receive their influenza vaccination by the end of October.']
bt_tgt: It is recommended that people get a flu shot before the end of October.

src: For the people unable to be vaccinated before the end of October, influenza vaccination will continue to be offered for the whole season.
tgt: 对10月底前无法接种疫苗的人群，将继续提供整个季节的流感疫苗接种。
ref: 对于不能在 10 月底前接种疫苗的人，将继续提供整季的流感疫苗接种。
对于不能在 10 月底前接种疫苗的人，将继续提供整季的流感疫苗接种。
atomic_facts: ['For the people unable to be vaccinated before the end of October, influenza vaccination will continue to be offered for the whole season.']
bt_tgt: For those who cannot be vaccinated before the end of October, influenza vaccination will continue to be offered throughout the season.

src: These guidelines will be updated periodically as new evidence becomes available.
tgt: 随着新证据的提供，这些准则将定期更新。
ref: 这些指南将随着新证据的出现而定期更新。
这些指南将随着新证据的出现而定期更新。
atomic_facts: ['These guidelines will be updated periodically as new evidence becomes available.', 'New evidence will result in periodic updates of these guidelines.']
bt_tgt: These guidelines will be updated regularly as new evidence becomes available.

src: The interference can be discriminated effectively by choosing the suitable chromatographic column and double column confirmatory detection.
tgt: 通过选择合适的色谱柱和双柱确证检测，可以有效地区分干扰。
ref: 通过选择合适的色谱柱和双柱确证检测，可以有效地辨别干扰。
通过选择合适的色谱柱和双柱确证检测，可以有效地区分干扰。
atomic_facts: ['The interference can be discriminated effectively by choosing the suitable chromatographic column.', 'The interference can be discriminated effectively by using double column confirmatory detection.']
bt_tgt: Interferences can be effectively distinguished through appropriate column selection and dual-column confirmatory testing.

src: The clinical data of 27 patients with symptomatic chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures combined with kyphosis treated between June 2015 and June 2017 were retrospectively analysed.
tgt: 回顾性分析2015年6月至2017年6月27例症状性慢性胸腰椎骨质疏松性骨折合并后凸畸形患者的临床资料。
ref: 回顾性分析在 2015 年 6 月至 2017 年 6 月期间治疗的 27 名有症状的慢性胸腰椎骨质疏松性骨折伴脊柱后凸患者的临床数据。
对于在 2015 年 6 月至 2017 年 6 月期间治疗的 27 名有症状的慢性胸腰椎骨质疏松性骨折伴脊柱后凸患者的临床数据进行了回顾性分析。
atomic_facts: ['27 patients had symptomatic chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures combined with kyphosis.', 'The patients were treated between June 2015 and June 2017.', 'The clinical data of the patients were retrospectively analysed.']
bt_tgt: The clinical data of 27 patients with symptomatic chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures combined with kyphosis from June 2015 to June 2017 were retrospectively analyzed.

src: The incisions healed by first intention in 26 cases, and 1 incision healed after dressing change due to poor blood glucose control.
tgt: 26例切口一期愈合，1例切口因血糖控制不佳换药后愈合。
ref: 26 例切口出现一期愈合，但有 1 例因血糖控制不佳切口于换药后愈合。
有 26 例切口出现一期愈合，因血糖控制不佳有 1 个切口于换药后愈合。
atomic_facts: ['The incisions healed by first intention in 26 cases.', '1 incision healed after dressing change due to poor blood glucose control.']
bt_tgt: Twenty-six cases of incisions healed in the first stage, and 1 case of incision healed after dressing change due to poor blood sugar control.

src: These include neovascular age-related macular degeneration (n-AMD), proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR) and retinal vein occlusions (RVO).
tgt: 包括新生血管性年龄相关性黄斑变性（n-AMD）、增生性糖尿病视网膜病变（PDR）和视网膜静脉阻塞（RVO）。
ref: 这些疾病包括新生血管性年龄相关性黄斑变性 (n-AMD)、增殖性糖尿病视网膜病变 (PDR) 与视网膜静脉阻塞 (RVO)。
此类疾病包括新生血管性年龄相关性黄斑变性 (n-AMD)、增殖性糖尿病视网膜病变 (PDR) 与视网膜静脉阻塞 (RVO)。
atomic_facts: ['These include neovascular age-related macular degeneration (n-AMD).', 'These include proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR).', 'These include retinal vein occlusions (RVO).']
bt_tgt: These include neovascular age-related macular degeneration (n-AMD), proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR), and retinal vein occlusion (RVO).

src: Patients with retinal diseases typically have to undergo multiple injections before achieving the desired therapeutic effect.
tgt: 视网膜疾病患者通常必须经历多次注射才能达到预期的治疗效果。
ref: 患有视网膜疾病的患者通常必须进行多次注射才能达到预期的治疗效果。
患有视网膜疾病的患者通常必须进行多次注射才能实现所需的治疗效果。
atomic_facts: ['Patients with retinal diseases typically have to undergo multiple injections before achieving the desired therapeutic effect.', 'The desired therapeutic effect requires multiple injections for patients with retinal diseases.']
bt_tgt: Patients with retinal diseases often must undergo multiple injections to achieve the desired therapeutic effect.

src: Each injection incurs the risk of the sight-threatening complications.
tgt: 每次注射都会产生危及视力的并发症。
ref: 每次注射都会产生风险，此类风险会出现危及视力的并发症。
每次注射都会产生风险，此类风险会导致出现危及视力的并发症。
atomic_facts: ['Each injection incurs the risk of sight-threatening complications.']
bt_tgt: Vision-threatening complications arise with each injection.

src: These include non-biodegradable implants, nano-formulations and hydrogels.
tgt: 这些包括不可生物降解的植入物、纳米制剂和水凝胶。

其中包括不可生物降解的植入物、纳米配方和水凝胶。

bt_tgt: These include nonbiodegradable implants, nanoformulations, and hydrogels.

src: The characteristics of an ideal sustained delivery platform will then be discussed.
tgt: 随后将讨论理想持续输送平台的特点。

然后将讨论理想型持续性递送平台的特征。
atomic_facts: ['The characteristics of an ideal sustained delivery platform will be discussed.', 'The characteristics will then be discussed.']
bt_tgt: The characteristics of an ideal continuous delivery platform will then be discussed.

src: Finally, the current available strategies will be analysed with the above-mentioned characteristics in mind to determine the advantages and disadvantages of each sustained drug delivery modality.
tgt: 最后，将结合上述特点对现有策略进行分析，以确定每种持续给药方式的优缺点。

最后，将在分析现有战略时考虑到上述特征，以确定每种持续性药物输送方式的优缺点。
atomic_facts: ['The current available strategies will be analysed with the above-mentioned characteristics in mind.', 'The analysis will determine the advantages and disadvantages of each sustained drug delivery modality.']
bt_tgt: Finally, existing strategies will be analyzed in conjunction with the above-mentioned characteristics to determine the advantages and disadvantages of each sustained delivery method.

src: Technicians and administrators of prosthodontic technology should face up to the problems and seize the opportunities, to improve the level of prosthodontic technology and train the highly educated professionals.
tgt: 口腔修复技术技术人员和管理人员应正视问题，抓住机遇，提高口腔修复技术水平，培养高学历人才。
ref: 口腔修复技术的技术人员与管理人员应正视问题、抓住机遇、提高口腔修复技术水平、培养高素质的专业人才。
atomic_facts: ['Technicians should face up to the problems to improve the level of prosthodontic technology.', 'Technicians should seize the opportunities to improve the level of prosthodontic technology.', 'Administrators of prosthodontic technology should face up to the problems to train the highly educated professionals.', 'Administrators of prosthodontic technology should seize the opportunities to train the highly educated professionals.']
bt_tgt: Dental prosthodontics technicians and managers should face up to the problems, seize opportunities, improve the level of dental prosthodontics technology, and cultivate highly educated talents.

src: At the same time, attentions should be payed to the advantages of the traditional prosthodontic technology while grasping the development of the digital prosthodontic technology.
tgt: 同时，在抓好数字化口腔修复技术发展的同时，要注意发挥传统口腔修复技术的优势。
ref: 在把握数字化口腔修复技术发展机遇的同时，要重视传统口腔修复技术的优势。
atomic_facts: ['Attentions should be payed to the advantages of the traditional prosthodontic technology.', 'Attentions should be payed to grasping the development of the digital prosthodontic technology.']
bt_tgt: At the same time, while focusing on the development of digital dental restoration technology, attention should be paid to giving full play to the advantages of traditional dental restoration technology.

src: The dentists and the dental technicians should learn together and enhance communication to each other, to promote the progress of digital prosthodontic technology in China.
tgt: 牙医和牙科技术人员应共同学习，加强交流，推动我国数字化口腔修复技术的进步。
ref: 牙医和牙科技师要共同学习，加强相互沟通，推动中国数字化口腔修复技术的进步。
atomic_facts: ['The dentists should learn together to promote the progress of digital prosthodontic technology in China.', 'The dental technicians should learn together to promote the progress of digital prosthodontic technology in China.', 'The dentists should enhance communication to promote the progress of digital prosthodontic technology in China.', 'The dental technicians should enhance communication to promote the progress of digital prosthodontic technology in China.']
bt_tgt: Dentists and dental technicians should study together and strengthen communication to promote the advancement of digital dental restoration technology in our country.

src: Though HLIM has distinct clinical features, not uncommonly it may masquerade as other retinal disorders.

尽管 HLIM 具有明显的临床特征，但它可能伪装成其他视网膜疾病。
atomic_facts: ['HLIM has distinct clinical features.', 'HLIM may masquerade as other retinal disorders.']
bt_tgt: Although HLIM has unique clinical features, it is not uncommon and may masquerade as other retinal diseases.

src: This article will review the clinical and diagnostic features of laser injury, with a special emphasis on the multimodal retinal findings.
tgt: 本文将回顾激光损伤的临床和诊断特点，重点介绍多模态视网膜的发现。

src: Baseline characteristics, visual, anatomical and safety outcomes were recorded.

src: The weighted mean and weighted estimates from random-effects models were calculated for visual acuity (VA) and central subfield thickness (CST) changes at 6, 12 and 24 months.
tgt: 计算6、12和24个月时随机效应模型中视力（VA）和中央亚视场厚度（CST）变化的加权平均值和加权估计值。
ref: 计算了随机效应模型的加权平均值与加权估计值，以显示 6 个月、12 个月和 24 个月时的视敏度 (VA) 与中央视网膜厚度 (CST) 的变化。
计算了随机效应模型的加权平均值与加权估计值，以显示 6 个月、12 个月和 24 个月时的视敏度 (VA) 与中央视网膜厚度 (CST) 的变化。
计算了随机效应模型的加权平均值与加权估计值，以显示 6 个月、12 个月和 24 个月时的视敏度 (VA) 与中央视网膜厚度 (CST) 的变化。
计算了随机效应模型的加权平均值与加权估计值，以显示 6 个月、12 个月和 24 个月时的视敏度 (VA) 与中央视网膜厚度 (CST) 的变化。

bt_tgt: Weighted means and weighted estimates of changes in visual acuity (VA) and central subfield thickness (CST) in random effects models were calculated at 6, 12, and 24 months.

src: The mean baseline VA for the pooled data was 54.0 (51.5, 56.5) letters and the mean baseline CST was 501.3 (483.5, 519.1) µm.

bt_tgt: The average baseline VA of the combined data was 54.0 (51.5, 56.5) letters and the average baseline CST was 501.3 (483.5, 519.1) μm.

src: The clinical data of 48 patients with unstable anterior pelvic ring fractures who met the selection criteria between June 2014 and December 2019 were retrospectively analyzed.

src: The operation time and intraoperative blood loss in INFIX group were significantly lower than those in plate group (  Compared with the plate internal fixation, the INFIX internal fixation can obtain the similar effectiveness for the unstable anterior pelvic ring fracture and has the advantages of shorter operation time, less blood loss, and lower risk of infection.
tgt: INFIX组手术时间、术中失血量均明显低于钢板组（与钢板内固定相比，INFIX内固定治疗不稳定型骨盆前环骨折可获得相似的疗效，具有手术时间短、失血量少、感染风险低等优点。
atomic_facts: ['The operation time in INFIX group was significantly lower than that in plate group.', 'The intraoperative blood loss in INFIX group was significantly lower than that in plate group.', 'The INFIX internal fixation can obtain similar effectiveness for unstable anterior pelvic ring fracture.', 'The INFIX internal fixation has the advantages of shorter operation time.', 'The INFIX internal fixation has the advantages of less blood loss.', 'The INFIX internal fixation has the advantages of lower risk of infection.']
bt_tgt: The operation time and intraoperative blood loss in the INFIX group were significantly lower than those in the plate group (compared with plate internal fixation, INFIX internal fixation can achieve similar efficacy in the treatment of unstable anterior pelvic ring fractures, and has the advantages of short operation time, less blood loss, and low infection risk.

src: The influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes on determination of ethanol content in blood sample by headspace gas chromatography was explored under the different detection conditions of KB-BAC1/ KB-BAC2 and J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column.

src: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that can seriously affect human health.
tgt: 流感病毒感染是一种严重影响人类健康的呼吸道传染病。
ref: 流感病毒感染是一种呼吸道传染病，会严重影响人类健康。

atomic_facts: ['Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease.', 'Influenza virus infection can seriously affect human health.']
bt_tgt: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that seriously affects human health.

src: According to WHO estimation, seasonal influenza epidemics have caused an annually 3 to 5 million severe cases and 290 000 to 650 000 deaths globally.
tgt: 据世卫组织估计，季节性流感疫情每年在全球造成300万至500万重症病例和29万至65万人死亡。
ref: 根据世卫组织的预估，季节性流感疫情每年在全球产生 300 万 - 500 万严重病例和 29 万 - 65 万死亡病例。

atomic_facts: ['Seasonal influenza epidemics have caused 3 to 5 million severe cases globally.', 'Seasonal influenza epidemics have caused 290,000 to 650,000 deaths globally.', 'According to WHO estimation, the number of severe cases caused by seasonal influenza epidemics annually is 3 to 5 million.', 'According to WHO estimation, the number of deaths caused by seasonal influenza epidemics annually is 290,000 to 650,000.']
bt_tgt: According to WHO estimates, seasonal influenza epidemics cause 3 million to 5 million severe cases and 290,000 to 650,000 deaths globally every year.

src: Especially, COVID-19 pandemic might co-circulate with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza in the coming winter-spring season.

src: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and complications from infection.

bt_tgt: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and infection complications.

src: Except for a few major cities, influenza vaccine is a category Ⅱ vaccine, which means influenza vaccination is voluntary, and recipients must pay for it.

src: The recommendations described in this report include the following: Points of Vaccination clinics (PoVs) should provide influenza vaccination to all persons aged 6 months and above who are willing to be vaccinated and do not have contraindications.

bt_tgt: Recommendations described in this report include the following: Vaccination clinics should provide influenza vaccination to all people 6 months and older who are willing to be vaccinated and have no contraindications.

src: The operation time and intraoperative blood loss in INFIX group were significantly lower than those in plate group (  Compared with the plate internal fixation, the INFIX internal fixation can obtain the similar effectiveness for the unstable anterior pelvic ring fracture and has the advantages of shorter operation time, less blood loss, and lower risk of infection.
tgt: INFIX组手术时间及术中出血量明显低于钢板组（与钢板内固定术相比、INFIX内固定治疗不稳定型骨盆前环骨折临床疗效相当、且手术时间短、出血量少、感染风险低）。
atomic_facts: ['The operation time in INFIX group was significantly lower than in plate group.', 'The intraoperative blood loss in INFIX group was significantly lower than in plate group.', 'The INFIX internal fixation can obtain similar effectiveness for unstable anterior pelvic ring fracture compared with plate internal fixation.', 'The INFIX internal fixation has the advantages of shorter operation time.', 'The INFIX internal fixation has the advantages of less blood loss.', 'The INFIX internal fixation has the advantages of lower risk of infection.']
bt_tgt: The operation time and intraoperative blood loss in the INFIX group were significantly lower than those in the plate group (compared with plate internal fixation, the clinical efficacy of INFIX internal fixation in the treatment of unstable anterior pelvic ring fractures is similar, and the operation time is short, the blood loss is small, and the risk of infection is low).

src: Between December 2017 and December 2019, 39 cases with upper thoracic pedicle screw internal fixation were included in the study, including 19 cases in robot group (group A, robot assisted pedicle screw placement) and 20 cases in freehand group (group B, freehand pedicle screw placement).
tgt: 2017年12月至2019年12月，39例胸椎弓根螺钉内固定患者被纳入研究、其中19例为机器人组（A组、机器人辅助椎弓根螺钉置入组），20例为徒手组（B组、徒手椎弓根螺钉置入组）。

2017 年 12 月至 2019 年 12 月，39 例胸椎弓根螺钉内固定患者被纳入研究、其中 19 例为机器人组（A 组、机器人辅助椎弓根螺钉置入组），20 例为徒手组（B 组、徒手椎弓根螺钉置入组）。

bt_tgt: From December 2017 to December 2019, 39 patients with thoracic pedicle screw internal fixation were included in the study, of which 19 patients were in the robot group (Group A, robot-assisted pedicle screw placement group) and 20 patients were in the manual group (Group B, free-hand pedicle screw placement group).

src: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that can seriously affect human health.

ref: 流感病毒感染是一种呼吸道传染病，会严重影响人类健康。

bt_tgt: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that can seriously affect human health.

src: Pregnant women, young children, the elderly, and persons with chronic illnesses are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.
tgt: 孕妇、幼儿、老人和慢性病患者是与流感病毒感染有关的严重疾病和死亡的高风险人群。
ref: 孕妇、幼儿、老人和慢性病患者是感染流感病毒的高风险人群，他们极有可能感染严重疾病、死亡。
孕妇、幼儿、老人和慢性病患者是感染流感病毒的高风险人群，他们极有可能感染严重疾病和死亡。
atomic_facts: ['Pregnant women are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.', 'Young children are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.', 'The elderly are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.', 'Persons with chronic illnesses are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.']
bt_tgt: Pregnant women, young children, the elderly, and people with chronic medical conditions are at high risk for severe illness and death related to influenza virus infection.

src: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and complications from infection.

bt_tgt: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and infection complications.

src: In 2018 and 2019, the China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China" .

src: In the past year, new research evidences home and abroad have been published, and new seasonal influenza vaccine has been licensed in China.

src: To strengthen the technical guidance for prevention and control of influenza and operational research on influenza vaccination in China, the National Immunization Advisory Committee (NIAC) Influenza Vaccination Technical Working Group (TWG), updated the 2019-2020 technical guidelines and compiled the "Technical guidelines for seasonal influenza vaccination in China (2020-2021)" .

src: Children aged 6 months through 8 years require 2 doses of influenza vaccine administered a minimum of 4 weeks apart during their first season of vaccination for optimal protection.

bt_tgt: These diseases include neovascular age-related macular degeneration (n-AMD), proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR), and retinal vein occlusion (RVO).

src: Patients with retinal diseases typically have to undergo multiple injections before achieving the desired therapeutic effect.

src: Each injection incurs the risk of the sight-threatening complications.

src: This review assessed the real-world evidence of the management of macular oedema secondary to branch retinal vein occlusion (BRVO).

src: The mean baseline VA for the pooled data was 54.0 (51.5, 56.5) letters and the mean baseline CST was 501.3 (483.5, 519.1) µm.

bt_tgt: The average baseline VA of the combined data was 54.0 (51.5, 56.5) letters and the average baseline CST was 501.3 (483.5, 519.1) μm.

src: To compare the safety and accuracy of pedicle screw placement assisted by robot system with freehand pedicle screw placement in upper thoracic surgery.
tgt: 比较机器人系统辅助椎弓根螺钉置入与徒手置钉在上胸外科手术中的安全性和准确性。
ref: 比较上胸外科手术中机器人辅助与徒手椎弓根螺钉置入的安全性和准确性。
比较上胸外科手术中机器人辅助与徒手椎弓根螺钉置入的安全性和准确性。
atomic_facts: ['Pedicle screw placement assisted by robot system is compared with freehand pedicle screw placement in upper thoracic surgery.', 'The safety of pedicle screw placement assisted by robot system is being compared with freehand pedicle screw placement in upper thoracic surgery.', 'The accuracy of pedicle screw placement assisted by robot system is being compared with freehand pedicle screw placement in upper thoracic surgery.']
bt_tgt: To compare the safety and accuracy of robotic system-assisted pedicle screw placement versus manual screw placement in upper thoracic surgery.

src: Between December 2017 and December 2019, 39 cases with upper thoracic pedicle screw internal fixation were included in the study, including 19 cases in robot group (group A, robot assisted pedicle screw placement) and 20 cases in freehand group (group B, freehand pedicle screw placement).
tgt: 2017年12月—2019年12月，39例上胸椎椎弓根螺钉内固定术患者纳入研究，其中机器人组（A组，机器人辅助椎弓根螺钉置入）19例，手动组（B组，手动椎弓根螺钉置入）20例。
ref: 2017 年 12 月至 2019 年 12 月，本研究共纳入 39 例胸椎弓根螺钉内固定患者，其中 19 例为机器人组（A 组、机器人辅助椎弓根螺钉置入组），20 例为徒手组（B 组、徒手椎弓根螺钉置入组）。
2017 年 12 月至 2019 年 12 月，39 例胸椎弓根螺钉内固定患者被纳入研究、其中 19 例为机器人组（A 组、机器人辅助椎弓根螺钉置入组），20 例为徒手组（B 组、徒手椎弓根螺钉置入组）。
atomic_facts: ['39 cases with upper thoracic pedicle screw internal fixation were included in the study.', 'The study included 19 cases in robot group (group A, robot assisted pedicle screw placement).', 'The study included 20 cases in freehand group (group B, freehand pedicle screw placement).']
bt_tgt: From December 2017 to December 2019, 39 patients who underwent pedicle screw internal fixation of the upper thoracic spine were included in the study, including 19 patients in the robotic group (Group A, robot-assisted pedicle screw placement) and 20 patients in the manual group (Group B, manual pedicle screw placement).

src: There were 104 screws implanted in group A and 108 screws in group B.

atomic_facts: ['There were 104 screws implanted in group A.', 'There were 108 screws implanted in group B.']
bt_tgt: A total of 104 screws were inserted in group A, and a total of 108 screws were inserted in group B.

src: The influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes on determination of ethanol content in blood sample by headspace gas chromatography was explored under the different detection conditions of KB-BAC1/ KB-BAC2 and J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column.

src: When using KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 gas chromatographic column, the retention time of sevoflurane, isoflurane and ethanol is similar, especially that of sevoflurane and ethanol, and sevoflurane obviously interferes with the determination of ethanol content in blood.

src: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that can seriously affect human health.
tgt: 流感病毒感染是一种可严重影响人类健康的呼吸道传染病。
ref: 流感病毒感染是一种呼吸道传染病，会严重影响人类健康。
流感病毒感染是一种呼吸道传染病，会严重影响人类健康。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease.', 'Influenza virus infection can seriously affect human health.']
bt_tgt: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that can seriously affect human health.

src: Pregnant women, young children, the elderly, and persons with chronic illnesses are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.
tgt: 孕妇、幼儿、老人和慢性病患者感染流感病毒后患重病和死亡的风险很高。
ref: 孕妇、幼儿、老人和慢性病患者是感染流感病毒的高风险人群，他们极有可能感染严重疾病、死亡。
孕妇、幼儿、老人和慢性病患者是感染流感病毒的高风险人群，他们极有可能感染严重疾病和死亡。
atomic_facts: ['Pregnant women are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.', 'Young children are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.', 'The elderly are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.', 'Persons with chronic illnesses are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.']
bt_tgt: Pregnant women, young children, the elderly, and people with chronic medical conditions are at high risk for severe illness and death from influenza viruses.

src: Especially, COVID-19 pandemic might co-circulate with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza in the coming winter-spring season.
tgt: 尤其在即将到来的冬春季节，新型冠状病毒肺炎（COVID-19）可能与流感等其他呼吸道传染病发生交叉传播。
ref: 特别是，在即将到来的冬春季节，COVID-19 大流行可能会与流感等其他呼吸道传染病共同传播。

atomic_facts: ['COVID-19 pandemic might co-circulate with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza in the coming winter-spring season.']
bt_tgt: Especially in the coming winter and spring, the novel coronavirus pneumonia (COVID-19) may be cross-transmitted with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza.

src: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and complications from infection.
tgt: 季节性流感疫苗接种是预防流感病毒感染和感染并发症最有效的方法。
ref: 季节性流感疫苗接种是预防流感病毒感染和感染并发症的最有效方法。

bt_tgt: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and infection complications.

src: Except for a few major cities, influenza vaccine is a category Ⅱ vaccine, which means influenza vaccination is voluntary, and recipients must pay for it.
tgt: 除了几个大城市外，流感疫苗属于二类疫苗，这意味着流感疫苗接种是自愿的，受种者必须付费。

除少数大城市外，流感疫苗属于 II.类疫苗，即自愿接种流感疫苗，且接种者必须付费。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza vaccine is a category Ⅱ vaccine.', 'Influenza vaccination is voluntary.', 'Recipients must pay for influenza vaccination.']
bt_tgt: With the exception of a few major cities, the flu vaccine is a category II vaccine, meaning that flu vaccination is voluntary and recipients must pay.

src: In 2018 and 2019, the China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China" .

src: The recommendations described in this report include the following: Points of Vaccination clinics (PoVs) should provide influenza vaccination to all persons aged 6 months and above who are willing to be vaccinated and do not have contraindications.
tgt: 本报告所述建议包括以下内容：疫苗接种诊所应向愿意接种疫苗且无禁忌症的所有6个月及以上的人提供流感疫苗接种。
ref: 本报告中描述的建议包括以下内容：疫苗接种点诊所 (POV) 应向所有 6 个月及以上愿意接种疫苗、无禁忌症人士提供流感疫苗接种。

atomic_facts: ['The recommendations described in this report include the following.', 'Points of Vaccination clinics (PoVs) should provide influenza vaccination to all persons aged 6 months and above who are willing to be vaccinated and do not have contraindications.']
bt_tgt: Recommendations described in this report include the following: Vaccination clinics should offer influenza vaccination to all persons 6 months of age and older who are willing to be vaccinated and who have no contraindications.

bt_tgt: For all nutrients, more than 60% of participants were classified in the same or adjacent quartile of crude and adjusted intakes.

src: Mostly MVAC or gemcitabine-cisplatin (GC) regimens were used without clear benefit of one regimen over the other.
tgt: La mayoría de los regímenes de MVAC o gemcitabina-cisplatino (GC) se usaron sin un beneficio claro de un régimen sobre el otro.
ref: La mayoría de los regímenes de MVAC o gemcitabina-cisplatino (GC) se utilizaron sin un beneficio claro de un régimen sobre el otro.
atomic_facts: ['Mostly MVAC regimens were used without clear benefit of one regimen over the other.', 'Mostly gemcitabine-cisplatin (GC) regimens were used without clear benefit of one regimen over the other.']
bt_tgt: Most MVAC or gemcitabine-cisplatin (GC) regimens were used with no clear benefit of one regimen over the other.

src: This was an observational epidemiological study conducted in the state of Paraíba.
tgt: Se trata de un estudio epidemiológico observacional realizado en el estado de Paraíba.
ref: Se trata de un estudio epidemiológico observacional realizado en el estado de Paraíba.
atomic_facts: ['This was an observational epidemiological study conducted in the state of Paraíba.']

src: Infant mortality was analyzed with descriptive statistics.

ref: La mortalidad infantil se analizó con estadística descriptiva.
atomic_facts: ['Infant mortality was analyzed with descriptive statistics.',]
bt_tgt: Infant mortality was analyzed with descriptive statistics.

src: However, in line with previous findings and as hypothesised in this review, there were statistically significant correlations found between family life, family separation and mental health outcomes.
tgt: Sin embargo, de acuerdo con hallazgos previos y como se plantea en esta revisión, se encontraron correlaciones estadísticamente significativas entre la vida familiar, la separación familiar y los resultados de salud mental.
ref: Sin embargo, de acuerdo con hallazgos anteriores y según la hipótesis de esta revisión, se encontraron correlaciones estadísticamente significativas entre la vida familiar, la separación familiar y los resultados de salud mental.
atomic_facts: ['There were statistically significant correlations found between family life and mental health outcomes.', 'There were statistically significant correlations found between family separation and mental health outcomes.']
bt_tgt: However, in accordance with previous findings and as proposed in this review, statistically significant correlations were found between family life, family separation and mental health outcomes.

src: Multinominal logistic regression analysis was performed to ascertain significant factors associated with a short hospital stay (less than 48 h).
tgt: Se realizó un análisis de regresión logística multinominal para determinar los factores significativos asociados a una estancia hospitalaria corta (menor a 48 h).
ref: Se llevó a cabo un análisis de regresión logística multinominal para determinar los factores significativos asociados a una estancia hospitalaria corta (inferior a 48 h).
atomic_facts: ['Multinominal logistic regression analysis was performed to ascertain significant factors associated with a short hospital stay.', 'A short hospital stay is less than 48 h.']
bt_tgt: A multinominal logistic regression analysis was performed to determine the significant factors associated with a short hospital stay (less than 48 hours).

src: The current study contributes to a sparse literature on moderators of Functional Family Therapy (FFT) by examining whether responsiveness to FFT, measured by a broad range of outcomes, varies by adolescent gender, age, and their interaction.
tgt: El estudio actual contribuye a una literatura escasa sobre moderadores de Terapia Familiar Funcional (FFT) al examinar si la capacidad de respuesta a FFT, medida por una amplia gama de resultados, varía según el sexo del adolescente, la edad y su interacción.
ref: El estudio actual contribuye a la escasa literatura sobre los moderadores de la Terapia familiar funcional (FFT) al examinar si la capacidad de respuesta a la FFT, medida por una amplia gama de resultados, varía según el sexo del adolescente, la edad y su interacción.
atomic_facts: ['The current study contributes to a sparse literature on moderators of Functional Family Therapy (FFT).', 'The current study examines whether responsiveness to FFT varies by adolescent gender.', 'The current study examines whether responsiveness to FFT varies by adolescent age.', 'The current study examines whether responsiveness to FFT varies by the interaction between adolescent gender and age.', 'The responsiveness to FFT is measured by a broad range of outcomes.']
bt_tgt: The current study contributes to a sparse literature on moderators of Functional Family Therapy (FFT) by examining whether responsiveness to FFT, as measured by a wide range of outcomes, varies by adolescent gender, age, and their interaction.

src: To investigate associations between functioning, community participation, and quality of life (QoL) and identify whether participation mediates the effects of functioning on QoL.
tgt: Investigar las asociaciones entre el funcionamiento, la participación comunitaria y la calidad de vida (CdV) e identificar si la participación media los efectos del funcionamiento sobre la CdV.
ref: Investigar las asociaciones entre la funcionalidad, la participación comunitaria y la calidad de vida (CdV) e identificar si la participación influye en los efectos del funcionamiento sobre la CdV.
Investigar las asociaciones entre la funcionalidad, la participación comunitaria y la calidad de vida (CdV) e identificar si la participación influye en los efectos del funcionamiento sobre la CdV.
atomic_facts: ['To investigate associations between functioning, community participation, and quality of life (QoL).', 'To identify whether participation mediates the effects of functioning on QoL.']
bt_tgt: To investigate associations between functioning, community participation, and quality of life (QoL) and identify whether participation mediates the effects of functioning on QoL.

src: The study aims to evaluate the association between teenage pregnancy and prematurity.

ref: El estudio tiene como objetivo evaluar la asociación entre el embarazo en la adolescencia y la prematuridad.
atomic_facts: ['The study aims to evaluate the association between teenage pregnancy and prematurity.']
bt_tgt: The study aims to evaluate the association between teenage pregnancy and prematurity.

src: The information was obtained from interviews with the mothers during their postpartum hospital stay.
tgt: La información se obtuvo de entrevistas con las madres durante su estancia hospitalaria posparto.
ref: La información se obtuvo de entrevistas con las madres durante su estancia hospitalaria posparto.
atomic_facts: ['The information was obtained from interviews with the mothers during their postpartum hospital stay.']

src: To show two indicators that summarizes the result of the complete circuit primary level-secondary level-primary level.

ref: Mostrar dos indicadores que resumen el resultado del circuito completo de nivel primario-nivel secundario-nivel primario.
