src: An observational prospective cohort study was conducted, with a one-year follow-up of a random sample of the references to general surgery services in a family medicine unit of the IMSS.
tgt: Se realizó un estudio observacional prospectivo de cohortes, con un seguimiento de un año de una muestra aleatoria de las referencias a los servicios de cirugía general en una unidad de medicina familiar del IMSS.
atomic_facts: ['An observational prospective cohort study was conducted.', 'The study had a one-year follow-up of a random sample of the references to general surgery services in a family medicine unit of the IMSS.']
bt_tgt: A prospective observational cohort study was carried out, with a one-year follow-up of a random sample of referrals to general surgery services in a family medicine unit of the IMSS.

src: The indicators were compared by characteristics of the patient and the first level physician.
tgt: Los indicadores se compararon según las características del paciente y del médico de primer nivel.
ref: Los indicadores fueron comparados por las características del paciente y del médico de primer nivel.
atomic_facts: ['The indicators were compared by characteristics of the patient.', 'The indicators were compared by characteristics of the first level physician.']
bt_tgt: The indicators were compared according to the characteristics of the patient and the primary doctor.

src: No statistically significant differences were found according the evaluated characteristics.
tgt: No se encontraron diferencias estadísticamente significativas de acuerdo con las características evaluadas.
ref: No se encontraron diferencias estadísticamente significativas de acuerdo con las características evaluadas.
atomic_facts: ['No statistically significant differences were found according the evaluated characteristics.']
bt_tgt: No statistically significant differences were found according to the characteristics evaluated.

src: The comorbid PTSD clinical features are described.
tgt: Описаны клинические особенности коморбидного ПТСР.
atomic_facts: ['The comorbid PTSD clinical features are described.']
bt_tgt: The clinical features of comorbid PTSD are described.

src: The mental health risk factors for health workers are presented.
tgt: Представлены факторы риска для психического здоровья медицинских работников.
atomic_facts: ['The mental health risk factors for health workers are presented.']
bt_tgt: Risk factors for the mental health of healthcare workers are presented.

src: The psychotherapeutic and psychopharmaceutical approaches are proposed.
tgt: Предложены психотерапевтический и психофармакологический подходы.
atomic_facts: ['The psychotherapeutic approaches are proposed.', 'The psychopharmaceutical approaches are proposed.']
bt_tgt: Psychotherapeutic and psychopharmacological approaches are proposed.

src: However, despite successful use of lithium in the treatment of affective disorders for almost 40 years, the mechanisms of its therapeutic action are still poorly understood.
tgt: Однако, несмотря на успешное применение лития в лечении аффективных расстройств в течение почти 40 лет, механизмы его терапевтического действия до сих пор плохо изучены.
atomic_facts: ['The mechanisms of lithium therapeutic action are still poorly understood.', 'Lithium has been successfully used in treating affective disorders for almost 40 years.']
bt_tgt: However, despite the successful use of lithium in the treatment of mood disorders for almost 40 years, the mechanisms of its therapeutic action are still poorly understood.

src: This review presents and summarizes the current literature about the use of lithium in treatment of affective disorders, as well as its effects on cellular physiology, with a separate description of the effect of this ion on the functioning of nerve tissue and ion-molecular mechanisms.
tgt: В данном обзоре представлена и обобщена современная литература об использовании лития в лечении аффективных расстройств, а также о его влиянии на клеточную физиологию, с отдельным описанием влияния этого иона на функционирование нервной ткани и ионно-молекулярные механизмы.
atomic_facts: ['This review presents the current literature about the use of lithium in treatment of affective disorders.', 'This review summarizes the current literature about the use of lithium in treatment of affective disorders.', 'The effects of lithium on cellular physiology are discussed.', 'There is a separate description of the effect of lithium on the functioning of nerve tissue.', 'There is a separate description of the effect of lithium on ion-molecular mechanisms.']
bt_tgt: This review presents and summarizes the current literature on the use of lithium in the treatment of mood disorders, as well as its effect on cellular physiology, with a separate description of the influence of this ion on the functioning of nervous tissue and ion-molecular mechanisms.

src: The number of COVID-19 patients is increasing worldwide and the number of patients with neurological manifestations of a new coronavirus infection is increasing as well.
tgt: Во всем мире растет число пациентов с COVID-19, а также увеличивается число пациентов с неврологическими проявлениями новой коронавирусной инфекции.
atomic_facts: ['The number of COVID-19 patients is increasing worldwide.', 'The number of patients with neurological manifestations of a new coronavirus infection is increasing as well.']
bt_tgt: The number of patients with COVID-19 is growing around the world, and the number of patients with neurological manifestations of the new coronavirus infection is also increasing.

src: Pathognomonic for COVID-19 is the presence of cephalgic syndrome, infectious-toxic encephalopathy, hypo- and anosmia and ageusia.
tgt: Патогномоничным для COVID-19 симптомом является наличие цефалгического синдрома, инфекционно-токсической энцефалопатии, гипосмии, аносмии и агевзии.
atomic_facts: ['Pathognomonic for COVID-19 is the presence of cephalgic syndrome.', 'Pathognomonic for COVID-19 is the presence of infectious-toxic encephalopathy.', 'Pathognomonic for COVID-19 is the presence of hypo- and anosmia.', 'Pathognomonic for COVID-19 is the presence of ageusia.']
bt_tgt: A symptom pathognomonic for COVID-19 is the presence of cephalgic syndrome, infectious toxic encephalopathy, hyposmia, anosmia and ageusia.

src: There is also a special form of COVID-19-associated stroke.
tgt: Существует также особая форма инсульта, ассоциированная с COVID-19.
atomic_facts: ['There is a special form of COVID-19-associated stroke.']
bt_tgt: There is also a special form of stroke associated with COVID-19.

src: Almost all post-COVID-19 patients complain of severe fatigue, emotional lability, and sometimes have features of asthenic-neurotic, anxiety-phobic disorders and apato-abulic syndromes, which require rehabilitation measures, as well as courses of restorative neurotrophic and nootropic therapy.
tgt: Почти все пациенты, перенесшие COVID-19, жалуются на сильную усталость, эмоциональную лабильность, а иногда имеют признаки астено-невротических, тревожно-фобических расстройств и апато-абулического синдрома, требующих реабилитационных мероприятий, а также курсов восстановительной нейротрофической и ноотропной терапии.
atomic_facts: ['Almost all post-COVID-19 patients complain of severe fatigue.', 'Almost all post-COVID-19 patients complain of emotional lability.', 'Almost all post-COVID-19 patients sometimes have features of asthenic-neurotic, anxiety-phobic disorders.', 'Almost all post-COVID-19 patients sometimes have features of apato-abulic syndromes.', 'Rehabilitation measures are required for post-COVID-19 patients.', 'Courses of restorative neurotrophic therapy are required for post-COVID-19 patients.', 'Courses of nootropic therapy are required for post-COVID-19 patients.']
bt_tgt: Almost all patients who have had COVID-19 complain of severe fatigue, emotional lability, and sometimes have signs of astheno-neurotic, anxiety-phobic disorders and apato-abulic syndrome, requiring rehabilitation measures, as well as courses of restorative neurotrophic and nootropic therapy.

src: There were no established significant differences of quality of life indices according to the EuroQol-5D questionnaire in senior women depending on the number and location of VF, while disturbances of daily activity parameters according to the Roland-Morris questionnaire were found in patients with 2 or more VF.
tgt: Существенных различий в показателях качества жизни по опроснику EuroQol-5D у женщин старшего возраста в зависимости от количества и расположения ПП не выявлено, а у пациенток с 2 и более ПП выявлены нарушения параметров повседневной деятельности по опроснику Роланда — Морриса.
atomic_facts: ['There were no established significant differences of quality of life indices according to the EuroQol-5D questionnaire in senior women depending on the number and location of VF.', 'Disturbances of daily activity parameters according to the Roland-Morris questionnaire were found in patients with 2 or more VF.']
bt_tgt: There were no significant differences in quality of life indicators according to the EuroQol-5D questionnaire in older women, depending on the number and location of PP, and in patients with 2 or more PP, disturbances in the parameters of daily activities were revealed according to the Roland-Morris questionnaire.

src: There is a correlation between the severity of COVID-19 and the severity and frequency of neurologic complications.
tgt: Существует корреляция между тяжестью COVID-19 и степенью и частотой неврологических осложнений.
atomic_facts: ['There is a correlation between the severity of COVID-19 and the frequency of neurologic complications.', 'There is a correlation between the severity of COVID-19 and the severity of neurologic complications.']
bt_tgt: There is a correlation between the severity of COVID-19 and the degree and frequency of neurological complications.

src: Severe neurologic symptoms are primarily observed in patients with severe COVID-19.
tgt: Серьезные неврологические симптомы в первую очередь наблюдаются у пациентов с тяжелым течением COVID-19.
atomic_facts: ['Severe neurologic symptoms are primarily observed in patients with severe COVID-19.']
bt_tgt: Severe neurological symptoms are primarily observed in patients with severe COVID-19.

src: Neurologic-associated symptoms may include stroke, acute necrotizing encephalopathy, and Guillen-Barre syndrome.
tgt: Неврологические симптомы могут включать инсульт, острую некротизирующую энцефалопатию и синдром Гийена — Барре.
atomic_facts: ['Neurologic-associated symptoms may include stroke.', 'Neurologic-associated symptoms may include acute necrotizing encephalopathy.', 'Neurologic-associated symptoms may include Guillen-Barre syndrome.']
bt_tgt: Neurologic symptoms may include stroke, acute necrotizing encephalopathy, and Guillain-Barré syndrome.

src: Diseases that potentially aggravate COVID-19 and increase the risk of neurologic complications include arterial hypertension, diabetes, chronic diseases of the heart and respiratory system.
tgt: Заболевания, которые потенциально усугубляют течение COVID-19 и повышают риск неврологических осложнений, включают артериальную гипертензию, диабет, хронические заболевания сердца и дыхательной системы.
atomic_facts: ['Diseases potentially aggravate COVID-19.', 'Diseases increase the risk of neurologic complications.', 'Diseases include arterial hypertension.', 'Diseases include diabetes.', 'Diseases include chronic diseases of the heart.', 'Diseases include chronic diseases of the respiratory system.']
bt_tgt: Conditions that potentially worsen COVID-19 and increase the risk of neurological complications include hypertension, diabetes, and chronic heart and respiratory diseases.

src: The probable impact of human coronaviruses on chronic and progressive diseases of the nervous system with particular respect to multiple sclerosis is reviewed.
tgt: Рассмотрено вероятное влияние коронавирусов человека на хронические и прогрессирующие заболевания нервной системы, в частности на примере рассеянного склероза.
atomic_facts: ['The probable impact of human coronaviruses on chronic and progressive diseases of the nervous system is reviewed.', 'The probable impact of human coronaviruses on chronic and progressive diseases of the nervous system is with particular respect to multiple sclerosis.']
bt_tgt: The probable impact of human coronaviruses on chronic and progressive diseases of the nervous system is considered, in particular using the example of multiple sclerosis.

src: A triage plan for stroke and MS patients during the COVID-19 pandemic, depending on the risk of coronavirus infection, is presented.
tgt: Представлен план сортировки пациентов, перенесших инсульт, и пациентов с РС во время пандемии COVID-19 в зависимости от риска заражения коронавирусом.
atomic_facts: ['A triage plan for stroke patients is presented.', 'A triage plan for MS patients is presented.', 'The triage plan depends on the risk of coronavirus infection.']
bt_tgt: A triage plan for stroke and MS patients during the COVID-19 pandemic is presented based on their risk of contracting the coronavirus.

src: The high prevalence of the trophic leg ulcers necessitates the search for more effective methods of conservative treatment.
tgt: Высокая распространенность трофических язв нижних конечностей обуславливает необходимость поиска более эффективных методов консервативного лечения.
atomic_facts: ['The high prevalence of the trophic leg ulcers necessitates the search for more effective methods of conservative treatment.']
bt_tgt: The high prevalence of trophic ulcers of the lower extremities necessitates the search for more effective methods of conservative treatment.

src: Development and scientific justification for the low-intensity laser radiation of different wavelengths combined use in patients with trophic leg ulcers and chronic venous insufficiency (CVI). 102 patients with trophic leg ulcers and CVI were examined.
tgt: Разработка и научное обоснование комбинированного применения низкоинтенсивного лазерного излучения разных длин волн у пациентов с трофическими язвами нижних конечностей на фоне хронической венозной недостаточности (ХВН). Обследованы 102 пациента с трофическими язвами нижних конечностей на фоне ХВН.
atomic_facts: ['Development is scientific justification for low-intensity laser radiation of different wavelengths combined use in patients with trophic leg ulcers and chronic venous insufficiency.', '102 patients with trophic leg ulcers and chronic venous insufficiency were examined.']
bt_tgt: Development and scientific substantiation of the combined use of low-intensity laser radiation of different wavelengths in patients with trophic ulcers of the lower extremities against the background of chronic venous insufficiency (CVI). 102 patients with trophic ulcers of the lower extremities due to CVI were examined.

src: They were divided into 3 equal groups using simple randomization.
tgt: Они были разделены на 3 равные группы методом простой рандомизации.
atomic_facts: ['They were divided into 3 equal groups using simple randomization.']
bt_tgt: They were divided into 3 equal groups using simple randomization.

src: Patients in the control group received only traditional conservative therapy; comparison group - traditional conservative therapy and an intravenous laser blood irradiation (ILBI) (λ - 635 nm); the main group - traditional conservative therapy and different wavelengths laser therapy (LT) course.
tgt: В контрольной группе пациенты получали только традиционную консервативную терапию, в группе сравнения — традиционную консервативную терапию и курс процедур внутривенного лазерного облучения крови (ВЛОК) (λ — 635 нм); в основной группе — традиционную консервативную терапию и курс процедур лазеротерапии (ЛТ) разных длин волн.
atomic_facts: ['Patients in the control group received only traditional conservative therapy.', 'Comparison group received traditional conservative therapy and an intravenous laser blood irradiation (ILBI) (λ - 635 nm).', 'Main group received traditional conservative therapy and different wavelengths laser therapy (LT) course.']
bt_tgt: In the control group, patients received only traditional conservative therapy, in the comparison group - traditional conservative therapy and a course of intravenous laser blood irradiation (ILBI) procedures (λ - 635 nm); in the main group - traditional conservative therapy and a course of laser therapy (LT) procedures of different wavelengths.

src: A more significant improvement in the clinical condition occurred under the influence of the course application of combined different wavelengths laser therapy in patients with trophic venous leg ulcers.
tgt: Более значительное улучшение клинического состояния произошло под воздействием курсового применения комбинированной лазеротерапии разной длины волны у больных с трофическими венозными язвами нижних конечностей.
atomic_facts: ['A more significant improvement in the clinical condition occurred under the influence of the course application of combined different wavelengths laser therapy.', 'The patients had trophic venous leg ulcers.']
bt_tgt: A more significant improvement in the clinical condition occurred under the influence of a course of combined laser therapy of different wavelengths in patients with trophic venous ulcers of the lower extremities.

src: Compared to patients who received traditional conservative therapy and in combination with ILBI 635 nm, the speed of reparative regeneration of trophic ulcers increased, the time for cleansing trophic ulcers from devitalized tissues was reduced.
tgt: По сравнению с пациентами, получавшими традиционную консервативную терапию и в комплексе с ВЛОК 635 нм, увеличивалась скорость репаративной регенерации трофических язв, сокращалось время очищения трофических язв от девитализированных тканей.
atomic_facts: ['The speed of reparative regeneration of trophic ulcers increased.', 'The time for cleansing trophic ulcers from devitalized tissues was reduced.', 'Patients who received traditional conservative therapy and ILBI 635 nm showed an increased speed of reparative regeneration of trophic ulcers.', 'Patients who received traditional conservative therapy and ILBI 635 nm showed reduced time for cleansing trophic ulcers from devitalized tissues.']
bt_tgt: Compared with patients receiving traditional conservative therapy and in combination with ILBI 635 nm, the rate of reparative regeneration of trophic ulcers increased, and the time for clearing trophic ulcers from devitalized tissues was reduced.

src: Computer capillaroscopy data showed that the positive effect of laser exposure on all parts of the microcirculation underlies its therapeutic efficacy.
tgt: Данные компьютерной капилляроскопии показали, что в основе терапевтической эффективности лазерного воздействия лежит его положительное влияние на все звенья микроциркуляции.
atomic_facts: ['Computer capillaroscopy data showed that the positive effect of laser exposure underlies its therapeutic efficacy.', 'Computer capillaroscopy data showed that the positive effect of laser exposure is on all parts of the microcirculation.']
bt_tgt: Computer capillaroscopy data showed that the therapeutic effectiveness of laser exposure is based on its positive effect on all parts of microcirculation.

src: This classification versus the 2010 edition underwent substantial changes.
tgt: В классификации произошли значительные изменения по сравнению с редакцией 2010 г.
atomic_facts: ['This classification underwent substantial changes.', 'The 2010 edition underwent substantial changes.']
bt_tgt: There have been significant changes in the classification compared to the 2010 edition.

src: Undifferentiated carcinoma (ICD-0: 8020/3) was excluded.
tgt: Недифференцированная карцинома (МКБ-0: 8020/3) была исключена.
atomic_facts: ['Undifferentiated carcinoma was excluded.', 'ICD-0: 8020/3 was excluded.']
bt_tgt: Undifferentiated carcinoma (ICD-0: 8020/3) was excluded.

src: The TNM staging system introduces additional gradations.
tgt: В системе стадирования TNM введены дополнительные градации.
atomic_facts: ['The TNM staging system introduces additional gradations.']
bt_tgt: Additional gradations have been introduced in the TNM staging system.

src: Based on new evidence, HCC types and subtypes (scirrhous, clear cell, steatohepatic, and others) were identified depending on gene mutations according to ICD-11.
tgt: На основе новых данных типы и подтипы ГЦК (скиррозный, светлоклеточный, стеатогепатитный и другие) были идентифицированы в зависимости от генных мутаций в соответствии с МКБ-11.
atomic_facts: ['HCC types were identified depending on gene mutations according to ICD-11.', 'HCC subtypes (scirrhous, clear cell, steatohepatic, and others) were identified depending on gene mutations according to ICD-11.']
bt_tgt: Based on new data, the types and subtypes of HCC (scirrhotic, clear cell, steatohepatitis and others) were identified depending on gene mutations in accordance with ICD-11.

src: The classification changes are of not only important theoretical, but also applied significance.
tgt: Изменения в классификации имеют не только важное теоретическое, но и прикладное значение.
atomic_facts: ['The classification changes are of important theoretical significance.', 'The classification changes are of applied significance.']
bt_tgt: Changes in classification have not only important theoretical, but also applied significance.

src: These are valuable for oncologists and pathologists.
tgt: Они важны для онкологов и патологоанатомов.
atomic_facts: ['These are valuable for oncologists.', 'These are valuable for pathologists.']
bt_tgt: They are important for oncologists and pathologists.

src: To date, descriptive results of a clinical and morphological study of novel coronavirus COVID-19 infection, mainly of the lungs, have appeared.

src: However, in other organs, primarily in the cardiovascular system, there are substantial structural changes that lead to multiple organ dysfunction and contribute to death.

src: The investigators carried out a comprehensive analysis of 700 autopsies of people disease from the novel coronavirus COVID-19 infection, which included an examination of gross changes reflected in the autopsy protocols and forensic medical examination reports, as well as that of microscopic changes detected during histological examination of organs.
tgt: Исследователи выполнили комплексный анализ 700 аутопсий пациентов с новой коронавирусной инфекцией COVID-19, включая изучение макроскопических изменений, отраженных в протоколах патолого-анатомических вскрытий и судебно-медицинских актах, а также микроскопических изменений, выявленных при гистологическом исследовании органов.

bt_tgt: The researchers performed a comprehensive analysis of 700 autopsies of patients with the new coronavirus infection COVID-19, including a study of macroscopic changes reflected in autopsy reports and forensic reports, as well as microscopic changes identified during histological examination of organs.

src: The novel coronavirus COVID-19 infection was the primary cause of death.
tgt: Основной причиной смерти стала новая коронавирусная инфекция COVID-19.
atomic_facts: ['The novel coronavirus COVID-19 infection was the primary cause of death.']
bt_tgt: The main cause of death was the new coronavirus infection COVID-19.

src: Acute respiratory and pulmonary heart failure and multiple organ dysfunction became the leading thanatogenetic mechanisms in COVID-19.
tgt: Ведущими танатогенетическими механизмами при COVID-19 стали острая дыхательная и легочно-сердечная недостаточность, полиорганная дисфункция.
atomic_facts: ['Acute respiratory failure became the leading thanatogenetic mechanism in COVID-19.', 'Pulmonary heart failure became the leading thanatogenetic mechanism in COVID-19.', 'Multiple organ dysfunction became the leading thanatogenetic mechanism in COVID-19.']
bt_tgt: The leading thanatogenetic mechanisms for COVID-19 are acute respiratory and pulmonary-cardiac failure, and multiple organ dysfunction.

src: Cardiovascular disease, diabetes mellitus, and obesity were the most common diseases in patients with COVID-19.
tgt: Наиболее частыми заболеваниями у пациентов с COVID-19 были сердечно-сосудистая патология, сахарный диабет и ожирение.
atomic_facts: ['Cardiovascular disease was one of the most common diseases in patients with COVID-19.', 'Diabetes mellitus was one of the most common diseases in patients with COVID-19.', 'Obesity was one of the most common diseases in patients with COVID-19.']
bt_tgt: The most common diseases in patients with COVID-19 were cardiovascular pathology, diabetes mellitus and obesity.

src: The most pronounced lung changes in COVID-19 were determined with a predominance of multiple total bilateral lesions of the lower lobes of the lungs, which was manifested by virus-induced changes in the parenchyma and stroma, as well as by microcirculation disorders.
tgt: Наиболее выраженные изменения в легких при COVID-19 определялись с преобладанием множественных общих двусторонних поражений нижних долей легких, что проявлялось вирусноиндуцированными изменениями паренхимы и стромы, а также нарушениями микроциркуляции.
atomic_facts: ['The most pronounced lung changes in COVID-19 were determined with a predominance of multiple total bilateral lesions of the lower lobes of the lungs.', 'The lung changes were manifested by virus-induced changes in the parenchyma and stroma.', 'The lung changes were manifested by microcirculation disorders.']
bt_tgt: The most pronounced changes in the lungs during COVID-19 were determined by the predominance of multiple general bilateral lesions of the lower lobes of the lungs, which was manifested by virus-induced changes in the parenchyma and stroma, as well as microcirculation disorders.

src: Acute dyscirculatory and ischemic changes in the parenchymal organs dominated in tissue damage caused by the virus.
tgt: В паренхиматозных органах доминировали острые дисциркуляторные и ишемические изменения на фоне вирусного поражения тканей.
atomic_facts: ['Acute dyscirculatory changes dominated in tissue damage caused by the virus.', 'Ischemic changes dominated in tissue damage caused by the virus.', 'Parenchymal organs were affected by tissue damage caused by the virus.']
bt_tgt: In parenchymal organs, acute discirculatory and ischemic changes dominated against the background of viral tissue damage.

src: The changes in different organs of those who have died from the new coronavirus COVID-19 infection are stereotyped and include the manifestations of virus-induced action and a systemic inflammatory response with mainly microvasculature alteration, which leads to the development of coagulopathies and, accordingly, to total hypoxia.
tgt: Изменения в различных органах умерших от новой коронавирусной инфекции COVID-19 носят стереотипный характер и включают в себя проявления вирусиндуцированного действия и системного воспалительного ответа с преимущественно микроциркуляторным изменением, что приводит к развитию коагулопатий и, соответственно, к тотальной гипоксии.
atomic_facts: ['The changes in different organs of those who have died from the new coronavirus COVID-19 infection are stereotyped.', 'The changes include the manifestations of virus-induced action.', 'The changes include a systemic inflammatory response with mainly microvasculature alteration.', 'The changes lead to the development of coagulopathies.', 'The changes lead to total hypoxia.']
bt_tgt: Changes in various organs of those who died from the new coronavirus infection COVID-19 are stereotypical and include manifestations of a virus-induced action and a systemic inflammatory response with predominantly microcirculatory changes, which leads to the development of coagulopathies and, accordingly, total hypoxia.

src: We calculated the relative change in importation risk under three different hypothetical scenarios that all resulted in different passenger volumes.

src: The hypothetical variations in observed travel restrictions were not sufficient to prevent the global spread of SARS-CoV-2; further research should also consider travel by land and sea.

src: However, despite successful use of lithium in the treatment of affective disorders for almost 40 years, the mechanisms of its therapeutic action are still poorly understood.

src: This review presents and summarizes the current literature about the use of lithium in treatment of affective disorders, as well as its effects on cellular physiology, with a separate description of the effect of this ion on the functioning of nerve tissue and ion-molecular mechanisms.
tgt: В данном обзоре представлена и обобщена современная литература об использовании лития в лечении аффективных расстройств, а также его влиянии на клеточную физиологию, с отдельным описанием влияния этого иона на функционирование нервной ткани и ионно-молекулярные механизмы.

bt_tgt: This review presents and summarizes the current literature on the use of lithium in the treatment of mood disorders, as well as its effect on cellular physiology, with a separate description of the influence of this ion on the functioning of nervous tissue and ion-molecular mechanisms.

src: The number of COVID-19 patients is increasing worldwide and the number of patients with neurological manifestations of a new coronavirus infection is increasing as well.

src: Pathognomonic for COVID-19 is the presence of cephalgic syndrome, infectious-toxic encephalopathy, hypo- and anosmia and ageusia.

bt_tgt: There is also a special form of stroke associated with COVID-19.

src: Almost all post-COVID-19 patients complain of severe fatigue, emotional lability, and sometimes have features of asthenic-neurotic, anxiety-phobic disorders and apato-abulic syndromes, which require rehabilitation measures, as well as courses of restorative neurotrophic and nootropic therapy.
tgt: Почти все пациенты, перенесшие COVID-19, жалуются на сильную усталость, эмоциональную лабильность, а иногда имеют признаки астено-невротических, тревожно-фобических расстройств и апато-абулического синдрома, требующих реабилитационных мероприятий, а также курсов восстановительной нейротрофической и ноотропной терапии.
atomic_facts: ['Almost all post-COVID-19 patients complain of severe fatigue, emotional lability, and sometimes have features of asthenic-neurotic disorders.', 'Almost all post-COVID-19 patients complain of anxiety-phobic disorders.', 'Almost all post-COVID-19 patients complain of apato-abulic syndromes.', 'These conditions require rehabilitation measures.', 'These conditions require courses of restorative neurotrophic therapy.', 'These conditions require courses of nootropic therapy.']
bt_tgt: Almost all patients who have had COVID-19 complain of severe fatigue, emotional lability, and sometimes have signs of astheno-neurotic, anxiety-phobic disorders and apato-abulic syndrome, requiring rehabilitation measures, as well as courses of restorative neurotrophic and nootropic therapy.

src: It was found that the intensity of pain in thoracic and lumbar spines, according to McGill pain index, was significantly higher in patients with two or more VF compared to women without any fractures, and absence of differences in subjects with a single VF.
tgt: Было обнаружено, что интенсивность боли в грудном и поясничном отделах позвоночника, согласно опроснику Мак-Гилла по установлению интенсивности боли, была достоверно выше у пациенток с двумя и более ПП по сравнению с женщинами без переломов, а при единичном ПП различия у субъектов отсутствовали.
atomic_facts:
['The intensity of pain in thoracic spines, according to McGill pain index, was significantly higher in patients with two or more VF compared to women without any fractures.',
'The intensity of pain in lumbar spines, according to McGill pain index, was significantly higher in patients with two or more VF compared to women without any fractures.',
'No differences in pain intensity were found in subjects with a single VF compared to women without any fractures.']
bt_tgt: It was found that the intensity of pain in the thoracic and lumbar spine, according to the McGill Pain Intensity Questionnaire, was significantly higher in patients with two or more PPs compared to women without fractures, and there were no differences between subjects with a single PP.

src: There were no established significant differences of quality of life indices according to the EuroQol-5D questionnaire in senior women depending on the number and location of VF, while disturbances of daily activity parameters according to the Roland-Morris questionnaire were found in patients with 2 or more VF.
tgt: Существенных различий в показателях качества жизни по опроснику EuroQol-5D у женщин старшего возраста в зависимости от количества и расположения ПП не выявлено, а у пациенток с 2 и более ПП выявлены нарушения параметров повседневной деятельности по опроснику Роланда-Морриса.
atomic_facts: ['There were no established significant differences of quality of life indices according to the EuroQol-5D questionnaire in senior women depending on the number and location of VF.', 'Disturbances of daily activity parameters according to the Roland-Morris questionnaire were found in patients with 2 or more VF.']
bt_tgt: There were no significant differences in quality of life indicators according to the EuroQol-5D questionnaire in older women, depending on the number and location of PP, and in patients with 2 or more PP, disturbances in the parameters of daily activities were revealed according to the Roland-Morris questionnaire.

src: The authors review the literature and own clinical case with respect to nervous system involvement in COVID-19 patients.
tgt: Авторы анализируют литературу и собственный клинический случай в отношении вовлечения нервной системы у пациентов с COVID-19.
atomic_facts: ['The authors review the literature with respect to nervous system involvement in COVID-19 patients.', 'The authors review their own clinical case with respect to nervous system involvement in COVID-19 patients.']
bt_tgt: The authors analyze the literature and their own clinical case regarding the involvement of the nervous system in patients with COVID-19.

src: There is a correlation between the severity of COVID-19 and the severity and frequency of neurologic complications.
tgt: Существует корреляция между тяжестью COVID-19 и степенью и частотой неврологических осложнений.
atomic_facts: ['There is a correlation between the severity of COVID-19 and the severity of neurologic complications.', 'There is a correlation between the severity of COVID-19 and the frequency of neurologic complications.']
bt_tgt: There is a correlation between the severity of COVID-19 and the degree and frequency of neurological complications.

src: Severe neurologic symptoms are primarily observed in patients with severe COVID-19.
tgt: Серьезные неврологические симптомы в первую очередь наблюдаются у пациентов с тяжелым течением COVID-19.
atomic_facts: ['Severe neurologic symptoms are primarily observed in patients with severe COVID-19.']
bt_tgt: Severe neurological symptoms are primarily observed in patients with severe COVID-19.

src: Neurologic-associated symptoms may include stroke, acute necrotizing encephalopathy, and Guillen-Barre syndrome.
tgt: Неврологические симптомы могут включать инсульт, острую некротизирующую энцефалопатию и синдром Гийена-Барре.
atomic_facts: ['Neurologic-associated symptoms may include stroke.', 'Neurologic-associated symptoms may include acute necrotizing encephalopathy.', 'Neurologic-associated symptoms may include Guillen-Barre syndrome.']
bt_tgt: Neurologic symptoms may include stroke, acute necrotizing encephalopathy, and Guillain-Barré syndrome.

src: Diseases that potentially aggravate COVID-19 and increase the risk of neurologic complications include arterial hypertension, diabetes, chronic diseases of the heart and respiratory system.
tgt: Заболевания, которые потенциально усугубляют COVID-19 и повышают риск неврологических осложнений, включают артериальную гипертензию, диабет, хронические заболевания сердца и дыхательной системы.
atomic_facts: ['Diseases potentially aggravate COVID-19 and increase the risk of neurologic complications include arterial hypertension.', 'Diseases potentially aggravate COVID-19 and increase the risk of neurologic complications include diabetes.', 'Diseases potentially aggravate COVID-19 and increase the risk of neurologic complications include chronic diseases of the heart.', 'Diseases potentially aggravate COVID-19 and increase the risk of neurologic complications include chronic diseases of the respiratory system.']
bt_tgt: Conditions that potentially worsen COVID-19 and increase the risk of neurological complications include hypertension, diabetes, and chronic heart and respiratory disease.

src: The probable impact of human coronaviruses on chronic and progressive diseases of the nervous system with particular respect to multiple sclerosis is reviewed.
tgt: Рассмотрено вероятное влияние коронавирусов человека на хронические и прогрессирующие заболевания нервной системы, особенно в отношении рассеянного склероза.
atomic_facts: ['The probable impact of human coronaviruses on chronic diseases of the nervous system is reviewed.', 'The probable impact of human coronaviruses on progressive diseases of the nervous system is reviewed.', 'The probable impact of human coronaviruses on diseases of the nervous system with particular respect to multiple sclerosis is reviewed.']
bt_tgt: The likely impact of human coronaviruses on chronic and progressive diseases of the nervous system, especially in relation to multiple sclerosis, is considered.

src: A triage plan for stroke and MS patients during the COVID-19 pandemic, depending on the risk of coronavirus infection, is presented.
tgt: Представлен план сортировки пациентов, перенесших инсульт, и пациентов с РС во время пандемии COVID-19 в зависимости от риска заражения коронавирусом.
atomic_facts: ['A triage plan is presented.', 'The triage plan is for stroke patients.', 'The triage plan is for MS patients.', 'The triage plan is during the COVID-19 pandemic.', 'The triage plan depends on the risk of coronavirus infection.']
bt_tgt: A triage plan for stroke and MS patients during the COVID-19 pandemic is presented based on their risk of contracting the coronavirus.

src: New prospects associated with the use of laser radiation of different wavelengths in the ultraviolet (365 nm) and the green emission spectrum (525 nm) have appeared in recent years.
tgt: В последние годы появились новые перспективы, связанные с использованием лазерного излучения разных длин волн в ультрафиолетовом (365 нм) и зеленом спектре излучения (525 нм).
atomic_facts: ['New prospects have appeared in recent years.', 'The use of laser radiation of different wavelengths in the ultraviolet (365 nm) has appeared in recent years.', 'The use of laser radiation of different wavelengths in the green emission spectrum (525 nm) has appeared in recent years.']
bt_tgt: In recent years, new prospects have emerged related to the use of laser radiation of different wavelengths in the ultraviolet (365 nm) and green radiation spectrum (525 nm).

src: The high prevalence of the trophic leg ulcers necessitates the search for more effective methods of conservative treatment.
tgt: Высокая распространенность трофических язв нижних конечностей обуславливает необходимость поиска более эффективных методов консервативного лечения.
atomic_facts: ['The high prevalence of the trophic leg ulcers necessitates the search for more effective methods of conservative treatment.']
bt_tgt: The high prevalence of trophic ulcers of the lower extremities necessitates the search for more effective methods of conservative treatment.

src: Development and scientific justification for the low-intensity laser radiation of different wavelengths combined use in patients with trophic leg ulcers and chronic venous insufficiency (CVI). 102 patients with trophic leg ulcers and CVI were examined.
tgt: Разработка и научное обоснование комбинированного применения низкоинтенсивного лазерного излучения разных длин волн у пациентов с трофическими язвами нижних конечностей на фоне хронической венозной недостаточности (ХВН). Обследованы 102 пациента с трофическими язвами нижних конечностей на фоне ХВН.
atomic_facts: ['Development and scientific justification for the low-intensity laser radiation of different wavelengths combined use in patients with trophic leg ulcers and chronic venous insufficiency (CVI).', '102 patients with trophic leg ulcers and CVI were examined.']
bt_tgt: Development and scientific substantiation of the combined use of low-intensity laser radiation of different wavelengths in patients with trophic ulcers of the lower extremities against the background of chronic venous insufficiency (CVI). 102 patients with trophic ulcers of the lower extremities due to CVI were examined.

src: They were divided into 3 equal groups using simple randomization.
tgt: Они были разделены на 3 равные группы методом простой рандомизации.
atomic_facts: ['They were divided into 3 equal groups using simple randomization.']
bt_tgt: They were divided into 3 equal groups using simple randomization.

src: Patients in the control group received only traditional conservative therapy; comparison group - traditional conservative therapy and an intravenous laser blood irradiation (ILBI) (λ - 635 nm); the main group - traditional conservative therapy and different wavelengths laser therapy (LT) course.
tgt: В контрольной группе пациенты получали только традиционную консервативную терапию, в группе сравнения — традиционную консервативную терапию и курс процедур внутривенного лазерного облучения крови (ВЛОК) (λ — 635 нм); в основной группе — традиционную консервативную терапию и курс процедур лазеротерапии (ЛТ) разных длин волн.
atomic_facts: ['Patients in the control group received only traditional conservative therapy.', 'Comparison group received traditional conservative therapy and an intravenous laser blood irradiation (ILBI) (λ - 635 nm).', 'Main group received traditional conservative therapy and different wavelengths laser therapy (LT) course.']
bt_tgt: In the control group, patients received only traditional conservative therapy, in the comparison group - traditional conservative therapy and a course of intravenous laser blood irradiation (ILBI) procedures (λ - 635 nm); in the main group - traditional conservative therapy and a course of laser therapy (LT) procedures of different wavelengths.

src: A more significant improvement in the clinical condition occurred under the influence of the course application of combined different wavelengths laser therapy in patients with trophic venous leg ulcers.
tgt: Более значительное улучшение клинического состояния произошло под воздействием курсового применения комбинированной лазеротерапии разной длины волны у больных с трофическими венозными язвами нижних конечностей.
atomic_facts: ['A more significant improvement in the clinical condition occurred under the influence of the course application of combined different wavelengths laser therapy.', 'The patients have trophic venous leg ulcers.']
bt_tgt: A more significant improvement in the clinical condition occurred under the influence of a course of combined laser therapy of different wavelengths in patients with trophic venous ulcers of the lower extremities.

src: Compared to patients who received traditional conservative therapy and in combination with ILBI 635 nm, the speed of reparative regeneration of trophic ulcers increased, the time for cleansing trophic ulcers from devitalized tissues was reduced.
tgt: По сравнению с пациентами, получавшими традиционную консервативную терапию и в комплексе с ВЛОК 635 нм, увеличивалась скорость репаративной регенерации трофических язв, сокращалось время очищения трофических язв от девитализированных тканей.
atomic_facts: ['Compared to patients who received traditional conservative therapy and in combination with ILBI 635 nm, the speed of reparative regeneration of trophic ulcers increased.', 'The time for cleansing trophic ulcers from devitalized tissues was reduced.']
bt_tgt: Compared with patients receiving traditional conservative therapy and in combination with ILBI 635 nm, the rate of reparative regeneration of trophic ulcers increased, and the time for clearing trophic ulcers from devitalized tissues was reduced.

src: Computer capillaroscopy data showed that the positive effect of laser exposure on all parts of the microcirculation underlies its therapeutic efficacy.
tgt: Данные компьютерной капилляроскопии показали, что в основе терапевтической эффективности лазерного воздействия лежит его положительное влияние на все звенья микроциркуляции.
atomic_facts: ['Computer capillaroscopy data showed that the positive effect of laser exposure on all parts of the microcirculation underlies its therapeutic efficacy.']
bt_tgt: Computer capillaroscopy data showed that the therapeutic effectiveness of laser exposure is based on its positive effect on all parts of microcirculation.

src: The WHO Classification of Digestive System Tumors (WHO, 5th Edition, 2019) presents new provisions on the morphological, molecular genetic, and therapeutic aspects of hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC).
tgt: Классификация ВОЗ опухолей пищеварительной системы (ВОЗ, 5-е издание, 2019 г.) представляет новые положения о морфологических, молекулярно-генетических и терапевтических аспектах гепатоцеллюлярной карциномы (ГЦК).
atomic_facts: ['The WHO Classification of Digestive System Tumors presents new provisions on the morphological aspects of hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC).', 'The WHO Classification of Digestive System Tumors presents new provisions on the molecular genetic aspects of hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC).', 'The WHO Classification of Digestive System Tumors presents new provisions on the therapeutic aspects of hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC).', 'The WHO Classification of Digestive System Tumors is in its 5th Edition, 2019.']
bt_tgt: The WHO Classification of Tumors of the Digestive System (WHO, 5th edition, 2019) introduces new provisions on the morphological, molecular genetic and therapeutic aspects of hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC).

src: This classification versus the 2010 edition underwent substantial changes.
tgt: В классификации произошли значительные изменения по сравнению с редакцией 2010 г.
atomic_facts: ['This classification underwent substantial changes.', 'The 2010 edition underwent substantial changes.']
bt_tgt: There have been significant changes in the classification compared to the 2010 edition.

src: Undifferentiated carcinoma (ICD-0: 8020/3) was excluded.
tgt: Недифференцированная карцинома (МКБ-0: 8020/3) была исключена.
atomic_facts: ['Undifferentiated carcinoma was excluded.', '(ICD-0: 8020/3) was excluded.']
bt_tgt: Undifferentiated carcinoma (ICD-0: 8020/3) was excluded.

src: The TNM staging system introduces additional gradations.
tgt: Система стадирования TNM вводит дополнительные градации.
atomic_facts: ['The TNM staging system introduces additional gradations.']
bt_tgt: The TNM staging system introduces additional gradations.

src: Based on new evidence, HCC types and subtypes (scirrhous, clear cell, steatohepatic, and others) were identified depending on gene mutations according to ICD-11.
tgt: На основе новых данных типы и подтипы ГЦК (скиррозный, светлоклеточный, стеатогепатический и другие) были идентифицированы в зависимости от генных мутаций в соответствии с МКБ-11.
atomic_facts: ['HCC types were identified depending on gene mutations according to ICD-11.', 'HCC subtypes (scirrhous, clear cell, steatohepatic, and others) were identified depending on gene mutations according to ICD-11.']
bt_tgt: Based on new data, the types and subtypes of HCC (scirrhotic, clear cell, steatohepatic and others) were identified depending on gene mutations in accordance with ICD-11.

src: The classification changes are of not only important theoretical, but also applied significance.
tgt: Изменения в классификации имеют не только важное теоретическое, но и прикладное значение.
atomic_facts: ['The classification changes are of important theoretical significance.', 'The classification changes are of applied significance.']
bt_tgt: Changes in classification have not only important theoretical, but also applied significance.

src: These are valuable for oncologists and pathologists.
tgt: Они важны для онкологов и патологоанатомов.
atomic_facts: ['These are valuable for oncologists.', 'These are valuable for pathologists.']
bt_tgt: They are important for oncologists and pathologists.

src: The use of innovative rehabilitation technologies, namely «thresholdless» low-frequency transcranial magnetic stimulation, will speed up the process of restoring impaired functions, increase independence in everyday life and, accordingly, the quality of life.
tgt: Использование инновационных реабилитационных технологий, а именно «беспороговой» низкочастотной транскраниальной магнитной стимуляции, ускорит процесс восстановления нарушенных функций, повысит самостоятельность в повседневной жизни и, соответственно, качество жизни.
atomic_facts:
['The use of innovative rehabilitation technologies will speed up the process of restoring impaired functions.',
 'The use of innovative rehabilitation technologies will increase independence in everyday life.',
 'The use of innovative rehabilitation technologies will increase the quality of life.',
 'Innovative rehabilitation technologies namely 'thresholdless' low-frequency transcranial magnetic stimulation.']
bt_tgt: The use of innovative rehabilitation technologies, namely “threshold-free” low-frequency transcranial magnetic stimulation, will speed up the process of restoration of impaired functions, increase independence in everyday life and, accordingly, quality of life.

src: The study included 93 patients aged from 49 to 68 years on second-third days of ischemic stroke.
tgt: В исследование были включены 93 пациента в возрасте от 49 до 68 лет на второй-третий день ишемического инсульта.
atomic_facts: ['The study included 93 patients aged from 49 to 68 years on second-third days of ischemic stroke.']
bt_tgt: The study included 93 patients aged 49 to 68 years on the second or third day of ischemic stroke.

src: The 1st (main) group
tgt: 1-я (основная) группа
atomic_facts: ['The 1st group is the main group.']
bt_tgt: 1st (main) group

src: This article deals with the bibliographic information relating to the Saratov period of life of Alexander Nikolayevich Bakulev, his scientific and practical activity at the Department of Hospital Surgery of the Saratov Medical University under the leadership of the Department's founder, Sergey Ivanovich Spasokukotsky having exerted the key influence on the formation of A.N. Bakulev as a surgeon and scientist.
tgt: В статье рассматриваются библиографические сведения о саратовском периоде жизни Александра Николаевича Бакулева, его научно-практической деятельности на кафедре госпитальной хирургии Саратовского медицинского университета под руководством основателя кафедры Сергея Ивановича Спасокукоцкого, оказавшей ключевое влияние на становление А.Н. Бакулева как хирурга и ученого.
atomic_facts: ['This article deals with the bibliographic information relating to the Saratov period of life of Alexander Nikolayevich Bakulev.', 'His scientific and practical activity at the Department of Hospital Surgery of the Saratov Medical University was under the leadership of the Department\'s founder, Sergey Ivanovich Spasokukotsky.', 'Sergey Ivanovich Spasokukotsky exerted key influence on the formation of A.N. Bakulev as a surgeon and scientist.']
bt_tgt: The article discusses bibliographic information about the Saratov period of the life of Alexander Nikolaevich Bakulev, his scientific and practical activities at the Department of Hospital Surgery of the Saratov Medical University under the leadership of the founder of the department Sergei Ivanovich Spasokukotsky, which had a key influence on the formation of A.N. Bakulev as a surgeon and scientist.

src: Night work provides biorhythms desynchronization, disorder of melatonin-producing function and accelerated pineal gland aging.
tgt: Работа в ночное время приводит к десинхронизации биоритмов, нарушению выработки мелатонина и преждевременному старению эпифиза.
atomic_facts: ['Night work provides biorhythms desynchronization.', 'Night work provides disorder of melatonin-producing function.', 'Night work provides accelerated pineal gland aging.']
bt_tgt: Working at night leads to desynchronization of biorhythms, disruption of melatonin production and premature aging of the pineal gland.

src: To date, descriptive results of a clinical and morphological study of novel coronavirus COVID-19 infection, mainly of the lungs, have appeared.
tgt: На сегодняшний день появились описательные результаты клинико-морфологического исследования новой коронавирусной инфекции COVID-19, преимущественно касательно легких.
atomic_facts: ['Descriptive results have appeared of a clinical and morphological study of novel coronavirus COVID-19 infection.', 'The study mainly focused on the lungs.']
bt_tgt: To date, descriptive results of a clinical and morphological study of the new coronavirus infection COVID-19 have appeared, mainly regarding the lungs.

src: However, in other organs, primarily in the cardiovascular system, there are substantial structural changes that lead to multiple organ dysfunction and contribute to death.
tgt: Однако в других органах, прежде всего в сердечно-сосудистой системе, происходят значительные структурные изменения, которые приводят к полиорганной дисфункции и вызывают летальный исход.
atomic_facts: ['In other organs, primarily in the cardiovascular system, there are substantial structural changes.', 'The structural changes lead to multiple organ dysfunction.', 'The structural changes contribute to death.']
bt_tgt: However, in other organs, primarily in the cardiovascular system, significant structural changes occur, which lead to multiple organ dysfunction and cause death.

src: To analyze the thanatogenetic significance of novel coronavirus COVID-19 infection in different age and gender groups and to describe the main morphopathological manifestations in various organs.
tgt: Проанализировать танатогенетическую роль новой коронавирусной инфекции COVID-19 в разных возрастных и гендерных группах и описать основные морфопатологические проявления в различных органах.
atomic_facts: ['To analyze the thanatogenetic significance of novel coronavirus COVID-19 infection in different age and gender groups.', 'To describe the main morphopathological manifestations in various organs.']
bt_tgt: To analyze the thanatogenetic role of the new coronavirus infection COVID-19 in different age and gender groups and describe the main morphopathological manifestations in various organs.

src: The investigators carried out a comprehensive analysis of 700 autopsies of people disease from the novel coronavirus COVID-19 infection, which included an examination of gross changes reflected in the autopsy protocols and forensic medical examination reports, as well as that of microscopic changes detected during histological examination of organs.
tgt: Исследователи выполнили комплексный анализ 700 аутопсий пациентов с новой коронавирусной инфекцией COVID-19, включая изучение макроскопических изменений, отраженных в протоколах патолого-анатомических вскрытий и судебно-медицинских актах, а также микроскопических изменений, выявленных при гистологическом исследовании органов.
atomic_facts: ['The investigators carried out a comprehensive analysis of 700 autopsies of people disease from the novel coronavirus COVID-19 infection.', 'The analysis included an examination of gross changes reflected in the autopsy protocols and forensic medical examination reports.', 'The analysis included an examination of microscopic changes detected during histological examination of organs.']
bt_tgt: The researchers performed a comprehensive analysis of 700 autopsies of patients with the new coronavirus infection COVID-19, including a study of macroscopic changes reflected in autopsy reports and forensic reports, as well as microscopic changes identified during histological examination of organs.

src: Immunohistochemistry (IHC) using mouse or rabbit antibodies to CD34, CD68, EMA, Ki67, caspase-3, and VEGF was employed in some observations.
tgt: В некоторых наблюдениях применялся метод иммуногистохимии (ИГХ) с использованием мышиных или кроличьих антител к маркерам CD34, CD68, EMA, Ki67, каспазе-3 и фактору роста эндотелия сосудов.
atomic_facts: ['Immunohistochemistry using mouse antibodies to CD34 was employed in some observations.', 'Immunohistochemistry using rabbit antibodies to CD34 was employed in some observations.', 'Immunohistochemistry using mouse antibodies to CD68 was employed in some observations.', 'Immunohistochemistry using rabbit antibodies to CD68 was employed in some observations.', 'Immunohistochemistry using mouse antibodies to EMA was employed in some observations.', 'Immunohistochemistry using rabbit antibodies to EMA was employed in some observations.', 'Immunohistochemistry using mouse antibodies to Ki67 was employed in some observations.', 'Immunohistochemistry using rabbit antibodies to Ki67 was employed in some observations.', 'Immunohistochemistry using mouse antibodies to caspase-3 was employed in some observations.', 'Immunohistochemistry using rabbit antibodies to caspase-3 was employed in some observations.', 'Immunohistochemistry using mouse antibodies to VEGF was employed in some observations.', 'Immunohistochemistry using rabbit antibodies to VEGF was employed in some observations.']
bt_tgt: In some observations, the method of immunohistochemistry (IHC) was used using mouse or rabbit antibodies to the markers CD34, CD68, EMA, Ki67, caspase-3 and vascular endothelial growth factor.

src: The novel coronavirus COVID-19 infection was the primary cause of death.
tgt: Основной причиной смерти стала новая коронавирусная инфекция COVID-19.
atomic_facts: ['The novel coronavirus COVID-19 infection was the primary cause of death.']
bt_tgt: The main cause of death was the new coronavirus infection COVID-19.

src: Acute respiratory and pulmonary heart failure and multiple organ dysfunction became the leading thanatogenetic mechanisms in COVID-19.
tgt: Ведущими танатогенетическими механизмами при COVID-19 стали острая дыхательная и легочно-сердечная недостаточность, полиорганная дисфункция.
atomic_facts: ['Acute respiratory failure became the leading thanatogenetic mechanism in COVID-19.', 'Pulmonary heart failure became the leading thanatogenetic mechanism in COVID-19.', 'Multiple organ dysfunction became the leading thanatogenetic mechanism in COVID-19.']
bt_tgt: The leading thanatogenetic mechanisms for COVID-19 are acute respiratory and pulmonary-cardiac failure, and multiple organ dysfunction.

src: Cardiovascular disease, diabetes mellitus, and obesity were the most common diseases in patients with COVID-19.
tgt: Наиболее частыми заболеваниями у больных с COVID-19 были сердечно-сосудистая патология, сахарный диабет и ожирение.
atomic_facts: ['Cardiovascular disease was the most common disease in patients with COVID-19.', 'Diabetes mellitus was the most common disease in patients with COVID-19.', 'Obesity was the most common disease in patients with COVID-19.']
bt_tgt: The most common diseases in patients with COVID-19 were cardiovascular pathology, diabetes mellitus and obesity.

src: The most pronounced lung changes in COVID-19 were determined with a predominance of multiple total bilateral lesions of the lower lobes of the lungs, which was manifested by virus-induced changes in the parenchyma and stroma, as well as by microcirculation disorders.
tgt: Наиболее выраженные изменения в легких при COVID-19 определялись с преобладанием множественных общих двусторонних поражений нижних долей легких, что проявлялось вирусноиндуцированными изменениями паренхимы и стромы, а также нарушениями микроциркуляции.
atomic_facts: ['The most pronounced lung changes in COVID-19 were determined with a predominance of multiple total bilateral lesions of the lower lobes of the lungs.', 'The lung changes were manifested by virus-induced changes in the parenchyma and stroma.', 'The lung changes were manifested by microcirculation disorders.']
bt_tgt: The most pronounced changes in the lungs during COVID-19 were determined by the predominance of multiple general bilateral lesions of the lower lobes of the lungs, which was manifested by virus-induced changes in the parenchyma and stroma, as well as microcirculation disorders.

src: Acute dyscirculatory and ischemic changes in the parenchymal organs dominated in tissue damage caused by the virus.
tgt: В паренхиматозных органах доминировали острые дисциркуляторные и ишемические изменения на фоне вирусного поражения тканей.
atomic_facts: ['Acute dyscirculatory changes dominated in tissue damage caused by the virus.', 'Ischemic changes dominated in tissue damage caused by the virus.', 'Parenchymal organs experienced tissue damage caused by the virus.']
bt_tgt: In parenchymal organs, acute discirculatory and ischemic changes dominated against the background of viral tissue damage.

src: The changes in different organs of those who have died from the new coronavirus COVID-19 infection are stereotyped and include the manifestations of virus-induced action and a systemic inflammatory response with mainly microvasculature alteration, which leads to the development of coagulopathies and, accordingly, to total hypoxia.
tgt: Изменения в различных органах умерших от новой коронавирусной инфекции COVID-19 носят стереотипный характер и включают в себя проявления вирусиндуцированного действия и системного воспалительного ответа с преимущественно микроциркуляторным изменением, что приводит к развитию коагулопатий и, соответственно, к тотальной гипоксии.
atomic_facts: ['Changes in different organs of those who have died from new coronavirus COVID-19 infection are stereotyped.', 'Changes include manifestations of virus-induced action.', 'Changes include systemic inflammatory response with mainly microvasculature alteration.', 'Systemic inflammatory response leads to development of coagulopathies.', 'Coagulopathies lead to total hypoxia.']
bt_tgt: Changes in various organs of those who died from the new coronavirus infection COVID-19 are stereotypical and include manifestations of a virus-induced action and a systemic inflammatory response with predominantly microcirculatory changes, which leads to the development of coagulopathies and, accordingly, total hypoxia.

src: We extracted passenger volume data for the entire global airline network, as well as the dates of the implementation of travel restrictions and the observation of the first case of coronavirus disease (COVID-19) in each country or territory, from publicly available sources.
tgt: Мы получили из общедоступных источников данные об объеме пассажирских перевозок по всей глобальной сети авиакомпаний, а также о датах введения ограничений на поездки и наблюдения первого случая коронавирусной болезни (COVID-19) в каждой стране или территории.
atomic_facts: ['We extracted passenger volume data for the entire global airline network from publicly available sources.', 'We extracted the dates of the implementation of travel restrictions from publicly available sources.', 'We extracted the observation of the first case of coronavirus disease (COVID-19) in each country or territory from publicly available sources.']
bt_tgt: We obtained data from publicly available sources on passenger traffic across the global airline network, as well as the dates of travel restrictions and the first case of coronavirus disease (COVID-19) in each country or territory.

src: We calculated effective distance between every airport and the city of Wuhan, China.
tgt: Мы рассчитали эффективное расстояние между каждым аэропортом и городом Ухань, Китай.
atomic_facts: ['We calculated effective distance between every airport and the city of Wuhan, China.']
bt_tgt: We calculated the effective distance between each airport and the city of Wuhan, China.

src: We calculated the relative change in importation risk under three different hypothetical scenarios that all resulted in different passenger volumes.
tgt: Мы рассчитали относительное изменение риска ввоза по трем различным гипотетическим сценариям, каждый из которых привел к разным объемам пассажиропотока.
atomic_facts: ['We calculated the relative change in importation risk under three different hypothetical scenarios.', 'All three scenarios resulted in different passenger volumes.']
bt_tgt: We calculated the relative change in import risk under three different hypothetical scenarios, each of which would result in different volumes of passenger traffic.

src: The arrival time of the virus at these countries ranged from 39 to 80 days since identification of the first case in Wuhan.
tgt: Время прибытия вируса в эти страны колебалось от 39 до 80 дней с момента выявления первого случая в Ухане.
atomic_facts: ['The arrival time of the virus at these countries ranged from 39 to 80 days since identification of the first case in Wuhan.']
bt_tgt: The time of arrival of the virus in these countries ranged from 39 to 80 days from the discovery of the first case in Wuhan.

src: Our analysis of relative change in risk indicated that strategies of reducing global passenger volume and imposing travel restrictions at a further 10 hub airports would be equally effective in reducing the risk of importation of SARS-CoV-2; however, this reduction is very limited with a close-to-zero median relative change in risk.
tgt: Проведенный нами анализ относительного изменения риска показал, что стратегии сокращения глобального пассажиропотока и введения ограничений на поездки еще в 10 узловых аэропортах будут одинаково эффективны для снижения риска завоза SARS-CoV-2; однако это снижение очень ограничено с близким к нулю средним относительным изменением риска.
atomic_facts: ['Our analysis of relative change in risk indicated that reducing global passenger volume would be effective in reducing the risk of importation of SARS-CoV-2.', 'Our analysis of relative change in risk indicated that imposing travel restrictions at a further 10 hub airports would be effective in reducing the risk of importation of SARS-CoV-2.', 'The reduction in risk is very limited with a close-to-zero median relative change in risk.']
bt_tgt: Our analysis of relative change in risk showed that strategies to reduce global passenger traffic and impose travel restrictions at an additional 10 hub airports would be equally effective in reducing the risk of importation of SARS-CoV-2; however, this reduction is very limited with a mean relative change in risk close to zero.

src: The hypothetical variations in observed travel restrictions were not sufficient to prevent the global spread of SARS-CoV-2; further research should also consider travel by land and sea.
tgt: Гипотетические различия в наблюдаемых ограничениях на поездки оказались недостаточными для предотвращения глобального распространения SARS-CoV-2; в дальнейших исследованиях следует также учесть путешествия по суше и морю.
atomic_facts: ['The variations in observed travel restrictions were not sufficient to prevent the global spread of SARS-CoV-2.', 'Further research should also consider travel by land and sea.']
bt_tgt: Hypothetical differences in observed travel restrictions were not sufficient to prevent the global spread of SARS-CoV-2; Future research should also consider travel by land and sea.

src: Our study highlights the importance of strengthening local capacities for disease monitoring and control.

atomic_facts: ['Our study highlights the importance of strengthening local capacities for disease monitoring.', 'Our study highlights the importance of strengthening local capacities for disease control.']

src: The investigators carried out a comprehensive analysis of 700 autopsies of people disease from the novel coronavirus COVID-19 infection, which included an examination of gross changes reflected in the autopsy protocols and forensic medical examination reports, as well as that of microscopic changes detected during histological examination of organs.

src: Iron is a major mineral in the human body.

src: AID is mainly due to bleeding, usually gastrointestinal, while FID is linked to the inflammatory syndrome.

src: Two retinal prostheses have already obtained market authorization for patients affected by retinal dystrophies while a new device is in clinical trials for patients affected by age-related macular degeneration.
tgt: Deux prothèses rétiniennes ont déjà obtenu une autorisation de mise sur le marché pour les patients atteints de dystrophies rétiniennes, tandis qu'un nouveau dispositif fait l'objet d'essais cliniques pour les patients atteints de dégénérescence maculaire liée à l'âge.

src: Restoring vision should therefore become a reality for many patients even if this vision will not be as extensive and perfect as natural vision.

src: Three separates entities are reported (mucoid degeneration, ganglion cyst and mucoid degeneration with ganglion cysts) but it is probably a continuum of the same degenerative process.

src: In middle aged individuals, it would result of repeated microtrauma in the setting of a narrow intercondylar notch and/or increased posterior tibial slope.

src: Various risk factors are associated with the occurrence of interstitial lung disease, including the presence of anti-topoisomerase I antibodies (Scl-70) and the diffuse cutaneous form of systemic sclerosis.
tgt: Divers facteurs de risque sont associés à la survenue d'une pneumopathie interstitielle, notamment la présence d'anticorps anti-topoisomérase I (Scl-70) et la forme cutanée diffuse de la sclérodermie systémique.

src: The classical immunosuppressive treatment of systemic sclerosis-associated interstitial lung disease is evolving, as recent studies suggest a beneficial effect of biological agents such as rituximab and tocilizumab, and antifibrotic drugs such as nintedanib.
tgt: Le traitement immunosuppresseur classique de la pneumopathie interstitielle associée à la sclérodermie systémique évolue, car des études récentes suggèrent un effet bénéfique d’agents biologiques tels que le rituximab et le tocilizumab, et de médicaments antifibrotiques tels que le nintédanib.
atomic_facts: ['The classical immunosuppressive treatment of systemic sclerosis-associated interstitial lung disease is evolving.', 'Recent studies suggest a beneficial effect of biological agents such as rituximab and tocilizumab.', 'Recent studies suggest a beneficial effect of antifibrotic drugs such as nintedanib.']
bt_tgt: Conventional immunosuppressive treatment for interstitial lung disease associated with systemic sclerosis is evolving, as recent studies suggest a beneficial effect of biological agents such as rituximab and tocilizumab, and antifibrotic drugs such as nintedanib.
