src: Rhabdomyolysis: early management
tgt: Rhabdomyolyse : prise en charge précoce
atomic_facts: ['Early management is important for rhabdomyolysis.']
bt_tgt: Rhabdomyolysis: early treatment

src: Rhabdomyolysis is defined by myalgia, potentially painful myoedema and muscular weakness due to death of muscular fiber in the striated muscle.
tgt: La rhabdomyolyse est définie par une myalgie, un myxœdème potentiellement douloureux et une faiblesse musculaire due à la dégradation de la fibre musculaire dans le muscle strié.
atomic_facts: ['Rhabdomyolysis is defined by myalgia.', 'Rhabdomyolysis is defined by potentially painful myoedema.', 'Rhabdomyolysis is defined by muscular weakness due to death of muscular fiber in the striated muscle.']
bt_tgt: Rhabdomyolysis is defined by myalgia, potentially painful myxedema, and muscle weakness due to muscle fiber breakdown in striated muscle.

src: Frequent etiologies include physical effort, intoxication (alcohol, drugs and medication) and physical trauma.
tgt: Les étiologies fréquentes comprennent l’effort physique, l’intoxication (alcool, drogues et médicaments) et les traumatismes physiques.
atomic_facts: ['Frequent etiologies include physical effort.', 'Frequent etiologies include intoxication (alcohol, drugs and medication).', 'Frequent etiologies include physical trauma.']
bt_tgt: Common etiologies include physical exertion, intoxication (alcohol, drugs and medications) and physical trauma.

src: Diagnosis relies on creatine kinase (CK) levels.
tgt: Le diagnostic repose sur les niveaux de créatine kinase (CK).
atomic_facts: ['Diagnosis relies on creatine kinase (CK) levels.']
bt_tgt: Diagnosis is based on creatine kinase (CK) levels.

src: The clinical spectrum of rhabdomyolysis includes an asymptomatic increased amount of CK as well as severe, life threatening complications such as acute renal failure and electrolyte disorders.
tgt: Le spectre clinique de la rhabdomyolyse comprend une augmentation asymptomatique du taux de CK ainsi que des complications graves, mettant en jeu le pronostic vital, telles que l'insuffisance rénale aiguë et les troubles électrolytiques.
atomic_facts: ['The clinical spectrum of rhabdomyolysis includes an asymptomatic increased amount of CK.', 'The clinical spectrum of rhabdomyolysis includes severe, life threatening complications such as acute renal failure and electrolyte disorders.']
bt_tgt: The clinical spectrum of rhabdomyolysis includes an asymptomatic increase in CK levels as well as serious, life-threatening complications such as acute renal failure and electrolyte disturbances.

src: Treatment is based on prevention and addressing complications.
tgt: Le traitement est basé sur la prévention et le traitement des complications.
atomic_facts: ['Treatment is based on prevention.', 'Treatment is based on addressing complications.']
bt_tgt: Treatment is based on prevention and treatment of complications.

src: Efficacy of macro-clips for perforations and fistulas following endoscopic or surgical procedures. Retrospective analysis of 25 consecutive cases
tgt: Efficacité des macro-clips pour les perforations et les fistules à la suite d'interventions endoscopiques ou chirurgicales. Analyse rétrospective de 25 cas consécutifs
atomic_facts: ['Efficacy of macro-clips for perforations following endoscopic procedures.', 'Efficacy of macro-clips for fistulas following endoscopic procedures.', 'Efficacy of macro-clips for perforations following surgical procedures.', 'Efficacy of macro-clips for fistulas following surgical procedures.', 'Retrospective analysis of 25 consecutive cases.']
bt_tgt: Effectiveness of macro-clips for perforations and fistulas following endoscopic or surgical interventions. Retrospective analysis of 25 consecutive cases

src: Our results are compared with principal published series.
tgt: Nos résultats sont comparés aux principales séries publiées.
atomic_facts: ['Our results are compared with principal published series.']
bt_tgt: Our results are compared to the main published series.

src: Between 2010 and 2015, 25 consecutive patients underwent an endoscopic suture with macro-clips to seal a breach resulting from endoscopic perforation, surgical fistula, invasive medical procedure or spontaneous perforation.
tgt: Entre 2010 et 2015, 25 patients consécutifs ont subi une suture endoscopique avec des macro-clips afin de sceller une brèche résultant d'une perforation endoscopique, d'une fistule chirurgicale, d'un acte médical invasif ou d'une perforation spontanée.
atomic_facts: ['Between 2010 and 2015, 25 consecutive patients underwent an endoscopic suture with macro-clips to seal a breach resulting from endoscopic perforation.', 'Between 2010 and 2015, 25 consecutive patients underwent an endoscopic suture with macro-clips to seal a breach resulting from surgical fistula.', 'Between 2010 and 2015, 25 consecutive patients underwent an endoscopic suture with macro-clips to seal a breach resulting from invasive medical procedure.', 'Between 2010 and 2015, 25 consecutive patients underwent an endoscopic suture with macro-clips to seal a breach resulting from spontaneous perforation.']
bt_tgt: Between 2010 and 2015, 25 consecutive patients underwent endoscopic suturing with macroclips to seal a breach resulting from endoscopic perforation, surgical fistula, invasive medical procedure, or spontaneous perforation.

src: The endoscopic efficacy was immediate for all patients whose perforation was of endoscopic aetiology.
tgt: L'efficacité endoscopique a été immédiate pour tous les patients dont la perforation était d'étiologie endoscopique.
atomic_facts: ['The endoscopic efficacy was immediate for all patients whose perforation was of endoscopic aetiology.', 'The perforation was of endoscopic aetiology.']
bt_tgt: Endoscopic effectiveness was immediate for all patients whose perforation was of endoscopic etiology.

src: None of them required surgery.
tgt: Aucun d'entre eux n'a nécessité d'intervention chirurgicale.
atomic_facts: ['None of them required surgery.']
bt_tgt: None of them required surgery.

src: Secondary complementary endoscopic treatment was only used in 6/25 patients.
tgt: Le traitement endoscopique complémentaire secondaire n'a été utilisé que chez 6 patients sur 25.
atomic_facts: ['Secondary complementary endoscopic treatment was only used in 6/25 patients.']
bt_tgt: Secondary complementary endoscopic treatment was used in only 6 out of 25 patients.

src: All of them had non-endoscopic aetiology for their perforation.
tgt: Tous avaient une étiologie non endoscopique pour leur perforation.
atomic_facts: ['All of them had non-endoscopic aetiology for their perforation.']
bt_tgt: All had a non-endoscopic etiology for their perforation.

src: The survival at 1 month was 84 % and at 3 months of 76 %.
tgt: La survie à 1 mois était de 84 % et à 3 mois de 76 %.
atomic_facts: ['The survival at 1 month was 84 %.', 'The survival at 3 months was 76 %.']
bt_tgt: Survival at 1 month was 84% ​​and at 3 months 76%.

src: Our results confirm the high efficiency of macro-clips in the treatment of endoscopic breaches in a regional hospital center.
tgt: Nos résultats confirment la grande efficacité des macro clips dans le traitement des brèches endoscopiques dans un centre hospitalier régional.
atomic_facts: ['Our results confirm the high efficiency of macro-clips in the treatment of endoscopic breaches.', 'Macro-clips are used in the treatment of endoscopic breaches in a regional hospital center.']
bt_tgt: Our results confirm the high effectiveness of macro clips in the treatment of endoscopic breaches in a regional hospital center.

src: The use of macro-clips seems less convincing for the closure of some postoperative fistula.
tgt: L'utilisation de macro-clips semble moins convaincante pour la fermeture de certaines fistules postopératoires.
atomic_facts: ['The use of macro-clips seems less convincing for the closure of some postoperative fistula.']
bt_tgt: The use of macro-clips seems less convincing for the closure of certain postoperative fistulas.

src: The suture with macro-clips associated with endoscopic and medical treatments allowed to avoid surgical redo in some cases.
tgt: La suture avec des macro-clips associée à des traitements endoscopiques et médicaux a permis d'éviter une reprise chirurgicale dans certains cas.
atomic_facts: ['The suture with macro-clips allowed to avoid surgical redo in some cases.', 'The suture with macro-clips is associated with endoscopic and medical treatments.']
bt_tgt: Suturing with macro-clips combined with endoscopic and medical treatments made it possible to avoid surgical revision in certain cases.

src: AID is mainly due to bleeding, usually gastrointestinal, while FID is linked to the inflammatory syndrome.

src: Furthermore, C-reactive protein levels are high, and there is non-regenerative non-macrocytic anemia.

src: Two retinal prostheses have already obtained market authorization for patients affected by retinal dystrophies while a new device is in clinical trials for patients affected by age-related macular degeneration.

bt_tgt: Two retinal prostheses have already obtained marketing authorization for patients with retinal dystrophies, while a new device is undergoing clinical trials for patients with age-related macular degeneration.

src: Restoring vision should therefore become a reality for many patients even if this vision will not be as extensive and perfect as natural vision.

src: Three separates entities are reported (mucoid degeneration, ganglion cyst and mucoid degeneration with ganglion cysts) but it is probably a continuum of the same degenerative process.

src: In middle aged individuals, it would result of repeated microtrauma in the setting of a narrow intercondylar notch and/or increased posterior tibial slope.

src: These include neovascular age-related macular degeneration (n-AMD), proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR) and retinal vein occlusions (RVO).
tgt: 这些疾病包括新生血管性年龄相关性黄斑变性 (n-AMD)、增殖性糖尿病视网膜病变 (PDR) 与视网膜静脉阻塞 (RVO)。
atomic_facts: ['These include neovascular age-related macular degeneration (n-AMD).', 'These include proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR).', 'These include retinal vein occlusions (RVO).']
bt_tgt: These diseases include neovascular age-related macular degeneration (n-AMD), proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR), and retinal vein occlusion (RVO).

src: The most feared of these complications is endophthalmitis, a severe infection of the eye with extremely poor visual outcomes.
tgt: 这些并发症中最可怕的是眼内炎，这是一种严重的眼部感染，会造成视力严重低下。
atomic_facts: ['The most feared complication is endophthalmitis.', 'Endophthalmitis is a severe infection of the eye.', 'Endophthalmitis has extremely poor visual outcomes.']
bt_tgt: The most feared of these complications is endophthalmitis, a serious eye infection that can cause severe vision loss.

src: Patients with retinal diseases typically have to undergo multiple injections before achieving the desired therapeutic effect.

bt_tgt: Patients with retinal diseases often must undergo multiple injections to achieve the desired therapeutic effect.

src: Each injection incurs the risk of the sight-threatening complications.

atomic_facts: ['Each injection incurs the risk of sight-threatening complications.']
bt_tgt: Every injection carries risks, including vision-threatening complications.

src: These include non-biodegradable implants, nano-formulations and hydrogels.

src: Scarce qualitative literature has focused on understanding the perspective of parents of adolescents involved in crime, and no prior literature has examined how the status of being a parent of an adolescent who is involved in delinquency intersects with being an immigrant parent.

src: As HLIM patients are typically young, unique issues need to be considered, such as delayed presentation, difficult history, poor compliance and behavioural or psychiatric comorbidity.

src: To compare the safety and accuracy of pedicle screw placement assisted by robot system with freehand pedicle screw placement in upper thoracic surgery.

src: Between December 2017 and December 2019, 39 cases with upper thoracic pedicle screw internal fixation were included in the study, including 19 cases in robot group (group A, robot assisted pedicle screw placement) and 20 cases in freehand group (group B, freehand pedicle screw placement).
tgt: 2017 年 12 月至 2019 年 12 月，本研究共纳入 39 例胸椎弓根螺钉内固定患者，其中 19 例为机器人组（A 组、机器人辅助椎弓根螺钉置入组），20 例为徒手组（B 组、徒手椎弓根螺钉置入组）。
atomic_facts: ['39 cases with upper thoracic pedicle screw internal fixation were included in the study.', '19 cases were in the robot group A, which had robot-assisted pedicle screw placement.', '20 cases were in the freehand group B, which had freehand pedicle screw placement.']
bt_tgt: From December 2017 to December 2019, this study included a total of 39 patients who underwent thoracic pedicle screw internal fixation, of which 19 patients were in the robot group (Group A, robot-assisted pedicle screw placement group) and 20 patients were in the manual group (Group B, free manual pedicle screw placement group).

src: There were 104 screws implanted in group A and 108 screws in group B.

bt_tgt: Group A had 104 screws inserted and group B had 108 screws inserted.

src: Objective To study the influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes inhalation anesthetic on the determination of ethanol content in blood.

src: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that can seriously affect human health.
tgt: 流感病毒感染是一种呼吸道传染病，会严重影响人类健康。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease.', 'Influenza virus infection can seriously affect human health.']
bt_tgt: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that can seriously affect human health.

src: According to WHO estimation, seasonal influenza epidemics have caused an annually 3 to 5 million severe cases and 290 000 to 650 000 deaths globally.
tgt: 根据世卫组织的预估，季节性流感疫情每年在全球产生 300 万 - 500 万严重病例和 29 万 - 65 万死亡病例。
atomic_facts: ['Seasonal influenza epidemics have caused annually 3 to 5 million severe cases globally.', 'Seasonal influenza epidemics have caused annually 290,000 to 650,000 deaths globally.']
bt_tgt: According to WHO estimates, seasonal influenza epidemics cause 3 million to 5 million severe cases and 290,000 to 650,000 deaths worldwide each year.

src: Pregnant women, young children, the elderly, and persons with chronic illnesses are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.
tgt: 孕妇、幼儿、老人和慢性病患者是感染流感病毒的高风险人群，他们极有可能感染严重疾病、死亡。
atomic_facts: ['Pregnant women are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.', 'Young children are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.', 'The elderly are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.', 'Persons with chronic illnesses are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.']
bt_tgt: Pregnant women, young children, the elderly and patients with chronic diseases are at high risk for influenza virus infection and are at high risk of severe illness and death.

src: Especially, COVID-19 pandemic might co-circulate with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza in the coming winter-spring season.
tgt: 特别是，在即将到来的冬春季节，COVID-19 大流行可能会与流感等其他呼吸道传染病共同传播。
atomic_facts: ['COVID-19 pandemic might co-circulate with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza in the coming winter-spring season.']
bt_tgt: In particular, the COVID-19 pandemic may co-circulate with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza during the upcoming winter and spring seasons.

src: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and complications from infection.
tgt: 季节性流感疫苗接种是预防流感病毒感染和感染并发症的最有效方法。
atomic_facts: ['Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection.', 'Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent complications from infection.']
bt_tgt: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and infection complications.

src: Except for a few major cities, influenza vaccine is a category Ⅱ vaccine, which means influenza vaccination is voluntary, and recipients must pay for it.
tgt: 除少数大城市外，流感疫苗属于二类疫苗，即自愿接种流感疫苗，且接种者必须付费。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza vaccine is a category Ⅱ vaccine.', 'Influenza vaccination is voluntary.', 'Recipients must pay for influenza vaccination.']
bt_tgt: Except for a few big cities, the influenza vaccine belongs to the second category of vaccines, that is, vaccination is voluntary and the recipients must pay.

src: In 2018 and 2019, the China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China" .
tgt: 2018 年和 2019 年，中国疾病预防控制中心发布了《中国流感疫苗预防接种技术指南》。
atomic_facts: ['In 2018, the China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China".', 'In 2019, the China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China".']
bt_tgt: In 2018 and 2019, the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention issued the "Technical Guidelines for Influenza Vaccine Vaccination in China."

src: In the past year, new research evidences home and abroad have been published, and new seasonal influenza vaccine has been licensed in China.
tgt: 过去一年，国内外陆续发表新的研究证据，我国已批准新型季节性流感疫苗。
atomic_facts: ['New research evidences home and abroad have been published.', 'New seasonal influenza vaccine has been licensed in China.']
bt_tgt: In the past year, new research evidence has been published at home and abroad, and my country has approved a new seasonal influenza vaccine.

src: The main updates in this version include the following: First, new research evidences especially studies of China, including disease burden, effectiveness, Vaccine-avoidable disease burden, vaccine safety monitoring, and cost-effectiveness and cost-benefit.

atomic_facts: ['The main updates in this version include the following: First, new research evidences studies of China.', 'The main updates in this version include the following: First, new research evidences disease burden.', 'The main updates in this version include the following: First, new research evidences effectiveness.', 'The main updates in this version include the following: First, new research evidences Vaccine-avoidable disease burden.', 'The main updates in this version include the following: First, new research evidences vaccine safety monitoring.', 'The main updates in this version include the following: First, new research evidences cost-effectiveness.', 'The main updates in this version include the following: First, new research evidences cost-benefit.']
bt_tgt: The main updates of this edition include: 1. Add new research evidence, especially research on China, including disease burden, effectiveness, vaccine avoidable disease burden, vaccine safety monitoring, cost-effectiveness and cost-effectiveness.

src: Fifth, Influenza vaccination recommendations for 2020-2021 influenza season.
tgt: 五、2020-2021 年流感季节，流感疫苗接种建议。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza vaccination recommendations are for the 2020-2021 influenza season.', 'Influenza vaccination recommendations are for the fifth.')
bt_tgt: 5. Influenza vaccination recommendations for the 2020-2021 influenza season.

src: Considering the situation of globally pandemic of COVID-19, to decrease the risk of influenza virus infection and minimize the impact on COVID-19 prevention and control, we recommend the following priority for seasonal influenza vaccination: healthcare workers, including clinical doctors and nurses, public health professionals, quarantine professionals; vulnerable groups living in nursing homes or welfare homes and staffs who take care those vulnerable groups; people work or stay in high population density places, such as teachers and students in kindergartens, primary and secondary school, prisoners and staffs of prisons; other high risk group of influenza, including adults ≥60 years of age, children aged 6-59 months, persons with specific chronic diseases, the family members and caregivers of infants <6 months of age, and pregnant women or women who plan to become pregnant during the influenza season.
tgt: 考虑到全球 COVID-19 大流行的情势，为了降低流感病毒感染的风险，最大限度地减少对 COVID-19 预防和控制的影响，我们建议季节性流感疫苗的优先接种对象如下：医护人员，包括临床医生和护士、公共卫生专业人员、检疫专业人员；生活在养老院或福利院的弱势群体以及照顾这些弱势群体的工作人员；在高人口密度场所工作或停留的人员，如幼儿园、中小学教师和学生、囚犯和监狱工作人员；其他高风险流感群体，包括 60 岁以上的成年人、 6-59 个月的儿童、特定慢性疾病患者、6 个月以下婴儿的家庭成员和照顾者、孕妇及计划在流感季节期间怀孕的女士。
atomic_facts: ['To decrease the risk of influenza virus infection and minimize the impact on COVID-19 prevention and control, we recommend the following priority for seasonal influenza vaccination: healthcare workers, including clinical doctors and nurses, public health professionals, quarantine professionals.', 'Vulnerable groups living in nursing homes or welfare homes and staffs who take care those vulnerable groups.', 'People work or stay in high population density places, such as teachers and students in kindergartens, primary and secondary school, prisoners and staffs of prisons.', 'Other high risk group of influenza, including adults ≥60 years of age, children aged 6-59 months, persons with specific chronic diseases, the family members and caregivers of infants <6 months of age, and pregnant women or women who plan to become pregnant during the influenza season.']
bt_tgt: Considering the global COVID-19 pandemic situation, in order to reduce the risk of influenza virus infection and minimize the impact on COVID-19 prevention and control, we recommend that priority recipients of seasonal influenza vaccines are as follows: health care workers, including clinicians and nurses, public health professionals, and quarantine professionals; vulnerable groups living in nursing homes or welfare homes and staff who care for these vulnerable groups; people who work or stay in places with high population density, such as kindergartens, primary and secondary school teachers and students, prisoners, and prison staff; other high-risk influenza groups, including Adults 60 years and older, children 6-59 months, people with certain chronic conditions, family members and caregivers of infants younger than 6 months, pregnant women and women planning to become pregnant during flu season.

src: If they were vaccinated in 2019-2020 influenza season or a prior season, 1 dose is recommended.
tgt: 如果他们在 2019-2020 年流感季或前一季已接种疫苗，建议接种 1 剂。
atomic_facts: ['1 dose is recommended if they were vaccinated in 2019-2020 influenza season.', '1 dose is recommended if they were vaccinated in a prior season.']
bt_tgt: If they were vaccinated during the 2019-2020 flu season or the previous season, 1 dose is recommended.

src: People more than 8 years old require 1 dose of influenza vaccine.
tgt: 8 岁以上人群需要接种 1 剂流感疫苗。
atomic_facts: ['People more than 8 years old require 1 dose of influenza vaccine.']
bt_tgt: People 8 years and older need 1 dose of flu vaccine.

src: It is recommended that people receive their influenza vaccination by the end of October.
tgt: 建议人们在 10 月底前接种流感疫苗。
atomic_facts: ['It is recommended that people receive their influenza vaccination by the end of October.']
bt_tgt: It is recommended that people get a flu shot by the end of October.

src: Influenza vaccination should be offered as soon as the vaccination is available.
tgt: 一旦有可接种的流感疫苗，应尽快接种。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza vaccination should be offered as soon as the vaccination is available.']
bt_tgt: Get the flu vaccine as soon as it becomes available.

src: For the people unable to be vaccinated before the end of October, influenza vaccination will continue to be offered for the whole season.
tgt: 对于不能在 10 月底前接种疫苗的人，将继续提供整季的流感疫苗接种。
atomic_facts: ['For the people unable to be vaccinated before the end of October, influenza vaccination will continue to be offered for the whole season.']
bt_tgt: For those who cannot get vaccinated by the end of October, flu vaccinations will continue to be offered throughout the season.

src: These guidelines are intended for use by staff members of the CDCs at all levels who work on influenza control and prevention, PoVs staff members, healthcare workers from the departments of pediatrics, internal medicine, and infectious diseases, and staff members of maternity and child care institutions at all levels.
tgt: 本指南供各级疾病预防控制中心从事流感控制和预防的工作人员、PoV 工作人员、儿科、内科和传染病科的医护人员以及各级妇幼保健机构的工作人员使用。
atomic_facts: ['These guidelines are intended for use by staff members of the CDCs at all levels who work on influenza control and prevention.', 'These guidelines are intended for use by PoVs staff members.', 'These guidelines are intended for use by healthcare workers from the departments of pediatrics, internal medicine, and infectious diseases.', 'These guidelines are intended for use by staff members of maternity and child care institutions at all levels.']
bt_tgt: This guide is intended for use by CDC staff at all levels engaged in influenza control and prevention, PoV staff, medical staff in pediatrics, internal medicine, and infectious disease departments, and staff in maternal and child health care facilities at all levels.

src: These guidelines will be updated periodically as new evidence becomes available.
tgt: 这些指南将随着新证据的出现而定期更新。
atomic_facts: ['These guidelines will be updated periodically as new evidence becomes available.', 'Guidelines will be updated periodically as new evidence becomes available.']
bt_tgt: These guidelines will be updated regularly as new evidence becomes available.

src: When using KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 gas chromatographic column, the retention time of sevoflurane, isoflurane and ethanol is similar, especially that of sevoflurane and ethanol, and sevoflurane obviously interferes with the determination of ethanol content in blood.
tgt: 使用 KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 气相色谱柱时，七氟烷、异氟烷和乙醇的保留时间相似，特别是七氟烷和乙醇的保留时间，七氟烷明显干扰血液中乙醇含量的测定。
atomic_facts: ['When using KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 gas chromatographic column, the retention time of sevoflurane, isoflurane and ethanol is similar.', 'Especially the retention time of sevoflurane and ethanol is similar.', 'Sevoflurane obviously interferes with the determination of ethanol content in blood.']
bt_tgt: When using the KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 GC column, the retention times of sevoflurane, isoflurane and ethanol are similar, especially the retention times of sevoflurane and ethanol, with sevoflurane significantly interfering with the determination of ethanol content in blood.

src: The interference can be discriminated effectively by choosing the suitable chromatographic column and double column confirmatory detection.
tgt: 通过选择合适的色谱柱和双柱确证检测，可以有效地辨别干扰。
atomic_facts: ['The interference can be discriminated effectively by choosing the suitable chromatographic column.', 'The interference can be discriminated effectively by choosing the double column confirmatory detection.']
bt_tgt: Interferences can be effectively identified through appropriate column selection and dual-column confirmatory testing.

src: The clinical data of 27 patients with symptomatic chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures combined with kyphosis treated between June 2015 and June 2017 were retrospectively analysed.
tgt: 回顾性分析在 2015 年 6 月至 2017 年 6 月期间治疗的 27 名有症状的慢性胸腰椎骨质疏松性骨折伴脊柱后凸患者的临床数据。
atomic_facts: ['The clinical data of 27 patients with symptomatic chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures combined with kyphosis were retrospectively analyzed.', 'Patients were treated between June 2015 and June 2017.']

src: Among them, there were 8 males and 19 females, with an average age of 69.5 years (range, 56-81 years).

src: There were no complications such as bedsore, hypostatic pneumonia, or deep venous thrombosis.

src: Anti-vascular endothelial growth factors (anti-VEGF) have become the most common treatment modality for many retinal diseases.
tgt: 抗血管内皮生长因子（抗-VEGF）已成为许多视网膜疾病最常见的治疗方式。

bt_tgt: Anti-vascular endothelial growth factor (anti-VEGF) has become the most common treatment modality for many retinal diseases.

src: These include neovascular age-related macular degeneration (n-AMD), proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR) and retinal vein occlusions (RVO).
tgt: 此类疾病包括新生血管性年龄相关性黄斑变性 (n-AMD)、增殖性糖尿病视网膜病变 (PDR) 与视网膜静脉阻塞 (RVO)。
atomic_facts: ['These include neovascular age-related macular degeneration (n-AMD).', 'These include proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR).', 'These include retinal vein occlusions (RVO).']
bt_tgt: Such diseases include neovascular age-related macular degeneration (n-AMD), proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR), and retinal vein occlusion (RVO).

src: The most feared of these complications is endophthalmitis, a severe infection of the eye with extremely poor visual outcomes.
tgt: 此类并发症中最可怕的是眼内炎，这是一种严重的眼部感染，会造成视力严重低下。
atomic_facts: ['The most feared complication is endophthalmitis.', 'Endophthalmitis is a severe infection of the eye.', 'Endophthalmitis has extremely poor visual outcomes.']
bt_tgt: The most feared of these complications is endophthalmitis, a serious eye infection that can cause severe vision loss.

src: Patients with retinal diseases typically have to undergo multiple injections before achieving the desired therapeutic effect.

atomic_facts: ['Patients with retinal diseases typically have to undergo multiple injections before achieving the desired therapeutic effect.']
bt_tgt: Patients with retinal diseases often must undergo multiple injections to achieve the desired therapeutic effect.

src: Each injection incurs the risk of the sight-threatening complications.

atomic_facts: ['Each injection incurs the risk of sight-threatening complications.']
bt_tgt: Every injection carries risks that can lead to vision-threatening complications.

src: As such, there has been great interest in developing sustained delivery platforms for anti-VEGF agents to the posterior segment of the eye.

bt_tgt: Because of this, there is considerable interest in developing platforms for the sustained delivery of anti-VEGF drugs to the posterior segment of the eye.

src: In recent years, there have been various strategies that have been conceptualised.

src: These include non-biodegradable implants, nano-formulations and hydrogels.

src: In this review, the barriers of drug delivery to the posterior segment of the eye will be explained.

src: Through the above, this review attempts to provide an overview of the sustained delivery platforms in their various phases of development.

bt_tgt: Through the above, this review attempts to provide an overview of continuous delivery platforms at various stages of development.

src: Digital prosthodontic technology still has some problems, such as insufficient precision for some manufacturing methods and shortage of professionals.
tgt: 数字化口腔修复技术仍然存在一些问题，如某些制造方法的精度不够，以及专业人员的短缺。

bt_tgt: There are still some problems with digital dental restoration technology, such as the insufficient accuracy of some manufacturing methods and the shortage of professionals.

src: Technicians and administrators of prosthodontic technology should face up to the problems and seize the opportunities, to improve the level of prosthodontic technology and train the highly educated professionals.
tgt: 口腔修复技术的技术人员与管理人员应正视问题、抓住机遇、提高口腔修复技术水平、培养高素质的专业人才。
atomic_facts:

 'Technicians of prosthodontic technology should seize the opportunities to train the highly educated professionals.',

 'Administrators of prosthodontic technology should seize the opportunities to train the highly educated professionals.']
bt_tgt: Technicians and managers of dental restoration technology should face up to problems, seize opportunities, improve the level of dental restoration technology, and cultivate high-quality professionals.

src: At the same time, attentions should be payed to the advantages of the traditional prosthodontic technology while grasping the development of the digital prosthodontic technology.
tgt: 在把握数字化口腔修复技术发展机遇的同时，要重视传统口腔修复技术的优势。

bt_tgt: While seizing the development opportunities of digital dental restoration technology, we must also pay attention to the advantages of traditional dental restoration technology.

src: The dentists and the dental technicians should learn together and enhance communication to each other, to promote the progress of digital prosthodontic technology in China.

bt_tgt: Dentists and dental technicians should learn together, strengthen mutual communication, and promote the progress of digital dental restoration technology in China.

src: Though HLIM has distinct clinical features, not uncommonly it may masquerade as other retinal disorders.

src: As HLIM patients are typically young, unique issues need to be considered, such as delayed presentation, difficult history, poor compliance and behavioural or psychiatric comorbidity.

src: The weighted mean and weighted estimates from random-effects models were calculated for visual acuity (VA) and central subfield thickness (CST) changes at 6, 12 and 24 months.

src: To compare the safety and accuracy of pedicle screw placement assisted by robot system with freehand pedicle screw placement in upper thoracic surgery.

src: Between December 2017 and December 2019, 39 cases with upper thoracic pedicle screw internal fixation were included in the study, including 19 cases in robot group (group A, robot assisted pedicle screw placement) and 20 cases in freehand group (group B, freehand pedicle screw placement).
tgt: 2017 年 12 月至 2019 年 12 月，39 例胸椎弓根螺钉内固定患者被纳入研究、其中 19 例为机器人组（A 组、机器人辅助椎弓根螺钉置入组），20 例为徒手组（B 组、徒手椎弓根螺钉置入组）。
atomic_facts: ['Between December 2017 and December 2019, 39 cases with upper thoracic pedicle screw internal fixation were included in the study.', '19 cases were in the robot group (group A, robot assisted pedicle screw placement).', '20 cases were in the freehand group (group B, freehand pedicle screw placement).']
bt_tgt: From December 2017 to December 2019, 39 patients who underwent thoracic pedicle screw internal fixation were included in the study, of which 19 patients were in the robot group (Group A, robot-assisted pedicle screw placement group) and 20 patients were in the manual group (Group B, free manual pedicle screw placement group).

src: There were 104 screws implanted in group A and 108 screws in group B.

src: Objective To study the influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes inhalation anesthetic on the determination of ethanol content in blood.
tgt: 目的 研究卤代羟基烷烃吸入麻醉剂对血液中乙醇含量测定的影响。

bt_tgt: Objective To study the effect of halogenated hydroxyalkane inhalation anesthetics on the determination of ethanol content in blood.

src: Methods Halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes were analyzed by headspace gas chromatography with double column confirmatory detection method.
tgt: 方法 采用顶空-气相色谱法和双柱确证法分析卤代羟基烷烃。

bt_tgt: Methods Halogenated hydroxyalkanes were analyzed using headspace-gas chromatography and dual-column confirmatory methods.

src: The influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes on determination of ethanol content in blood sample by headspace gas chromatography was explored under the different detection conditions of KB-BAC1/ KB-BAC2 and J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column.
tgt: 探讨了在 KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 和 J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 气相色谱柱不同检测条件下，卤代羟基烷对采用顶空气相色谱法进行血样中乙醇含量测定的影响。
atomic_facts: ['The influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes on determination of ethanol content in blood sample by headspace gas chromatography was explored.', 'The influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes on determination of ethanol content in blood sample by different detection conditions of KB-BAC1/ KB-BAC2 gas chromatographic column was explored.', 'The influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes on determination of ethanol content in blood sample by different detection conditions of J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column was explored.']
bt_tgt: The effect of halohydroxyalkanes on the determination of ethanol content in blood samples using headspace gas chromatography under different detection conditions on KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 and J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 GC columns was explored.

src: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that can seriously affect human health.
tgt: 流感病毒感染是一种呼吸道传染病，会严重影响人类健康。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease.', 'Influenza virus infection can seriously affect human health.']
bt_tgt: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that can seriously affect human health.

src: Influenza viruses can have frequent antigenic variation and changes, which can result in rapid and widespread transmission resulting in annual epidemics and outbreaks in places of public gathering such as schools, kindergartens and nursing homes.
tgt: 流感病毒可发生频繁的抗原变异和变化，这使其快速和广泛的传播，导致每年在学校、幼儿园和养老院等公共集会场所爆发流行病和疫情。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza viruses can have frequent antigenic variation.', 'Changes can result in rapid and widespread transmission.', 'Changes can result in annual epidemics.', 'Changes can result in outbreaks in places of public gathering.', 'Places of public gathering include schools, kindergartens, and nursing homes.']
bt_tgt: Influenza viruses can undergo frequent antigenic mutations and changes, which enable them to spread rapidly and widely, leading to epidemics and outbreaks in public gathering places such as schools, kindergartens, and nursing homes every year.

src: According to WHO estimation, seasonal influenza epidemics have caused an annually 3 to 5 million severe cases and 290 000 to 650 000 deaths globally.
tgt: 根据世卫组织的预估，季节性流感疫情每年在全球造成 300 万 - 500 万严重病例和 29 万 - 65 万死亡病例。
atomic_facts: ['According to WHO estimation, seasonal influenza epidemics have caused an annually 3 to 5 million severe cases globally.', 'According to WHO estimation, seasonal influenza epidemics have caused annually 290 000 to 650 000 deaths globally.']
bt_tgt: According to WHO estimates, seasonal influenza epidemics cause 3 million to 5 million severe cases and 290,000 to 650,000 deaths worldwide each year.

src: Pregnant women, young children, the elderly, and persons with chronic illnesses are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.
tgt: 孕妇、幼儿、老人和慢性病患者是感染流感病毒的高风险人群，他们极有可能感染严重疾病和死亡。
atomic_facts: ['Pregnant women are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.', 'Young children are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.', 'The elderly are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.', 'Persons with chronic illnesses are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.']
bt_tgt: Pregnant women, young children, the elderly, and people with chronic medical conditions are at high risk for influenza virus infection and are at high risk for severe illness and death.

src: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and complications from infection.
tgt: 季节性流感疫苗接种是预防流感病毒感染和感染并发症的最有效方法。
atomic_facts: ['Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection.', 'Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent complications from influenza virus infection.']
bt_tgt: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and infection complications.

src: In 2018 and 2019, the China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China" .
tgt: 2018 年和 2019 年，中国疾病预防控制中心发布了《中国流感疫苗预防接种技术指南》。
atomic_facts: ['The China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China" in 2018.', 'The China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China" in 2019.']
bt_tgt: In 2018 and 2019, the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention issued the "Technical Guidelines for Influenza Vaccine Vaccination in China."

src: In the past year, new research evidences home and abroad have been published, and new seasonal influenza vaccine has been licensed in China.
tgt: 过去一年，国内外陆续发表新的研究证据，我国已批准新型季节性流感疫苗。
atomic_facts: ['New research evidences have been published in the past year.', 'New research evidences have been published abroad.', 'A new seasonal influenza vaccine has been licensed in China.']
bt_tgt: In the past year, new research evidence has been published at home and abroad, and my country has approved a new seasonal influenza vaccine.

src: Second, policies and measures for influenza prevention and control issued by National Health Commission (PRC) in the past year.
tgt: 二、近一年来国家卫生健康委员会 (PRC) 出台的流感防控政策和措施。
atomic_facts: ['Policies and measures for influenza prevention and control were issued by National Health Commission (PRC) in the past year.']
bt_tgt: 2. Influenza prevention and control policies and measures issued by the National Health Commission (PRC) in the past year.

src: Fifth, Influenza vaccination recommendations for 2020-2021 influenza season.
tgt: 五、2020-2021 年，流感季节时流感疫苗接种建议。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza vaccination recommendations are for the 2020-2021 influenza season.']
bt_tgt: 5. Influenza vaccination recommendations during the 2020-2021 influenza season.

src: If they were vaccinated in 2019-2020 influenza season or a prior season, 1 dose is recommended.
tgt: 如果他们在 2019-2020 年流感季或前一季已接种疫苗，建议接种 1 剂。
atomic_facts: ['1 dose is recommended if they were vaccinated in 2019-2020 influenza season.', '1 dose is recommended if they were vaccinated in a prior season.']
bt_tgt: If they were vaccinated during the 2019-2020 flu season or the previous season, 1 dose is recommended.

src: People more than 8 years old require 1 dose of influenza vaccine.
tgt: 8 岁以上人群需要 1 剂流感疫苗。
atomic_facts: ['People more than 8 years old require 1 dose of influenza vaccine.']
bt_tgt: People 8 years and older require 1 dose of flu vaccine.

src: It is recommended that people receive their influenza vaccination by the end of October.
tgt: 建议人们在 10 月底前接种流感疫苗。
atomic_facts: ['People are recommended to receive their influenza vaccination by the end of October.']
bt_tgt: It is recommended that people get a flu shot by the end of October.

src: Influenza vaccination should be offered as soon as the vaccination is available.
tgt: 一旦有可接种的流感疫苗，就应尽快接种。
atomic_facts: ['Influenza vaccination should be offered as soon as the vaccination is available.']
bt_tgt: Get the flu vaccine as soon as it becomes available.

src: For the people unable to be vaccinated before the end of October, influenza vaccination will continue to be offered for the whole season.
tgt: 对于不能在 10 月底前接种疫苗的人，将继续提供整季的流感疫苗接种。
atomic_facts: ['For the people unable to be vaccinated before the end of October, influenza vaccination will continue to be offered for the whole season.']
bt_tgt: For those who cannot get vaccinated by the end of October, flu vaccinations will continue to be offered throughout the season.

src: These guidelines are intended for use by staff members of the CDCs at all levels who work on influenza control and prevention, PoVs staff members, healthcare workers from the departments of pediatrics, internal medicine, and infectious diseases, and staff members of maternity and child care institutions at all levels.
tgt: 本指南供各级疾病预防控制中心从事流感控制和预防的工作人员、PoV 工作人员、儿科、内科和传染病科的医护人员以及各级妇幼保健机构的工作人员使用。
atomic_facts: ['These guidelines are intended for use by staff members of the CDCs at all levels who work on influenza control and prevention.', 'These guidelines are intended for use by PoVs staff members.', 'These guidelines are intended for use by healthcare workers from the departments of pediatrics, internal medicine, and infectious diseases.', 'These guidelines are intended for use by staff members of maternity and child care institutions at all levels.']
bt_tgt: This guide is intended for use by CDC staff at all levels engaged in influenza control and prevention, PoV staff, medical staff in pediatrics, internal medicine, and infectious disease departments, and staff in maternal and child health care facilities at all levels.

src: These guidelines will be updated periodically as new evidence becomes available.
tgt: 这些指南将随着新证据的出现而定期更新。
atomic_facts: ['These guidelines will be updated periodically as new evidence becomes available.', 'New evidence becomes available periodically for updating guidelines.']
bt_tgt: These guidelines will be updated regularly as new evidence becomes available.

src: The influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes on determination of ethanol content in blood sample by headspace gas chromatography was explored under the different detection conditions of KB-BAC1/ KB-BAC2 and J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column.
tgt: 探讨了在 KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 和 J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 气相色谱柱不同检测条件下，卤代羟基烷对采用顶空气相色谱法进行血样中乙醇含量测定的影响。
atomic_facts: ['The influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes on determination of ethanol content in blood sample was explored.', 'The exploration was conducted under different detection conditions of KB-BAC1/ KB-BAC2 gas chromatographic column.', 'The exploration was conducted under different detection conditions of J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column.']
bt_tgt: The effect of halohydroxyalkanes on the determination of ethanol content in blood samples using headspace gas chromatography under different detection conditions on KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 and J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 GC columns was explored.

src: When using KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 gas chromatographic column, the retention time of sevoflurane, isoflurane and ethanol is similar, especially that of sevoflurane and ethanol, and sevoflurane obviously interferes with the determination of ethanol content in blood.
tgt: 使用 KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 气相色谱柱时，七氟烷、异氟烷和乙醇的保留时间相似，特别是七氟烷和乙醇的保留时间，七氟烷明显干扰血液中乙醇含量的测定。
atomic_facts: ['When using KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 gas chromatographic column, the retention time of sevoflurane is similar.', 'When using KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 gas chromatographic column, the retention time of isoflurane is similar.', 'When using KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 gas chromatographic column, the retention time of ethanol is similar.', 'The retention time of sevoflurane is similar, especially that of sevoflurane and ethanol.', 'Sevoflurane obviously interferes with the determination of ethanol content in blood.']
bt_tgt: When using the KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 GC column, the retention times of sevoflurane, isoflurane and ethanol are similar, especially the retention times of sevoflurane and ethanol, with sevoflurane significantly interfering with the determination of ethanol content in blood.

src: The interference can be discriminated effectively by choosing the suitable chromatographic column and double column confirmatory detection.
tgt: 通过选择合适的色谱柱和双柱确证检测，可以有效地区分干扰。
atomic_facts: ['The interference can be discriminated effectively by choosing the suitable chromatographic column.', 'The interference can be discriminated effectively by choosing the double column confirmatory detection.']
bt_tgt: Interferences can be effectively distinguished through appropriate column selection and dual-column confirmatory testing.

src: The clinical data of 27 patients with symptomatic chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures combined with kyphosis treated between June 2015 and June 2017 were retrospectively analysed.
tgt: 对于在 2015 年 6 月至 2017 年 6 月期间治疗的 27 名有症状的慢性胸腰椎骨质疏松性骨折伴脊柱后凸患者的临床数据进行了回顾性分析。
atomic_facts: ['The clinical data of 27 patients with symptomatic chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures combined with kyphosis were retrospectively analysed.', 'The patients were treated between June 2015 and June 2017.']
bt_tgt: Clinical data from 27 patients with symptomatic chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures with kyphosis treated between June 2015 and June 2017 were retrospectively analyzed.

src: Among them, there were 8 males and 19 females, with an average age of 69.5 years (range, 56-81 years).
tgt: 其中男性 8 人，女性 19 人，平均年龄 69.5 岁（范围为 56-81 岁）。
atomic_facts: ['Among them, there were 8 males and 19 females.', 'The average age was 69.5 years.', 'The age range was from 56 to 81 years.']
bt_tgt: There were 8 males and 19 females, with a mean age of 69.5 years (range, 56-81 years).

src: There were no complications such as bedsore, hypostatic pneumonia, or deep venous thrombosis.
tgt: 无褥疮、坠积性肺炎、深静脉血栓形成等并发症。
atomic_facts: ['There were no complications such as bedsore.', 'There were no complications such as hypostatic pneumonia.', 'There were no complications such as deep venous thrombosis.']
bt_tgt: There were no complications such as bedsores, pneumonia, or deep vein thrombosis.

src: All patients were followed up 8-24 months, with an average of 16.6 months.
tgt: 对所有患者进行 8～24 个月的随访，平均 16.6 个月。
atomic_facts: ['All patients were followed up 8-24 months.', 'All patients were followed up with an average of 16.6 months.']
bt_tgt: All patients were followed for 8 to 24 months, with an average of 16.6 months.

src: Introduction: assessing the relationship between childhood diseases and nutrient intake is a crucial issue that requires valid and reliable dietary assessment tools in this period of physical and physiological development.
tgt: Introducción: la evaluación de la relación entre las enfermedades infantiles y la ingesta de nutrientes es un tema crucial que requiere herramientas válidas y confiables de evaluación dietética en este periodo de desarrollo físico y fisiológico.
atomic_facts: ['Assessing the relationship between childhood diseases and nutrient intake is a crucial issue.', 'Valid and reliable dietary assessment tools are required in this period of physical and physiological development.']
bt_tgt: Introduction: the evaluation of the relationship between childhood diseases and nutrient intake is a crucial issue that requires valid and reliable dietary assessment tools in this period of physical and physiological development.

src: For all nutrients, over 60 % of participants were classified into the same or adjacent quartile of crude and adjusted intake.
tgt: Para todos los nutrientes, más del 60 % de los participantes se clasificaron en el mismo cuartil o en el cuartil adyacente de ingesta bruta y ajustada.
atomic_facts: ['Over 60% of participants were classified into the same quartile of crude and adjusted intake.', 'Over 60% of participants were classified into the adjacent quartile of crude and adjusted intake.']
bt_tgt: For all nutrients, more than 60% of participants were classified in the same or adjacent quartile of crude and adjusted intakes.

src: Mostly MVAC or gemcitabine-cisplatin (GC) regimens were used without clear benefit of one regimen over the other.
tgt: La mayoría de los regímenes de MVAC o gemcitabina-cisplatino (GC) se utilizaron sin un beneficio claro de un régimen sobre el otro.
atomic_facts: ['MVAC regimens were mostly used.', 'GC regimens were mostly used.', 'There was no clear benefit of one regimen over the other.']
bt_tgt: Most MVAC or gemcitabine-cisplatin (GC) regimens were used with no clear benefit of one regimen over the other.

src: This was an observational epidemiological study conducted in the state of Paraíba.
tgt: Se trata de un estudio epidemiológico observacional realizado en el estado de Paraíba.
atomic_facts: ['This was an observational epidemiological study conducted in the state of Paraíba.']
bt_tgt: This is an observational epidemiological study carried out in the state of Paraíba.

src: Infant mortality was analyzed with descriptive statistics.

atomic_facts: ['Infant mortality was analyzed with descriptive statistics.', 'Descriptive statistics was used to analyze infant mortality.']
bt_tgt: Infant mortality was analyzed with descriptive statistics.

src: In general, a 36% reduction in the time of arrival of these second samples at the laboratory was achieved with respect to the previous circuit.
tgt: En general, se logró una reducción del 36 % en el tiempo de llegada de estas segundas muestras al laboratorio con respecto al circuito anterior.
atomic_facts: ['A 36% reduction in the time of arrival of second samples at the laboratory was achieved.', 'This reduction was achieved with respect to the previous circuit.']
bt_tgt: Overall, a 36% reduction was achieved in the arrival time of these second samples to the laboratory compared to the previous circuit.

src: However, in line with previous findings and as hypothesised in this review, there were statistically significant correlations found between family life, family separation and mental health outcomes.
tgt: Sin embargo, de acuerdo con hallazgos anteriores y según la hipótesis de esta revisión, se encontraron correlaciones estadísticamente significativas entre la vida familiar, la separación familiar y los resultados de salud mental.
atomic_facts: ['There were statistically significant correlations found between family life and mental health outcomes.', 'There were statistically significant correlations found between family separation and mental health outcomes.', 'The correlations were in line with previous findings.', 'The correlations were hypothesized in this review.']
bt_tgt: However, consistent with previous findings and as hypothesized in this review, statistically significant correlations were found between family life, family separation, and mental health outcomes.

src: Multinominal logistic regression analysis was performed to ascertain significant factors associated with a short hospital stay (less than 48 h).
tgt: Se llevó a cabo un análisis de regresión logística multinominal para determinar los factores significativos asociados a una estancia hospitalaria corta (inferior a 48 h).
atomic_facts: ['Multinominal logistic regression analysis was performed to ascertain significant factors associated with a short hospital stay (less than 48 h).']
bt_tgt: A multinominal logistic regression analysis was carried out to determine the significant factors associated with a short hospital stay (less than 48 h).

src: The current study contributes to a sparse literature on moderators of Functional Family Therapy (FFT) by examining whether responsiveness to FFT, measured by a broad range of outcomes, varies by adolescent gender, age, and their interaction.
tgt: El estudio actual contribuye a la escasa literatura sobre los moderadores de la Terapia familiar funcional (FFT) al examinar si la capacidad de respuesta a la FFT, medida por una amplia gama de resultados, varía según el sexo del adolescente, la edad y su interacción.
atomic_facts: ['The current study contributes to a sparse literature on moderators of Functional Family Therapy (FFT).', 'The study examines whether responsiveness to FFT varies by adolescent gender.', 'The study examines whether responsiveness to FFT varies by adolescent age.', 'The study examines whether responsiveness to FFT varies by the interaction of adolescent gender and age.', 'Responsiveness to FFT is measured by a broad range of outcomes.']
bt_tgt: The current study contributes to the sparse literature on moderators of Functional Family Therapy (FFT) by examining whether responsiveness to FFT, as measured by a wide range of outcomes, varies by adolescent gender, age, and their interaction.

src: This study was informed by 687 families (n, adolescents = 581; n, caregivers = 933) and utilized a pre-post comparison design.
tgt: En este estudio se contó con 687 familias (n, adolescentes = 581; n, cuidadores = 933) y se utilizó un diseño de comparación antes y después.
atomic_facts: ['This study was informed by 687 families.', 'n, adolescents = 581 for this study.', 'n, caregivers = 933 for this study.', 'This study utilized a pre-post comparison design.']
bt_tgt: This study included 687 families (n, adolescents = 581; n, caregivers = 933) and a before and after comparison design was used.

src: Moderation analyses revealed that according to parent report, girls had significantly greater improvements in peer problems and family functioning, and boys benefited more in increased liking of school.
tgt: Los análisis de moderación revelaron que, según el informe de los padres, las niñas habían tenido una mejora considerablemente superior de los problemas con los compañeros y el funcionamiento de la familia, y los niños se beneficiaban más de una mayor simpatía hacia la escuela.
atomic_facts: ['Moderation analyses revealed that girls had significantly greater improvements in peer problems according to parent report.', 'Moderation analyses revealed that girls had significantly greater improvements in family functioning according to parent report.', 'Moderation analyses revealed that boys benefited more in increased liking of school.']
bt_tgt: Moderation analyzes revealed that, based on parent report, girls had significantly greater improvement in peer problems and family functioning, and boys benefited more from greater school friendliness.

src: There were differential effects by age, such that older youth had less beneficial mental health outcomes and a smaller decrease in frequency of hash use.
tgt: Hubo efectos diferenciales por edad, de modo que los jóvenes de mayor edad tuvieron resultados de salud mental menos beneficiosos y una disminución menor en la frecuencia del consumo de hachís.
atomic_facts: ['Older youth had less beneficial mental health outcomes.', 'Older youth had a smaller decrease in frequency of hash use.', 'There were differential effects by age.']
bt_tgt: There were differential effects by age, such that older youth had less beneficial mental health outcomes and a smaller decline in the frequency of hashish use.

src: The study aims to evaluate the association between teenage pregnancy and prematurity.

src: Objective: the aim of this research was to explore the relationship between dietary pattern habits and compliance with screen-time guidelines in Spanish schoolchildren.
tgt: Objetivo: explorar la relación entre los hábitos alimentarios y el cumplimiento de las pautas sobre el tiempo frente a la pantalla en niños españoles en edad escolar.
atomic_facts: ['The aim of this research was to explore the relationship between dietary pattern habits and compliance with screen-time guidelines in Spanish schoolchildren.']
